query.name: S_J_PROJECT__FOLDERB_AND_CHILD
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROJECT A, SECURITY B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.THING AND (A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ OR A.SYSTEM_ID=@param2@) AND (checkSecurity(A.SYSTEM_ID, @param3@, @param4@, 'F') > 0) AND B.ACCESSRIGHTS > 0 ORDER BY ID_PARENT ASC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY_BY_ID_FASCICOLO
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A) */ A.*, getAccessRights(@param3@,@param2@,a.system_id) as accessrights FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ and (checkSecurity(A.ID_FASCICOLO, @param2@, @param3@, 'F') > 0) ORDER BY DESCRIPTION ASC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_FOLDERByID
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROJECT A WHERE checksecurity(A.system_id,@param2@,@param3@,'F' )>0 AND A.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_FASCICOLOByID
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, @param6@ AS DTA_CREAZIONE, getaccessrights(@param5@,@param4@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO,A.CHA_PRIVATO,ID_TITOLARIO, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.CHA_CONTROLLATO, A.CHA_COD_T_A, A.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param3@ AND checksecurity(A.system_id,@param4@,@param5@,'F' )>0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F'

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_FASCICOLOByID_LOW_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE,@param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA,A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, @param6@ AS DTA_CREAZIONE, getaccessrights(@param5@,@param4@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO,A.CHA_PRIVATO,ID_TITOLARIO, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.CHA_CONTROLLATO, A.CHA_COD_T_A, A.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@param3@ AND checksecurity(A.id_titolario,@param4@,@param5@,'T' )>0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F'

query.name: S_Project9
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT B.ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT B WHERE B.SYSTEM_ID= @param1@)

query.name: S_Project10

query.name: S_Project11
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND VAR_CODICE = '@param1@' AND ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: S_Project12

query.name: S_Project13
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_PARENT= @param1@

query.name: S_ProjectComponents4
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE PROJECT_ID IN ( @param1@ )

query.name: S_ProjectComponents5
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE PROJECT_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_ProjectComponents6
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE LINK = @param1@

query.name: S_RemoteLibraries
query.value: SELECT LIBRARY_NAME FROM REMOTE_LIBRARIES

query.name: S_ID_UO_INTEROP

query.name: S_Security
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SECURITY WHERE PERSONORGROUP IN @param1@ AND THING IN @param2@

query.name: S_Security2
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO FROM SECURITY WHERE THING=@param1@ AND PERSONORGROUP=@param2@

query.name: S_Security3

query.name: S_Versions

query.value: SELECT VERSION_LABEL FROM VERSIONS WHERE @param1@ AND ( VERSION_LABEL NOT LIKE 'PR%' AND VERSION_LABEL NOT LIKE 'ATD') ORDER BY VERSION_LABEL DESC, VERSION_ID DESC

query.name: S_VAR_COD_LIV1

query.name: UPD_SET_TODOLIST_GIA_VISTA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET CHA_VISTA = '1', DTA_VISTA = @param4@ WHERE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE DPA_TRASMISSIONE, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE ( DPA_TRASMISSIONE.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA ) AND (DPA_TRASMISSIONE.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL) AND (DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_VALIDA = '1') AND (DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N') AND (DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_VISTA = '0') AND ( (DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_PEOPLE = @param2@) OR DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param3@ ) )

query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.CHA_IN_CESTINO, A.VAR_NOTE_CESTINO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE a @param1@ WHERE ( (A.CHA_DA_PROTO='1' AND A.ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) ) OR A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO='G') AND nvl(A.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='1' AND a.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE IS NULL @param2@ ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__DPA_TRASM_SING__DPA_TRASM_UTENTE__DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM
query.value: select ut.id_people from dpa_trasmissione trasm, dpa_trasm_singola sing, dpa_trasm_utente ut, dpa_ragione_trasm rag, profile p where trasm.system_id = sing.id_trasmissione and sing.system_id = ut.id_trasm_singola and sing.id_ragione = rag.system_id and trasm.id_profile=p.system_id and p.CHA_DA_PROTO <> 0 and p.NUM_PROTO is null and trasm.id_profile = @idProfile@ @ragione@

query.name: S_PATH__COMPONENTS__VERSIONS
query.value: select c.path from components c, versions v where c.version_id = v.version_id and c.docnumber=@docNumber@

query.name: DOC_GET_CORR_BY_ID_PEOPLE
query.value: SELECT DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.ID_UO AS ID_UO,DPA_AMMINISTRA.VAR_CODICE_AMM AS VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI,DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE DPA_AMMINISTRA.SYSTEM_ID=DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.ID_AMM AND DPA_CORR_GLOBALI.ID_PEOPLE=@param1@

query.name: DOC_GET_UO_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: DOC_GET_ID_UO_BY_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_GRUPPO=@param1@

query.name: DOC_GET_DOC_BY_DOCNUMBER
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ To_char(profile.creation_date,'YYYY') CREATION_YEAR, PROFILE.* FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param1@

query.name: DOC_GET_REGISTRO_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: GET_RUOLI_RIF_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT A.ID_GRUPPO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO AND A.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R' AND A.CHA_TIPO_IE = 'I' AND A.CHA_RIFERIMENTO = '1' AND @param1@ AND @param2@

query.name: DK_PATH
query.value: SELECT PATH FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param1@

query.name: VERIFICA_UTENTE
query.value: select p.user_id, p.user_password, p.id_amm from people p, dpa_corr_globali c where p.system_id=c.id_people and c.cha_tipo_urp='P' and c.cha_tipo_ie='I' and p.disabled='N' and UPPER(p.user_id)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: CHECK_DOCUMENTO_ACQUISITO
query.value: SELECT C.VAR_IMPRONTA FROM COMPONENTS c, VERSIONS v WHERE c.VERSION_ID = v.VERSION_ID AND v.VERSION = 1 AND c.DOCNUMBER=@param1@

query.name: CHECK_PROTO_ACQUISITO
query.value: SELECT P.VAR_SEGNATURA FROM COMPONENTS c, VERSIONS v, PROFILE p WHERE c.VERSION_ID = v.VERSION_ID AND c.DOCNUMBER=p.DOCNUMBER AND v.VERSION = 1 AND c.DOCNUMBER=@param1@

query.name: S_NODO_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id as IDRECORD, a.var_codice as CODICE, a.description as DESCRIZIONE, a.num_livello as LIVELLO, a.id_registro as REGISTRO, a.id_parent as IDPARENT, a.var_cod_liv1 as CODLIV, cha_rw as RW,(SELECT count(b.system_id) FROM PROJECT b WHERE b.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND b.id_amm = @param1@ AND b.id_parent = a.system_id ) as FIGLIO FROM PROJECT a WHERE a.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.id_parent = @param2@ ORDER BY a.var_cod_liv1

query.name: S_NODO_TITOLARIO_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id as IDRECORD,a.var_codice as CODICE,a.description as DESCRIZIONE,a.num_livello as LIVELLO,a.id_registro as REGISTRO,a.id_parent as IDPARENT,a.var_cod_liv1 as CODLIV, nvl(a.num_mesi_conservazione,0) as NUMMESICONSERVAZIONE, (SELECT count(b.system_id) FROM PROJECT b WHERE b.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND b.id_amm = @param1@ AND b.id_parent = a.system_id ) as FIGLIO FROM PROJECT a, SECURITY s WHERE a.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.id_parent = @param2@ AND a.system_id = s.thing AND s.accessrights > 0 AND s.personorgroup = @param3@ AND (a.id_registro is null or a.id_registro = @param4@) ORDER BY a.var_cod_liv1

query.name: S_NODO_TITOLARIO_NO_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id as IDRECORD,a.var_codice as CODICE,a.description as DESCRIZIONE,a.num_livello as LIVELLO,a.id_registro as REGISTRO,a.id_parent as IDPARENT,a.var_cod_liv1 as CODLIV, nvl(a.num_mesi_conservazione,0) as NUMMESICONSERVAZIONE, (SELECT count(b.system_id) FROM PROJECT b WHERE b.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND b.id_amm = @param1@ AND b.id_parent = a.system_id ) as FIGLIO FROM PROJECT a WHERE a.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.id_parent = @param2@ -- AND s.personorgroup = @param3@ AND (a.id_registro is null or a.id_registro = @param4@) ORDER BY a.var_cod_liv1

query.name: S_REGISTRI_IN_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: SELECT system_id as IDRECORD,var_desc_registro as DESCRIZIONE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE id_amm = @param1@ AND CHA_RF = '0' ORDER BY var_desc_registro

query.name: S_REGISTRI_IN_AMM_RESTRICTED
query.value: SELECT a.SYSTEM_ID as IDRECORD, a.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO as DESCRIZIONE FROM dpa_el_registri a, DPA_USERADMIN_REGISTRI b, dpa_corr_globali c, dpa_login d, people e where d.SESSION_ID = '@param1@' and d.user_id = e.user_id and e.system_id = c.id_people and c.system_id = b.system_id_corr_glob and b.system_id_registro = a.system_id

query.name: S_VISIBILITA_NODO_RUOLI
query.value: SELECT c.id_gruppo AS IDGRUPPO, c.var_desc_corr AS RUOLO, s.personorgroup AS GRUPPOASSOCIATO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI c, (SELECT personorgroup FROM SECURITY WHERE thing = @param1@ AND accessrights IN(255,47,63)) s WHERE c.id_gruppo = s.personorgroup(+) AND c.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND c.id_amm = @param2@ AND c.cha_tipo_ie = 'I'

query.name: S_TOT_CODICE_TIT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM PROJECT WHERE var_codice = '@param1@' AND id_amm = @param2@ AND cha_tipo_proj = 'T'

query.name: U_NODO_TITOLARIO1
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET description = '@param1@' WHERE system_id = @param2@

query.name: U_NODO_TIT_REG
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET id_registro = @param1@ WHERE system_id = @param2@ OR (id_parent = @param2@ AND cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'G')

query.name: S_CONTA_FASC_PROC_TIT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) as TOT FROM PROJECT WHERE id_parent = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'P'

query.name: S_CONTA_DOC_IN_ROOT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM PROJECT p, PROJECT_COMPONENTS pc WHERE p.id_parent = (SELECT system_id FROM PROJECT WHERE id_parent = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'G' ) AND p.cha_tipo_proj = 'C' AND p.system_id = pc.project_id

query.name: S_FILTRO_RIC_TIT
S_FILTRO_RIC_TIT_DOCSPA
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.system_id as ID, A.var_codice as CODICE, A.description as DESCRIZIONE, A.num_livello as LIVELLO, A.id_parent as IDPARENT FROM PROJECT A, SECURITY B @paramFrom@ WHERE A.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' @param1@ @param2@ AND A.id_amm = @param3@ AND A.system_id = B.thing AND B.accessrights > 0 AND B.personorgroup = @param4@ AND (A.id_registro is null or A.id_registro = @param5@) AND ID_TITOLARIO = @param6@ @paramNote@ @paramIndice@ ORDER BY num_livello

query.name: S_NODO_BY_COD
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_PARENT, NUM_LIVELLO FROM PROJECT WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE) = UPPER('@param1@') AND ID_AMM = @param2@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND (ID_REGISTRO is null or ID_REGISTRO = @param3@) AND ID_TITOLARIO = @param4@

query.name: S_NODO_PADRE
query.value: SELECT id_parent as PADRE FROM PROJECT WHERE system_id = @param1@

query.name: D_SECURITY_NODO
query.value: DELETE FROM SECURITY WHERE THING IN ( SELECT system_id FROM PROJECT WHERE system_id = @param1@ OR (id_parent = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'G') OR (id_parent = (SELECT system_id FROM PROJECT WHERE id_parent = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'G')) )

query.name: D_NODO_TITOLARIO
query.value: DELETE FROM PROJECT WHERE system_id = @param1@ OR (id_parent = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'G') OR (id_parent = (SELECT system_id FROM PROJECT WHERE id_parent = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'G'))

query.name: I_NODO_TITOLARIO
AMM_I_VISIBILITA_NODO_RUOLI
query.value: INSERT INTO SECURITY (THING, PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO) VALUES (@param1@, @param2@, 255, 'P')

query.name: S_COD_LIV
query.value: SELECT ( case when MAX(TO_NUMBER(LTRIM(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(var_cod_liv1), - 4), '0'))) is null then 1 else MAX(TO_NUMBER(LTRIM(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(var_cod_liv1), - 4), '0'))) +1 end ) as TOT FROM PROJECT WHERE var_cod_liv1 LIKE '@param1@%' AND cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND id_amm = @param2@ AND num_livello = @param3@ @param4@

query.name: U_PROJECT_CODLIV1
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET VAR_COD_LIV1 = '@param1@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: U_PROJECT_CODLIV2
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET VAR_COD_LIV1 = @param1@ WHERE VAR_COD_LIV1 like '@param2@%' AND ID_AMM = @param3@ @param4@

query.name: U_PROJECT_CODLIV3
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET @param1@ WHERE @param2@

query.name: FILENET_U_VERSION
query.value: UPDATE VERSION SET @param1@ WHERE @param2@

query.name: FILENET_S_GET_NUM_VERSIONE
query.value: SELECT MAX (NUM_VERSIONE) FROM VERSION WHERE V_E_NAME='@param1@' AND CHA_ALLEGATO='@param2@'

query.value: DELETE FROM VERSION WHERE V_NAME + V_E_NAME='@param1@'

query.value: SELECT VERSION_ID FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER='@param1@' AND VERSION='@param2@'

query.name: FILENET_S_GET_NUM_VERSIONE_3
query.value: SELECT V_NAME_FN FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER='@param1@' AND VERSION_ID='@param2@'

query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER='@param1@'

query.name: FILENET_I_ADD_USER
query.value:
INSERT INTO USR ( U_NAME, U_CREATE_DATE, U_PWD, U_ACT_GRP, U_FILE_CREATOR, U_USER_CREATOR, U_GROUP_CREATOR, U_DISPOSITION, U_CHKOUT_F_NAME, U_OWNER_NAME, U_STATUS, U_DEF_RUN_APP, U_CSINDEX_DEFAULT, U_SEARCH_DOMAIN, U_FULL_NAME, U_SYNC ) VALUES ( '@param1@', SYSDATE, '', '@param2@', 1, 1, 1, '@param3@', 2, 'Admin', 1,
1, 2, 2, '@param4@', '0' )

query.name: FILENET_I_ADD_USERGROUP
query.value: INSERT INTO GRP_USR ( GU_G_NAME, GU_U_NAME ) VALUES ( '@param1@', '@param2@' )

query.name: FILENET_D_USER
query.value: DELETE FROM USR WHERE U_NAME='@param1@'

query.name: FILENET_D_GRP_USR
query.value: DELETE FROM GRP_USR WHERE GU_U_NAME='@param1@'

query.name: FILENET_M_USER
query.value: UPDATE USR SET U_NAME='@param1@', U_FULL_NAME='@param2@' WHERE U_NAME='@param3@'

query.name: FILENET_VERSION_IS_ACQUISITO
query.value: SELECT VAR_IMPRONTA FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER='@param1@' AND VERSION_ID='@param2@'

query.name: FILENET_U_VERSIONS
query.value: UPDATE VERSIONS SET @param1@ WHERE @param2@

query.name: FILENET_S_PEOPLE
query.value: SELECT USER_PASSWORD FROM PEOPLE WHERE USER_ID='@param1@'

query.name: FILENET_DISABLE_PEOPLE
query.value: UPDATE USR SET U_STATUS=0 WHERE U_NAME='@param1@'

query.name: FILENET_S_PEOPLE_2
query.value: SELECT USER_PASSWORD FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: FILENET_S_VERSION
query.value: SELECT V_STACK_ID, V_STACK_FILE_ID FROM VERSION WHERE V_E_NAME='@param1@' AND V_NAME='@param2@'

query.name: FILENET_S_STACK
query.value: SELECT ST_NODE, ST_PATH FROM STACK WHERE ST_ID=@param1@

query.name: FILENET_GET_VERSIONID
query.value: SELECT VERSION_ID FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param1@ AND V_NAME_FN='@param2@'

query.name: FILENET_UPDATE_COMPONENTS
query.value: UPDATE COMPONENTS SET PATH='@param1@' WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param2@ AND VERSION_ID=@param3@

query.name: FILENET_GET_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME
query.value: SELECT V_FILE_NAME FROM VERSION WHERE V_E_NAME='@param1@' AND V_NAME='@param2@'

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__PROJECT_COMPONENTS__GET_FOLDERS_DOCUMENT
query.value:
SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_FOLDER, P.ID_PARENT AS ID_PARENT_FOLDER, P.ID_FASCICOLO ID_FASCICOLO, P.DESCRIPTION FOLDER_DESCRIPTION, P.cha_tipo_fascicolo
FROM PROJECT P, PROJECT_COMPONENTS PC
WHERE PC.PROJECT_ID = P.SYSTEM_ID AND PC.LINK=@param1@ AND PC.TYPE='D' AND P.id_fascicolo != P.id_parent @param2@
ORDER BY P.SYSTEM_ID ASC

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_VER_RAG_TRASM
query.value: SELECT B.* FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA A, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_AMM AND ((A.ID_RAGIONE_COMPETENZA = B.SYSTEM_ID) OR (A.ID_RAGIONE_CONOSCENZA = B.SYSTEM_ID))

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_LIST_DOCUMENTI_TRASMESSI
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX(E) */ E.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE AS TIPO_RAGIONE, A.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE, B.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_SINGOLA, C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI AS NOTE_GENERALI FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D, PROFILE E WHERE A.ID_PROFILE=E.SYSTEM_ID and A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND B.ID_RAGIONE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND C.CHA_VALIDA='1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND ((B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND C.ID_PEOPLE=@param2@) OR B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE= (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_PEOPLE=@param2@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'P')) AND A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' AND C.CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '1' AND (E.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param3@) OR E.ID_REGISTRO IS NULL) ORDER BY A.DTA_INVIO DESC,B.ID_TRASMISSIONE DESC, B.CHA_TIPO_DEST ASC

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(E INDX_PROFILE41) */ E.SYSTEM_ID as IDDocumento, E.DOCNUMBER as DocNumber, E.cha_tipo_proto as TipoDocumento, @param1@ AS DataCreazione, E.var_prof_oggetto as Oggetto, E.var_segnatura as Segnatura, E.id_registro as IDRegistro, (SELECT MAX(v.version) FROM VERSIONS v WHERE v.docnumber = E.docnumber) AS Versioni, (COUNTALLEGATI_BY_DOCNUMBER(e.docnumber)) AS Allegati FROM PROFILE E WHERE E.SYSTEM_ID=@param2@

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_MITT_DEST_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(P INDX_PROFILE41) */ AP.ID_MITT_DEST AS MITTENTE_DOCUMENTO, AP.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST AS TIPO, CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR AP, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, PROFILE P WHERE AP.ID_MITT_DEST=CG.SYSTEM_ID AND P.SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ AND P.SYSTEM_ID=AP.ID_PROFILE AND AP.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST IN ('M','D')

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_COMPONENT_DATA
query.value: SELECT C.PATH, C.FILE_SIZE, C.VAR_IMPRONTA, C.VERSION_ID, C.DOCNUMBER, V.VERSION_LABEL, V.VERSION FROM COMPONENTS C,VERSIONS V WHERE C.VERSION_ID = ( SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER =(SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(P INDX_PROFILE41) */ P.DOCNUMBER FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@) AND VERSION NOT IN (0) ) AND C.VERSION_ID =V.VERSION_ID

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_UO_APPARTENENZA
query.value: SELECT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE_UO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG WHERE SYSTEM_ID= (SELECT ID_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@ )

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_RUOLI_UO_APPARTENENZA
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.ID_UO AS ID_UO, CG.ID_GRUPPO AS ID_GRUPPO, CG.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE_RUOLO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_RUOLO, CG.CHA_RIFERIMENTO AS RUOLO_RIFERIMENTO, (case when TR.NUM_LIVELLO > @param2@ then 0 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO = @param2@ then 2 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO < @param2@ then 1 end ) AS GERARCHIA,tr.num_livello, CG.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG RR WHERE CG.SYSTEM_ID = RR.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO AND CG.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = TR.SYSTEM_ID AND RR.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param3@) AND RR.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CG.ID_UO = @param1@ AND CG.CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CG.DTA_FINE IS NULL order by tr.num_livello asc

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_RUOLI_UO_APP_NAV
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.ID_UO AS ID_UO, CG.ID_GRUPPO AS ID_GRUPPO, CG.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE_RUOLO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_RUOLO, CG.CHA_RIFERIMENTO AS RUOLO_RIFERIMENTO, (case when TR.NUM_LIVELLO > @param2@ then 0 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO = @param2@ then 2 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO < @param2@ then 1 end ) AS GERARCHIA, CG.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG RR WHERE CG.SYSTEM_ID = RR.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO AND CG.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = TR.SYSTEM_ID AND RR.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param3@) AND RR.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CG.ID_UO = @param1@ AND CG.CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CG.DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_RUOLI_UO_SOTTOSTANTI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.ID_UO AS ID_UO, CG.ID_GRUPPO AS ID_GRUPPO, CG.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE_RUOLO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_RUOLO, CG.CHA_RIFERIMENTO AS RUOLO_RIFERIMENTO, (case when TR.NUM_LIVELLO > @livello@ then 0 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO = @livello@ then 2 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO < @livello@ then 1 end ) AS GERARCHIA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG RR WHERE CG.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = TR.SYSTEM_ID AND CG.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = TR.SYSTEM_ID AND RR.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param2@) AND RR.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CG.ID_UO = @param1@ AND CG.CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CG.DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_COUNT_UO_SOTTOSTANTI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CG.SYSTEM_ID) AS TOTALI FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CGG, DPA_UO_REG UOR WHERE CG.ID_PARENT = @param1@ AND CG.SYSTEM_ID = UOR.ID_UO AND UOR.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param2@) AND CGG.ID_UO > 0 AND CG.SYSTEM_ID > 0 -- AND CG.ID_OLD = 0 AND CG.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CGG.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CG.SYSTEM_ID = CGG.ID_UO AND CGG.CHA_RIFERIMENTO = '1'

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_UTENTI_RUOLI_UO_APPARTENENZA
query.value: SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_CORR_GLOBALI, G.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_GRUPPO, P.USER_ID AS CODICE_UTENTE, P.FULL_NAME AS DESCRIZIONE_UTENTE, P.EMAIL_ADDRESS AS EMAIL_UTENTE, P.CHA_NOTIFICA, P.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO FROM GROUPS G, PEOPLEGROUPS PG, PEOPLE P, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG WHERE PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID=G.SYSTEM_ID AND PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID=P.SYSTEM_ID AND G.SYSTEM_ID IN (@param1@) AND P.DISABLED NOT IN ('Y') AND P.SYSTEM_ID=CG.ID_PEOPLE AND PG.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CG.CHA_TIPO_URP!='L' ORDER BY P.VAR_COGNOME ASC

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_UO_SOTTOSTANTI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE_UO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_UO, CG.ID_PESO_ORG FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CGG, DPA_UO_REG UOR WHERE CG.ID_PARENT = @param1@ AND CG.SYSTEM_ID = UOR.ID_UO AND UOR.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param2@) AND CGG.ID_UO > 0 AND CG.SYSTEM_ID > 0 --AND CG.ID_OLD = 0 AND CG.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CGG.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CG.SYSTEM_ID = CGG.ID_UO AND CGG.CHA_RIFERIMENTO = '1' ORDER BY CG.ID_PESO_ORG, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_UO_CORRENTE
query.value: SELECT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE_UO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_UO
query.value: SELECT system_id AS IDCorrGlobale, var_codice AS Codice, var_cod_rubrica AS CodiceRubrica, var_desc_corr AS Descrizione, id_amm AS IDAmministrazione, num_livello AS Livello, var_codice_aoo AS CodiceRegistroInterop, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI c WHERE c.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND c.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND c.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.id_uo = a.system_id) AS Ruoli, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI b WHERE b.cha_tipo_urp = 'U' AND b.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND b.id_amm = @param3@ AND b.id_parent = a.system_id AND b.dta_fine IS NULL ) AS SottoUo, a.id_peso_org AS IDPESO, a.InteropRegistryId, a.InteropRfId FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp = 'U' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.dta_fine IS NULL @param1@ @param2@ AND a.id_amm = @param3@ ORDER BY a.id_peso_org, a.var_desc_corr asc

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_RUOLI
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOBALE, a.id_gruppo AS IDGRUPPO, a.id_tipo_ruolo AS IDTIPORUOLO, b.var_codice as CODICETIPORUOLO, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.var_cod_rubrica AS CODICERUBRICA, a.var_desc_corr AS DESCRIZIONE, a.cha_riferimento AS DIRIFERIMENTO, a.id_amm AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, a.cha_responsabile as RESPONSABILE, a.id_peso_org as IDPESO, a.CHA_SEGRETARIO as SEGRETARIO, b.NUM_LIVELLO as NUM_LIVELLO, a.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO b WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.dta_fine is null AND a.id_uo in ( @param1@ ) AND a.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = b.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY NUM_LIVELLO ASC, DESCRIZIONE ASC

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_TIPORUOLO_UT
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOBALE, a.id_gruppo AS IDGRUPPO, a.id_tipo_ruolo AS IDTIPORUOLO, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.var_cod_rubrica AS CODICERUBRICA, a.var_desc_corr AS DESCRIZIONE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO b WHERE a.id_tipo_ruolo = b.system_id AND b.id_amm = @param1@ AND b.var_codice = '@param2@' AND a.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.dta_fine IS NULL ORDER BY DESCRIZIONE ASC

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_RUOLI_UT
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDGRUPPO, a.group_id AS CODICE, a.group_name AS DESCRIZIONE, b.cha_preferito AS PREFERITO FROM GROUPS a, PEOPLEGROUPS b WHERE b.groups_system_id = a.system_id AND b.dta_fine IS NULL AND b.people_system_id = @param1@ ORDER BY DESCRIZIONE ASC

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_UTENTI
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOBALE, a.id_people AS IDPEOPLE, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.var_cod_rubrica AS CODICERUBRICA, a.var_nome AS NOME, a.var_cognome AS COGNOME, a.id_amm AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, c.matricola as MATRICOLA, c.email_address AS EMAIL, d.ID_UO as IDUO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLEGROUPS b, PEOPLE c, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI d WHERE a.id_people = b.people_system_id AND b.people_system_id = c.system_id AND b.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = d.ID_GRUPPO AND c.disabled = 'N' AND a.dta_fine is NULL AND b.dta_fine is NULL AND a.cha_tipo_urp = 'P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND b.groups_system_id = @param1@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_REGISTRI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID AS IDREGISTRO, VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, VAR_DESC_REGISTRO AS DESCRIZIONE, ID_AMM AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, CHA_RF AS RF, CHA_DISABILITATO AS RFDISABILITATO, ID_AOO_COLLEGATA AS AOOCOLLEGATA, CHA_STATO AS STATO, VAR_PREG, ANNO_PREG FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_AMM = @param1@ AND CHA_RF = '0' ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_REGISTRI_RF_ASS_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID AS IDREGISTRO, VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, VAR_DESC_REGISTRO AS DESCRIZIONE, ID_AMM AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE DPA_EL_REGISTRI.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_L_RUOLO_REG.ID_REGISTRO AND DPA_L_RUOLO_REG.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param2@ ) AS ASSOCIATO, CHA_RF AS RF, CHA_DISABILITATO AS RFDISABILITATO, ID_AOO_COLLEGATA AS AOOCOLLEGATA, CHA_STATO AS STATO FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_AMM = @param1@ @param3@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_REGISTRI_ASS_RUOLO2
query.value: SELECT a.SYSTEM_ID AS IDREGISTRO, a.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, a.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO AS DESCRIZIONE, a.ID_AMM AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, b.DTA_INIZIO AS DATA_ASSOCIAZIONE, b.DTA_ASS_VISIBILITA AS DATA_VISIBILITA, a.CHA_RF AS RF, a.CHA_STATO AS STATO FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI a, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG b WHERE a.ID_AMM = @param1@ AND b.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param2@ AND A.CHA_RF = '0' AND a.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_REGISTRO

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_REGISTRI_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID AS IDREGISTRO, VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, CHA_STATO AS STATO, VAR_DESC_REGISTRO AS DESCRIZIONE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID_CORR_GLOB FROM DPA_USERADMIN_REGISTRI WHERE DPA_EL_REGISTRI.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_USERADMIN_REGISTRI.SYSTEM_ID_REGISTRO AND DPA_USERADMIN_REGISTRI.SYSTEM_ID_CORR_GLOB = @idCorrGlob@ ) AS ASSOCIATO FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_REGISTRI_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: select system_id_registro from dpa_useradmin_registri where system_id_corr_glob = @idCorrGlob@

query.name: D_REGISTRI_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: delete from dpa_useradmin_registri where system_id_corr_glob = @idCorrGlob@

query.name: I_REGISTRI_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: insert into dpa_useradmin_registri (system_id_corr_glob, system_id_registro) values (@idCorrGlob@,@idRegistro@)

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_FUNZIONI_ASS_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID AS IDTIPOFUNZIONE, VAR_COD_TIPO AS CODICE, VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN AS DESCRIZIONE, (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO WHERE DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO.ID_TIPO_FUNZ = DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param1@ ) AS ASSOCIATO FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE WHERE CHA_VIS = '1' AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_DATI_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOBALE, b.system_id AS IDPEOPLE, b.user_id AS USERID, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.var_cod_rubrica AS CODICERUBRICA, a.var_nome AS NOME, a.var_cognome AS COGNOME, a.var_email AS EMAIL, b.var_sede AS SEDE, b.user_password AS PASSWORD, b.disabled AS ABILITATO, b.cha_amministratore AS AMMINISTRATORE, b.cha_notifica AS NOTIFICA, b.cha_notifica_con_allegato AS ALLEGATO_NOTIFICA, a.id_amm AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, b.matricola as MATRICOLA, b.abilitato_chiavi_config FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE b WHERE a.id_people = b.system_id AND a.system_id = @param1@

query.name: I_AMM_NUOVO_RUOLO_IN_UO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CORR_GLOBALI ( @param1@ id_amm, var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr, dta_inizio, var_codice, id_tipo_ruolo, id_gruppo, cha_tipo_corr, cha_tipo_ie, cha_tipo_urp, cha_riferimento, id_uo, id_old, cha_responsabile, cha_segretario, cha_disabled_trasm, var_original_code, original_id ) VALUES ( @param2@ @param3@, '@param4@', '@param5@', @param6@, '@param7@', @param8@, @param9@, 'S', 'I', 'R', @param10@, @param11@, 0, @param12@, @param13@, @param14@, '@param4@', seq.currval )

query.name: U_AMM_RUOLO_IN_UO_GROUPS
query.value: UPDATE GROUPS SET GROUP_ID = '@param1@', GROUP_NAME = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: U_AMM_RUOLO_IN_UO_CORRGLOB
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET var_codice = '@param1@', var_cod_rubrica = '@param1@', var_desc_corr = '@param2@', cha_riferimento = @param3@, ID_TIPO_RUOLO = '@param5@', cha_responsabile = @param6@, cha_segretario=@param7@, cha_disabled_trasm=@param8@, id_uo=@idUo@ WHERE system_id = @param4@

query.name: S_RECORD_TRASM_SINGOLA
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_RECORD_PROFILE
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(PROFILE INDX_PROFILE41) */ COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM PROFILE WHERE @param1@

query.name: D_RUOLO_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE @param1@

query.name: D_REGISTRI_RUOLO_IN_UO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE @param1@

query.name: D_FUNZIONI_RUOLO_IN_UO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_RISULTATO_RICERCA_ORG_U
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOB, a.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE, a.var_desc_corr AS DESCRIZIONE, a.id_parent AS IDPARENT, (SELECT var_desc_corr FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE system_id = a.id_parent) AS DESCPARENT FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp='U' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.dta_fine IS NULL @param2@ @param3@

query.name: S_RISULTATO_RICERCA_ORG_R
query.value: SELECT a.original_id AS IDCORRGLOB, a.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE, a.var_desc_corr AS DESCRIZIONE, a.id_uo AS IDPARENT, a.id_gruppo AS IDGRUPPO, (SELECT var_desc_corr FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE system_id = a.id_uo) AS DESCPARENT, dta_fine as DATAFINE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp='R' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ @dtaFineCond@ @param2@ @param3@ order by a.dta_inizio desc

query.name: S_RISULTATO_RICERCA_ORG_PNOME
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOB, a.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE, (a.var_nome || ' ' || a.var_cognome) AS DESCRIZIONE, (SELECT system_id FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE id_gruppo = d.system_id) AS IDPARENT, d.group_name AS DESCPARENT, a.ID_PEOPLE AS IDPEOPLE, b.MATRICOLA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE b, PEOPLEGROUPS c, GROUPS d WHERE a.id_people = b.system_id AND b.system_id = c.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND c.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = d.system_id AND a.cha_tipo_urp='P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.dta_fine IS NULL @param2@ @param3@

query.name: S_RISULTATO_RICERCA_ORG_PCOGNOME
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOB, a.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE, (a.var_cognome || ' ' || a.var_nome) AS DESCRIZIONE, (SELECT system_id FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE id_gruppo = d.system_id) AS IDPARENT, d.group_name AS DESCPARENT, a.ID_PEOPLE AS IDPEOPLE, b.MATRICOLA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE b, PEOPLEGROUPS c, GROUPS d WHERE a.id_people = b.system_id AND b.system_id = c.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND c.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = d.system_id AND a.cha_tipo_urp='P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.dta_fine IS NULL @param2@ @param3@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_IDPARENT_UO
query.value: SELECT id_parent FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE system_id = @param1@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_IDPARENT_UORUOLO
query.value: SELECT id_uo FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE system_id = @param1@

query.name: U_DISABILITA_GRUPPO
query.value: UPDATE GROUPS SET DISABLED = 'Y', GROUP_ID = GROUP_ID || '_' || SYSTEM_ID WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_DTA_RIFIUTATA2
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DTA_RIFIUTATA = @param1@, CHA_RIFIUTATA='1', VAR_NOTE_RIF='Trasmissione rifiutata per mancanza di utenti nel ruolo', CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0' WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN ( SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param2@ AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0')) )

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_SOSTIT
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET ID_PEOPLE = @param1@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN ( SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param2@ AND (A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' OR A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'F') AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND C.CHA_ACCETTATA='0' AND C.CHA_RIFIUTATA = '0' AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1') OR ((D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA = '0')) )

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_TIPI_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT system_id AS IDTIPORUOLO, var_codice AS CODICE, var_desc_ruolo AS DESCRIZIONE, num_livello AS LIVELLO FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO WHERE id_amm = @param1@ ORDER BY var_desc_ruolo

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_UTENTI_RICERCA
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOBALE, a.id_people AS IDPEOPLE, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.var_cod_rubrica AS CODICERUBRICA, a.var_nome AS NOME, a.var_cognome AS COGNOME, a.id_amm AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, c.ldap_never_sync, c.ldap_id_sync, c.ldap_authenticated, c.ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR, c.IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT, c.CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI, c.smart_client_pdf_conv_on_scan, c.matricola as MATRICOLA, c.email_address AS EMAIL FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE c WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp = 'P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_people = c.system_id AND c.disabled = 'N' AND a.dta_fine is NULL @param10@ AND UPPER(a.@param1@) LIKE UPPER('@param2@%') AND a.id_amm = @param3@ @param4@ ORDER BY a.var_cognome

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_UTENTI_IN_AMM
query.value: SELECT a.system_id AS IDCORRGLOBALE, c.system_id AS IDPEOPLE, c.user_id AS USERID, a.var_nome AS NOME, a.var_cognome AS COGNOME, a.var_codice AS CODICE, a.var_cod_rubrica AS CODICERUBRICA, c.cha_amministratore AS AMMINISTRATORE, a.var_email AS EMAIL, c.from_email_address AS FROM_EMAIL, c.disabled AS ABILITATO, (SELECT b.network_id FROM NETWORK_ALIASES b WHERE b.personorgroup = c.system_id) AS DOMINIO, c.var_sede AS SEDE, c.cha_notifica AS NOTIFICA, c.cha_notifica_con_allegato AS ALLEGATO_NOTIFICA, a.id_amm AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE, c.password_never_expire as NESSUNA_SCADENZA_PASSWORD, c.ldap_never_sync, c.ldap_id_sync, c.ldap_authenticated, c.ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR, c.IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT, c.CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI, c.smart_client_pdf_conv_on_scan, c.ID_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA, c.ABILITATO_CENTRO_SERVIZI, c.matricola, c.ABILITATO_CHIAVI_CONFIG FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE c WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp = 'P' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.id_people = c.system_id AND a.id_amm = @param1@ @param2@ order by a.var_cognome asc, a.var_nome asc

query.name: S_AMM_GET_UTENTI_X_USERID
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) AS TOT FROM PEOPLE WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') @param2@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_UTENTI_X_COD_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) AS TOT FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = UPPER('@param1@') @param2@

query.name: S_DTA_FINE_PEOPLEGROUPS
query.value: SELECT DTA_FINE FROM PEOPLEGROUPS WHERE people_system_id = @param1@ AND groups_system_id = @param2@

query.name: U_DTA_FINE_PEOPLEGROUPS
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLEGROUPS SET DTA_FINE = @param1@ WHERE people_system_id = @param2@ @param3@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_REGISTRO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param2@

query.name: I_RUOLO_REGISTRO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_L_RUOLO_REG (@param1@ ID_REGISTRO, ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, DTA_INIZIO) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@, @param4@, @param5@)

query.name: D_RUOLO_REGISTRO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param1@ AND ID_REGISTRO @param2@

query.name: S_LIVELLO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT a.NUM_LIVELLO FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO a, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI b WHERE b.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.ID_TIPO_RUOLO

query.name: U_DTA_ASS_VISIB_RUOLO_REGISTRO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_L_RUOLO_REG SET dta_ass_visibilita = @param1@ WHERE id_ruolo_in_uo = @param2@ AND id_registro = @param3@

query.name: S_RICERCA_ELEMENTI_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT /*+index (a)*/ a.var_cod_rubrica, a.var_desc_corr, (case when a.CHA_TIPO_IE='I' then 1 else 0 end) AS interno, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.system_id, getcodreg(a.ID_REGISTRO) cod_reg_rf, a.ID_REGISTRO, a.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM, a.DTA_FINE, a.VAR_NOME, a.VAR_COGNOME, dett.VAR_COD_FISC as VAR_COD_FISC, dett.VAR_COD_PI as VAR_COD_PI, a.ID_PEOPLE FROM dpa_corr_globali a LEFT JOIN DPA_DETT_GLOBALI DETT ON DETT.ID_CORR_GLOBALI=a.SYSTEM_ID @param2@ WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_RICERCA_CORR_GLOBAL_BY_EMAIL
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID, ID_AMM, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, VAR_CODICE, VAR_INSERT_BY_INTEROP, ID_REGISTRO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C, DPA_MAIL_CORR_ESTERNI M Where C.SYSTEM_ID = M.ID_CORR AND upper(M.VAR_EMAIL) = upper('@param1@') AND ( (ID_REGISTRO IS NULL @param3@ ) OR ID_REGISTRO IN ('@param2@')) AND DTA_FINE IS NULL AND (upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) not like '%@%' AND upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) not like 'INTEROP%')

query.name: S_RICERCA_CORR_GLOBAL_BY_EMAIL_AND_DESCR
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID, C.ID_AMM, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, C.VAR_DESC_CORR, C.VAR_CODICE, C.VAR_INSERT_BY_INTEROP, getcodreg(c.system_id) VAR_COD_REGISTRO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C, DPA_MAIL_CORR_ESTERNI M Where C.SYSTEM_ID = M.ID_CORR AND upper('@param1@') = upper(M.VAR_EMAIL) AND upper(VAR_DESC_CORR_OLD) = '@param2@' AND ((ID_REGISTRO IS NULL @param4@ ) OR ID_REGISTRO IN ('@param3@')) AND DTA_FINE IS NULL AND (upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) not like 'INTEROP%')

listeQuery.query: U_DOC_ARRIVO_MITTENTE_INTEROP update dpa_doc_arrivo_par f set id_mitt_dest='@param1@' WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 'x' FROM PROFILE p WHERE f.id_profile = p.system_id AND p.num_proto IS NULL AND cha_tipo_proto = 'A' AND cha_da_proto = '1' AND f.id_mitt_dest = '@param2@') AND id_mitt_dest='@param2@'
U_DOC_ARRIVO_MITTENTE_OCCASIONALE_INTEROP update dpa_doc_arrivo_par f set id_mitt_dest=@param1@ WHERE f.id_profile =@param2@

query.name: S_RICERCA_ELEMENTO_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT system_id, var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr, (case when cha_tipo_ie='I' then 1 else 0 end) AS interno, cha_tipo_urp, dta_fine, has_children(a.system_id,a.cha_tipo_urp) as has_children, a.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM FROM dpa_corr_globali a WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_RICERCA_ELEMENTO_RUBRICA_SIMPLE
query.value: SELECT system_id, var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr, (case when cha_tipo_ie='I' then 1 else 0 end) AS interno, (select b.var_codice from dpa_el_registri b where b.system_id=a.id_registro) as cod_reg, cha_tipo_urp FROM dpa_corr_globali a WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_RICERCA_ELEMENTI_RUBRICA_MOBILE
query.value: SELECT system_id, var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr, id_people FROM dpa_corr_globali a WHERE cha_tipo_urp='P' and cha_tipo_ie='I' and id_amm= @param2@ and DTA_FINE is null and VAR_COD_RUBRICA != '@param1@' and upper(a.var_desc_corr) like '%@param3@%' and iscorrispondenteinterno(SYSTEM_ID, @param4@) > 0

query.name: S_RICERCA_ELEMENTI_RUBRICA_MOBILE_2
query.value: -- UTENTI SELECT distinct cg_utenti.var_desc_corr AS VAR_DESC_CORR, cg_uo.system_id AS ID_UO, cg_ruoli.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_RUOLO, cg_utenti.CHA_TIPO_URP, cg_utenti.ID_PEOPLE FROM dpa_corr_globali cg_utenti, people p, GROUPS g, peoplegroups pg, dpa_corr_globali cg_ruoli, dpa_corr_globali cg_uo WHERE upper(cg_utenti.var_desc_corr) LIKE '%@param2@%' AND cg_ruoli.id_gruppo = g.system_id and cg_ruoli.DTA_FINE is null AND cg_utenti.cha_tipo_urp = 'P' AND cg_utenti.DTA_FINE is null AND cg_utenti.id_people = p.system_id AND g.system_id = pg.groups_system_id AND p.system_id = pg.people_system_id AND cg_uo.system_id = cg_ruoli.id_uo and cg_uo.DTA_FINE is null AND cg_utenti.ID_AMM = @param1@ AND cg_utenti.CHA_TIPO_IE ='I' AND cg_utenti.VAR_COD_RUBRICA != '@param5@' and iscorrispondenteinterno(cg_utenti.system_id, @param3@) > 0 UNION ALL -- RUOLI SELECT cg_ruoli.VAR_DESC_CORR AS VAR_DESC_CORR, cg_uo.system_id AS ID_UO, cg_ruoli.SYSTEM_ID as ID_RUOLO, cg_ruoli.CHA_TIPO_URP,0 FROM GROUPS g, dpa_corr_globali cg_ruoli, dpa_corr_globali cg_uo WHERE upper(cg_ruoli.var_desc_corr) LIKE '%@param2@%' AND cg_ruoli.id_gruppo = g.system_id AND cg_ruoli.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' and cg_ruoli.DTA_FINE is null AND cg_uo.system_id = cg_ruoli.id_uo and cg_uo.DTA_FINE is null AND cg_ruoli.ID_AMM = @param1@ AND cg_ruoli.CHA_TIPO_IE ='I' and iscorrispondenteinterno(cg_ruoli.SYSTEM_ID, @param3@) > 0 UNION ALL -- Unit organizzative UO SELECT cg_uo.VAR_DESC_CORR AS VAR_DESC_CORR, cg_uo.SYSTEM_ID as ID_UO, 0 as ID_RUOLO, cg_uo.CHA_TIPO_URP , 0 FROM dpa_corr_globali cg_uo WHERE upper(cg_uo.var_desc_corr) LIKE '%@param2@%' AND cg_uo.cha_tipo_urp = 'U' AND cg_uo.ID_AMM = @param1@ AND cg_uo.CHA_TIPO_IE ='I' and cg_uo.DTA_FINE is null and iscorrispondenteinterno(cg_uo.SYSTEM_ID, @param3@) > 0

query.name: S_CHECK_CHILDREN_EXISTENCE
query.value: SELECT a.var_cod_rubrica,has_children(a.system_id,a.cha_tipo_urp) as has_children FROM dpa_corr_globali a where UPPER(a.var_cod_rubrica) in (@param1@) @idAmm@

query.name: S_GET_ROOT_ITEMS
query.value: SELECT var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr, (case when CHA_TIPO_IE='I' then 1 else 0 end) AS interno, cha_tipo_urp,system_id from dpa_corr_globali where id_amm = @id_amm@ and @tipo_ie@ cha_tipo_urp='U' and (id_parent is null or id_parent=0) and dta_fine is null

query.name: S_Ruoli_Utente_Interno
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM dpa_corr_globali u, dpa_corr_globali p, dpa_corr_globali r, dpa_tipo_ruolo b, peoplegroups pg, people e WHERE r.id_tipo_ruolo = b.system_id AND p.cha_tipo_urp = 'P' AND p.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND p.cha_tipo_corr = 'S' AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND r.cha_tipo_corr = 'S' and u.cha_tipo_ie='I' AND u.cha_tipo_urp = 'U' AND e.system_id = p.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id = r.id_gruppo AND pg.people_system_id = p.id_people and r.id_uo=u.system_id and pg.dta_fine is null and @param2@ @param3@

query.name: S_SMISTAMENTO_GET_UO
query.value: SELECT CG.SYSTEM_ID ID, CG.VAR_COD_RUBRICA CODICE_UO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR DESCRIZIONE_UO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG WHERE CG.DTA_FINE is null AND CG.SYSTEM_ID IN ( SELECT S.ID_UO FROM DPA_UO_SMISTAMENTO S WHERE S.ID_REGISTRO=@IDRegistro@ )

query.name: STAMPA_REGISTRI_01
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(P INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT (cast(p.num_proto as nvarchar2(30)) || ' ' || coalesce(VAR_PROTO_EME,'')) as NUM_PROTO, p.num_proto protocollo, to_char(p.dta_proto,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') DATA, to_char(p.dta_annulla,'dd/mm/yyyy') DATA_ANNULLAMENTO, p.cha_tipo_proto CHA_TIPO_PROTO, p.var_prof_oggetto OGGETTO, corrcat(p.system_id, p.cha_tipo_proto) as MITT_DEST, classcat(p.system_id) as FASCICOLI, c.var_impronta as IMPRONTA, c.VAR_IMPRONTA as IMPRONTA_CACHE, CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(p.docnumber) as N_ALLEGATI FROM profile p, components c, versions v WHERE c.docnumber = p.docnumber AND c.version_id = v.version_id AND p.id_registro = @param1@ AND p.cha_tipo_proto IN ('A', 'P', 'I') AND v.VERSION = (SELECT MAX (VERSION) FROM versions WHERE docnumber = p.docnumber AND VERSION <> 0) AND (p.num_proto >= @param2@ and p.num_proto <= @param3@) AND p.num_anno_proto = @param4@ ORDER BY protocollo

query.name: STAMPA_RAPPORTI_01
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(P INDX_PROFILE41) */ DISTINCT p.num_proto NUM_PROTO, to_char(p.dta_proto,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') DATA, to_char(p.dta_annulla,'dd/mm/yyyy') DATA_ANNULLAMENTO, p.cha_tipo_proto CHA_TIPO_PROTO, p.var_prof_oggetto OGGETTO, DescUo(p.id_uo_prot) as DESC_UO, corrcat(p.system_id, p.cha_tipo_proto) as MITT_DEST, classcat(p.system_id) as FASCICOLI, c.var_impronta as IMPRONTA, CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(p.docnumber) as N_ALLEGATI FROM profile p, components c, versions v WHERE c.docnumber = p.docnumber AND c.version_id = v.version_id AND p.id_registro = @param1@ AND p.cha_tipo_proto IN ('A', 'P', 'I') and v.version=(select max(version) from versions where docnumber=p.docnumber and version <> 0) @param2@ order by NUM_PROTO

query.name: S_STAMPA_BUSTE
query.value: SELECT c.VAR_DESC_CORR,dap.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST,ddg.VAR_INDIRIZZO,ddg.VAR_CAP,ddg.VAR_CITTA,ddg.VAR_PROVINCIA,P.ID_REGISTRO, dr.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI c, DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR dap,DPA_DETT_GLOBALI ddg,PROFILE P,DPA_EL_REGISTRI dr WHERE dap.ID_MITT_DEST=c.SYSTEM_ID AND dr.SYSTEM_ID = P.ID_REGISTRO AND ddg.ID_CORR_GLOBALI(+)=c.SYSTEM_ID AND p.SYSTEM_ID=dap.ID_PROFILE AND dap.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST IN ('D','C') and P.CHA_TIPO_PROTO='P' and P.CHA_DA_PROTO='0' and P.DTA_ANNULLA is null and P.ID_REGISTRO=@param1@ @param2@

query.name: S_DB_DATE
query.value: SELECT to_char(sysdate,'HH24:MI:SS') FROM DUAL

query.name: S_RUOLI_BY_UO
query.value: select u.var_cod_rubrica as COD_UO, r.var_cod_rubrica as COD_RUOLO from dpa_corr_globali u, dpa_corr_globali r where r.id_uo = u.system_id and u.cha_tipo_urp='U' and u.id_amm = @id_amm@ and r.id_amm = @id_amm@ and u.dta_fine is null and r.dta_fine is null and r.cha_riferimento = '1' order by u.var_cod_rubrica

query.name: S_RUOLI_BY_UTENTE
query.value: select u.var_cod_rubrica as COD_UTENTE, r.var_cod_rubrica as COD_RUOLO, r.var_desc_corr as DESC_RUOLO from dpa_corr_globali u, dpa_corr_globali r, people p, peoplegroups pg where r.id_gruppo = pg.groups_system_id and u.id_people = p.system_id and p.system_id = pg.people_system_id and u.cha_tipo_urp='P' and u.dta_fine is null and r.dta_fine is null and pg.dta_fine is null order by u.var_cod_rubrica

query.name: S_REGISTRI_BY_RUOLO
query.value: select r.var_cod_rubrica as COD_RUOLO, rr.id_registro as ID_REGISTRO from dpa_corr_globali r, dpa_l_ruolo_reg rr where r.id_amm = @id_amm@ and r.dta_fine is null and rr.id_ruolo_in_uo = r.system_id order by r.var_cod_rubrica, rr.id_registro

query.name: AMM_S_GET_NODI_RUOLO_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT C.id_gruppo AS ID_RUOLO, C.var_codice AS CODICE_RUOLO, C.var_desc_corr AS DESCRIZIONE_RUOLO, S.personorgroup AS GRUPPOASSOCIATO FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C , (SELECT personorgroup FROM SECURITY WHERE thing = @idNodoTitolario@ AND accessrights IN(255,47,63)) S,DPA_L_RUOLO_REG RR WHERE RR.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO=C.system_id AND C.id_gruppo = S.personorgroup (+) And RR.ID_REGISTRO @idRegistro@ AND C.DTA_FINE IS NULL ORDER BY C.var_desc_corr

query.name: AMM_D_VISIBILITA_NODO_RUOLI
query.value: DELETE FROM SECURITY WHERE (THING=@param1@ AND PERSONORGROUP=@param2@)

query.name: AMM_S_GET_INFO_NODO_TITOLARIO_WITH_CHILDS
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=@idTitolario@ OR P.ID_PARENT IN ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=@idTitolario@ OR P.ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ ) OR (P.SYSTEM_ID=@idParentTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='T')

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS PC WHERE PC.PROJECT_ID=@idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_U_NODO_TITOLARIO
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET DESCRIPTION=@Descrizione@, CHA_RW=@CreazioneFascicoliAbilitata@, ID_REGISTRO=@IDRegistro@, NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE=@NumeroMesiConservazione@, ID_TIPO_FASC=@idTipoFascicolo@, CHA_BLOCCA_FASC = '@bloccaFascicolo@', VAR_NOTE = '@note@', CHA_BLOCCA_FIGLI = '@bloccaFigli@', CHA_CONTA_PROT_TIT = '@contatoreAttivo@', CHA_CONSENTI_CLASS = '@bloccaClass@' @numProtTit@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@IDTitolario@

query.name: AMM_U_NODO_TITOLARIO_FASCICOLO_GENERALE
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET DESCRIPTION=@Descrizione@, CHA_RW=@CreazioneFascicoliAbilitata@, ID_REGISTRO=@IDRegistro@, NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE=@NumeroMesiConservazione@, ID_TIPO_FASC=@idTipoFascicolo@, CHA_BLOCCA_FASC = '@bloccaFascicolo@', CHA_BLOCCA_FIGLI = '@bloccaFigli@', CHA_CONTA_PROT_TIT = '@contatoreAttivo@', CHA_CONSENTI_CLASS = '@bloccaClass@' @numProtTit@ WHERE ID_PARENT=@IDTitolario@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='G'

query.name: AMM_S_GET_ID_TITOLARIO_PADRE
query.value: SELECT P.ID_PARENT, P.NUM_LIVELLO FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=@idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_EXIST_RUOLO_IN_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(S.THING) FROM SECURITY S WHERE S.THING=@idTitolario@ AND PERSONORGROUP=@idGruppo@

query.name: AMM_EXIST_RUOLO_IN_TITOLARIO_FIGLIO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(S.THING) FROM SECURITY S WHERE S.THING IN ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='T' ) AND PERSONORGROUP=@idGruppo@

query.name: AMM_G_GET_SYSTEM_ID_FASCICOLI_PROCEDIMENTALI_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='P'

query.name: AMM_S_IS_RUOLO_OWNER_FASCICOLI_PROCEDIMENTALI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SECURITY S WHERE S.THING=@idFascicoloProc@ AND S.PERSONORGROUP=@idRuolo@ AND S.ACCESSRIGHTS=255

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_TITOLARIO_IN_SECURITY
query.value: DELETE FROM SECURITY WHERE THING=@idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_NODO_TITOLARIO
query.value: DELETE FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_RUOLI_IN_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(S.THING) FROM SECURITY S, GROUPS G WHERE S.THING=@idTitolario@ AND S.PERSONORGROUP=G.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: AMM_S_CHECK_ALTRI_NODI_SU_ALTRI_REGISTRI
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM PROJECT WHERE cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND UPPER(var_codice) = UPPER('@param1@') AND id_registro != (SELECT id_registro FROM PROJECT WHERE system_id = @param2@) AND id_amm = (SELECT id_amm FROM PROJECT WHERE system_id = @param2@)

query.name: AMM_S_CHECK_ALTRI_NODI_SU_TUTTI_REGISTRI
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM PROJECT WHERE cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND UPPER(var_codice) = UPPER('@param1@') AND id_amm = (select system_id from dpa_amministra where var_codice_amm = '@param2@') AND ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_RUOLI_IN_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT S.THING, S.PERSONORGROUP, S.ACCESSRIGHTS, S.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO FROM SECURITY S, GROUPS G WHERE S.THING=@idTitolario@ AND S.PERSONORGROUP=G.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: AMM_I_NODO_TITOLARIO
AMM_S_GET_ID_REGISTRO_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT P.ID_REGISTRO FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=@idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_S_NODO_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id as IDRECORD, a.var_codice as CODICE, a.description as DESCRIZIONE, a.num_livello as LIVELLO, a.id_registro as REGISTRO, a.id_parent as IDPARENT, a.var_cod_liv1 as CODLIV, cha_rw as RW,(SELECT count(b.system_id) FROM PROJECT b WHERE b.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND b.id_amm = @idAmministrazione@ AND b.id_parent = a.system_id ) as FIGLIO, a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE as NUMMESICONSERVAZIONE, a.ID_TIPO_FASC, a.CHA_BLOCCA_FASC, a.ID_TITOLARIO, a.CHA_STATO, a.DTA_ATTIVAZIONE, a.DTA_CESSAZIONE, a.VAR_NOTE, a.CHA_BLOCCA_FIGLI, a.CHA_CONTA_PROT_TIT, a.NUM_PROT_TIT, a.CHA_CONSENTI_CLASS FROM PROJECT a WHERE a.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND a.id_amm = @idAmministrazione@ AND a.id_parent = @idParentTitolario@ @param1@ ORDER BY a.var_cod_liv1

query.name: AMM_S_EXIST_CODICE_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE UPPER(VAR_CODICE) = UPPER('@codiceTitolario@') AND ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='T' AND (ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR ID_REGISTRO = @idRegistro@) AND ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_S_IS_RUOLO_OWNER_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(S.THING) FROM SECURITY S, PROJECT_COMPONENTS PC WHERE S.THING=PC.LINK AND S.PERSONORGROUP IN ( SELECT PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLEGROUPS WHERE GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID=@idRuolo@ ) AND PC.PROJECT_ID= ( SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_PARENT= (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='G') AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C' ) AND PC.TYPE='D'

query.name: AMM_S_GET_ID_FASCICOLO_FOLDER_FROM_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID, P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ FROM PROJECT P WHERE (P.ID_PARENT= ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND P.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='G' ) AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C' ) OR P.SYSTEM_ID = ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND P.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='G' )

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_SOTTOFASCICOLI_GENERALE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(P.SYSTEM_ID) FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT= ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT= ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND P.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='G' ) AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C' )

query.name: AMM_S_IS_RUOLO_OWNER_SOTTOFASCICOLI_GENERALE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(S.THING) FROM SECURITY S WHERE S.THING IN ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C' AND P.ID_FASCICOLO= ( SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT P WHERE P.ID_PARENT=@idTitolario@ AND P.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='F' AND P.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO='G' ) AND P.DESCRIPTION!='Root Folder' ) AND S.PERSONORGROUP=@idRuolo@ AND S.ACCESSRIGHTS=255 AND S.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO='P'

query.name: S_GET_DPA_UO_REG
query.value: select id_uo from dpa_uo_reg where id_registro=@id_reg@ and id_uo = (select system_id from dpa_corr_globali where upper(var_cod_rubrica)=upper('@cod_uo@') and cha_tipo_urp='U' and id_amm=@id_amm@)

query.name: S_GET_UO_IN_AOO
query.value: select dpa_corr_globali.var_cod_rubrica as CODICE, dpa_corr_globali.system_id as IDCORRGLOBALE, dpa_corr_globali.var_desc_corr as DESCRIZIONE from dpa_corr_globali, dpa_uo_reg where dpa_uo_reg.id_registro = @id_reg@ and dpa_uo_reg.id_uo = dpa_corr_globali.system_id order by var_cod_rubrica, var_desc_corr asc

query.name: S_DPA_L_RUOLO_REG
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_REGISTRO =@id_reg@ and ID_RUOLO_IN_UO =@id_ruolo@

query.name: S_GET_SYSTEMID_TRASMISSIONI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: select count(t.system_id) from dpa_trasmissione t, profile p where p.system_id=t.id_profile and t.id_profile=@idProfile@ and t.dta_invio is not null

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_TRASMISSIONI_FASCICOLO
query.value: select count(t.system_id) from dpa_trasmissione t, project p where p.system_id=t.ID_PROJECT and t.id_project = @idProject@ and t.dta_invio is not null

query.name: S_DOCUMENTO_CHECK_USER_VISIBILITY
query.value: SELECT COUNT(A.SYSTEM_ID) FROM PROFILE A, SECURITY B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.THING AND B.ACCESSRIGHTS >= 0 AND (B.PERSONORGROUP=@idPeople@ OR B.PERSONORGROUP=@idGroup@) AND A.DOCNUMBER=@docNumber@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_REGISTRI_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: SELECT R.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_REGISTRO, R.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, R.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO AS DESCRIZIONE, R.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM AS CODICE_AMMINISTRAZIONE, R.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO AS EMAIL, R.VAR_USER_MAIL AS USER_EMAIL, R.VAR_PWD_MAIL AS PWD_EMAIL, R.VAR_SERVER_SMTP AS SERVER_SMTP, R.NUM_PORTA_SMTP AS PORTA_SMTP, R.VAR_SERVER_POP AS SERVER_POP, R.NUM_PORTA_POP AS PORTA_POP, R.CHA_AUTOMATICO AS APERTURA_AUTOMATICA, R.VAR_USER_SMTP AS USER_SMTP, R.VAR_PWD_SMTP AS PWD_SMTP, R.ID_PEOPLE_AOO, R.ID_RUOLO_AOO, R.CHA_SMTP_SSL,R.CHA_POP_SSL,R.CHA_SMTP_STA,R.CHA_AUTO_INTEROP, R.CHA_RF, R.ID_AOO_COLLEGATA, R.CHA_DISABILITATO, R.DIRITTO_RUOLO_AOO, R.CHA_STATO AS STATO, R.ID_RUOLO_RESP, R.VAR_SERVER_IMAP, R.NUM_PORTA_IMAP, R.VAR_TIPO_CONNESSIONE, R.VAR_INBOX_IMAP, R.VAR_BOX_MAIL_ELABORATE, R.VAR_MAIL_NON_ELABORATE, R.CHA_IMAP_SSL, R.VAR_SOLO_MAIL_PEC, R.CHA_RICEVUTA_PEC, R.INVIO_RICEVUTA_MANUALE, R.VAR_PREG, R.ANNO_PREG FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI R, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE R.ID_AMM=A.SYSTEM_ID AND R.ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@ @chaRF@ ORDER BY R.VAR_CODICE ASC

query.name: AMM_S_GET_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT R.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_REGISTRO, R.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, R.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO AS DESCRIZIONE, R.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM AS CODICE_AMMINISTRAZIONE, R.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO AS EMAIL, R.VAR_USER_MAIL AS USER_EMAIL, R.VAR_PWD_MAIL AS PWD_EMAIL, R.VAR_SERVER_SMTP AS SERVER_SMTP, R.NUM_PORTA_SMTP AS PORTA_SMTP, R.VAR_SERVER_POP AS SERVER_POP, R.NUM_PORTA_POP AS PORTA_POP, R.CHA_AUTOMATICO AS APERTURA_AUTOMATICA, R.VAR_USER_SMTP AS USER_SMTP, R.VAR_PWD_SMTP AS PWD_SMTP, R.ID_PEOPLE_AOO, R.ID_RUOLO_AOO,R.CHA_SMTP_SSL,R.CHA_POP_SSL,R.cha_smtp_sta,r.cha_auto_interop, R.CHA_RF, R.ID_AOO_COLLEGATA, R.CHA_DISABILITATO, R.DIRITTO_RUOLO_AOO, R.CHA_STATO AS STATO, R.ID_RUOLO_RESP, R.VAR_SERVER_IMAP, R.NUM_PORTA_IMAP, R.VAR_TIPO_CONNESSIONE, R.VAR_INBOX_IMAP, R.VAR_BOX_MAIL_ELABORATE, R.VAR_MAIL_NON_ELABORATE, R.CHA_IMAP_SSL, R.VAR_SOLO_MAIL_PEC, R.CHA_RICEVUTA_PEC, R.INVIO_RICEVUTA_MANUALE, R.VAR_PREG, R.ANNO_PREG FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI R, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE R.ID_AMM=A.SYSTEM_ID AND R.SYSTEM_ID=@idRegistro@ ORDER BY R.VAR_CODICE ASC

query.name: AMM_I_INSERT_REGISTRO
AMM_I_INSERT_LINK_REGISTRO_PROTOCOLLO
AMM_S_CHECK_UNIQUE_CODICE_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(R.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI R WHERE UPPER(R.VAR_CODICE)=UPPER(@codiceRegistro@) AND R.ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@

query.name: AMM_U_UPDATE_REGISTRO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_EL_REGISTRI SET VAR_DESC_REGISTRO=@descrizione@, VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO=@emailRegistro@, VAR_USER_MAIL=@emailUserID@, VAR_PWD_MAIL=@emailPassword@, VAR_SERVER_SMTP=@serverSMTP@, NUM_PORTA_SMTP=@portaSMTP@, VAR_SERVER_POP=@serverPOP@, NUM_PORTA_POP=@portaPOP@, CHA_AUTOMATICO=@aperturaAutomatica@, VAR_USER_SMTP=@userSMTP@, VAR_PWD_SMTP=@passwordSMTP@, ID_RUOLO_AOO=@id_ruolo_aoo@, ID_PEOPLE_AOO=@id_people_aoo@, CHA_SMTP_SSL=@cha_smtp_ssl@, CHA_POP_SSL=@cha_pop_ssl@, CHA_SMTP_STA=@cha_smtp_sta@, CHA_AUTO_INTEROP = @autoInterop@, CHA_RF = @chaRF@, ID_AOO_COLLEGATA = @idAooCollegata@, ID_RUOLO_RESP = @idRuoloResp@, VAR_SERVER_IMAP = @VAR_SERVER_IMAP@, NUM_PORTA_IMAP = @NUM_PORTA_IMAP@, VAR_TIPO_CONNESSIONE = @VAR_TIPO_CONNESSIONE@, VAR_INBOX_IMAP = @VAR_INBOX_IMAP@, VAR_BOX_MAIL_ELABORATE = @VAR_BOX_MAIL_ELABORATE@, VAR_MAIL_NON_ELABORATE = @VAR_MAIL_NON_ELABORATE@, CHA_IMAP_SSL = @CHA_IMAP_SSL@, INVIO_RICEVUTA_MANUALE = @invioRicevutaManuale@, VAR_SOLO_MAIL_PEC = @VAR_SOLO_MAIL_PEC@, CHA_RICEVUTA_PEC = @CHA_RICEVUTA_PEC@, VAR_PREG = @VAR_PREG@, ANNO_PREG = @ANNO_PREG@ @chaDisabilitato@ @chaStato@ @dirittoRuoloAOO@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_REGISTRO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_PROTOCOLLI_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@idRegistro@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_RUOLI_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@idRegistro@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_FASCICOLI_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@idRegistro@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_CODICE_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT R.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI R WHERE R.SYSTEM_ID=@idRegistro@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_REGISTRO_REG_PROTO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_REG_PROTO WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@idRegistro@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_REGISTRO_RUOLO_REG
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@idRegistro@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT TR.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TIPO_RUOLO, TR.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, TR.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, TR.VAR_DESC_RUOLO AS DESCRIZIONE, TR.NUM_LIVELLO AS LIVELLO FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR WHERE TR.SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_I_INSERT_TIPO_RUOLO
AMM_U_UPDATE_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TIPO_RUOLO SET VAR_DESC_RUOLO=@descrizione@, NUM_LIVELLO=@livello@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_S_CHECK_UNIQUE_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR WHERE VAR_CODICE=@codice@ AND TR.ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_RUOLI_IN_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(CG.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG WHERE CG.CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND ID_TIPO_RUOLO=@idTipoRuolo@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_CODICE_TIPO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT TR.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE FROM DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR WHERE TR.SYSTEM_ID=@idTipoRuolo@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_TIPI_FUNZIONE
query.value: SELECT TF.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, TF.VAR_COD_TIPO AS CODICE, TF.VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN AS DESCRIZIONE, TF.CHA_VIS AS CHA_VIS FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE TF WHERE TF.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ ORDER BY TF.VAR_COD_TIPO

query.name: AMM_S_GET_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: SELECT TF.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, TF.VAR_COD_TIPO AS CODICE, TF.VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN AS DESCRIZIONE, TF.CHA_VIS AS CHA_VIS FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE TF WHERE TF.SYSTEM_ID=@idTipoFunzione@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI_ELEMENTARI
query.value: SELECT COD_FUNZIONE AS CODICE, VAR_DESC_FUNZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE, CHA_TIPO_FUNZ AS TIPO_FUNZIONE FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI WHERE (CHA_TIPO_FUNZ NOT IN ('E') OR CHA_TIPO_FUNZ IS NULL) AND DISABLED = 'N'

query.name: AMM_S_GET_FUNZIONI_ELEMENTARI_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: SELECT AF.CHA_TIPO_FUNZ AS TIPO_FUNZIONE, AF.COD_FUNZIONE AS CODICE, AF.VAR_DESC_FUNZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE, FA.ID AS ID_ASSOCIAZIONE, FA.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE AS ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE, CASE WHEN FA.CODICE_ASSOCIATO IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS ASSOCIATO FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI AF, ( SELECT F.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, F.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE AS ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE, F.COD_FUNZIONE AS CODICE_ASSOCIATO FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE TF, DPA_FUNZIONI F, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI AF2 WHERE TF.SYSTEM_ID=F.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE AND F.COD_FUNZIONE=AF2.COD_FUNZIONE AND TF.SYSTEM_ID=@idTipoFunzione@ ) FA WHERE AF.COD_FUNZIONE=FA.CODICE_ASSOCIATO (+) AND (AF.CHA_TIPO_FUNZ NOT IN ('E') OR AF.CHA_TIPO_FUNZ IS NULL) AND AF.DISABLED = 'N' ORDER BY AF.COD_FUNZIONE

query.name: AMM_S_GET_FUNZIONE_ELEMENTARE
query.value: SELECT F.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, F.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE AS ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE, AF.COD_FUNZIONE AS CODICE, AF.VAR_DESC_FUNZIONE, AF.CHA_TIPO_FUNZ AS TIPO_FUNZIONE FROM DPA_FUNZIONI F, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI AF WHERE F.COD_FUNZIONE=AF.COD_FUNZIONE AND F.SYSTEM_ID=@idFunzione@ AND AF.DISABLED = 'N'

query.name: AMM_S_GET_FUNZIONE_ELEMENTARE_DA_CODICE
query.value: SELECT F.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, F.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE AS ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE, AF.COD_FUNZIONE AS CODICE, AF.VAR_DESC_FUNZIONE, AF.CHA_TIPO_FUNZ AS TIPO_FUNZIONE FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE TF, DPA_FUNZIONI F, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_FUNZIONI AF WHERE TF.SYSTEM_ID=F.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE AND F.COD_FUNZIONE=AF.COD_FUNZIONE AND TF.SYSTEM_ID=@idTipoFunzione@ AND AF.COD_FUNZIONE=@codiceFunzione@ AND AF.DISABLED = 'N' ORDER BY F.COD_FUNZIONE ASC

query.name: AMM_I_INSERT_FUNZIONE_ELEMENTARE
AMM_D_DELETE_FUNZIONE_ELEMENTARE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_FUNZIONI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_I_INSERT_TIPO_FUNZIONE
AMM_S_COUNT_FUNZ_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: select count(*) from dpa_funzioni f where f.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE = ( select system_id from dpa_tipo_funzione tf where tf.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ and upper(tf.VAR_COD_TIPO) = '@nomeTipo@')

query.name: AMM_U_UPDATE_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE SET VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN='@descrizione@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_FUNZIONI_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_FUNZIONI WHERE ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE=@idTipoFunzione@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_RUOLI_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(R.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO R WHERE ID_TIPO_FUNZ=@idTipoFunzione@

query.name: AMM_S_CONTAINS_CODICE_TIPO_FUNZIONE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(F.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE F WHERE UPPER(F.VAR_COD_TIPO)=UPPER('@codiceTipoFunzione@') AND ID_AMM=@idAmm@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_RAGIONI_TRASMISSIONE_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: SELECT RT.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, RT.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE AS CODICE, RT.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE AS TIPO, RT.CHA_VIS AS VISIBILITA, RT.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI AS TIPO_DIRITTO, RT.CHA_TIPO_DEST AS TIPO_DESTINATARIO, RT.CHA_RISPOSTA AS RISPOSTA, RT.VAR_NOTE AS DESCRIZIONE, RT.CHA_EREDITA AS EREDITA, RT.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, RT.CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA AS TIPO_RISPOSTA, RT.VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM AS NOTIFICA, A1.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE_TO, A2.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE_CC, RT.VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_DOC, RT.VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_FASC, RT.CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, RT.CHA_RAG_SISTEMA, RT.CHA_MANTIENI_LETT FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM RT, DPA_AMMINISTRA A1, DPA_AMMINISTRA A2 WHERE RT.ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@ AND RT.SYSTEM_ID=A1.ID_RAGIONE_TO (+) AND RT.SYSTEM_ID=A2.ID_RAGIONE_CC (+) ORDER BY RT.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE ASC

query.name: AMM_S_GET_RAGIONI_TRASMISSIONE_ANAGRAFICA
query.value: SELECT RT.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, RT.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE AS CODICE, RT.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE AS TIPO, RT.CHA_VIS AS VISIBILITA, RT.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI AS TIPO_DIRITTO, RT.CHA_TIPO_DEST AS TIPO_DESTINATARIO, RT.CHA_RISPOSTA AS RISPOSTA, RT.VAR_NOTE AS DESCRIZIONE, RT.CHA_EREDITA AS EREDITA, RT.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, RT.CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA AS TIPO_RISPOSTA, RT.VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM AS NOTIFICA, '' AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE_TO, '' AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE_CC, RT.CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, RT.CHA_RAG_SISTEMA, RT.CHA_MANTIENI_LETT FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM RT WHERE RT.ID_AMM IS NULL ORDER BY RT.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE ASC

query.name: AMM_S_GET_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: SELECT RT.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, RT.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE AS CODICE, RT.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE AS TIPO, RT.CHA_VIS AS VISIBILITA, RT.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI AS TIPO_DIRITTO, RT.CHA_TIPO_DEST AS TIPO_DESTINATARIO, RT.CHA_RISPOSTA AS RISPOSTA, RT.VAR_NOTE AS DESCRIZIONE, RT.CHA_EREDITA AS EREDITA, RT.ID_AMM AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, RT.CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA AS TIPO_RISPOSTA, RT.VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM AS NOTIFICA, A1.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE_TO, A2.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE_CC, RT.VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_DOC, RT.VAR_TESTO_MSG_NOTIFICA_FASC, RT.CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, RT.CHA_RAG_SISTEMA, RT.CHA_MANTIENI_LETT FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM RT, DPA_AMMINISTRA A1, DPA_AMMINISTRA A2 WHERE RT.SYSTEM_ID=A1.ID_RAGIONE_TO (+) AND RT.SYSTEM_ID=A2.ID_RAGIONE_CC (+) AND RT.SYSTEM_ID=@idRagione@

query.name: AMM_I_INSERT_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM ( @colSystemID@ VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_VIS, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_TIPO_DEST, CHA_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, ID_AMM, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, CHA_MANTIENI_LETT ) VALUES ( @systemID@ '@codiceRagione@', '@tipoRagione@', '@visibile@', '@tipoDiritto@', '@tipoDestinatario@', '@risposta@', '@descrizione@', '@eredita@', '@tipoRisposta@', @idAmministrazione@, @notifica@, '@cedeDiritti@', @mantieniLettura@ )

query.name: AMM_U_UPDATE_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM SET CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE='@tipoRagione@', CHA_VIS='@visibile@', CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI='@tipoDiritto@', CHA_TIPO_DEST='@tipoDestinatario@', CHA_RISPOSTA='@risposta@', VAR_NOTE='@descrizione@', CHA_EREDITA='@eredita@', CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA='@tipoRisposta@', VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM=@notifica@, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI='@cedeDiritti@', CHA_MANTIENI_LETT = @mantieniLettura@ WHERE VAR_DESC_RAGIONE='@codiceRagione@' AND ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idRagione@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_RAGIONI_TRASMISSE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(T.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA T WHERE T.ID_RAGIONE=@idRagione@

query.name: AMM_S_CONTAINS_CODICE_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(RT.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM RT WHERE UPPER(RT.VAR_DESC_RAGIONE)=UPPER('@codiceRagione@') AND RT.ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@

query.name: AMM_S_IS_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE_DEFAULT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(A.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE A.ID_RAGIONE_TO=@idRagione@ OR A.ID_RAGIONE_CC=@idRagione@ OR A.ID_RAGIONE_REFERENTE=@idRagione@ OR A.ID_RAGIONE_COMPETENZA=@idRagione@ OR A.ID_RAGIONE_CONOSCENZA=@idRagione@

query.name: I_NEW_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_AMMINISTRA (@param1@ VAR_CODICE_AMM, VAR_DESC_AMM, VAR_LIBRERIA, VAR_SMTP, NUM_PORTA_SMTP, VAR_FORMATO_SEGNATURA, VAR_FORMATO_FASCICOLATURA, VAR_DOMINIO, VAR_USER_SMTP, VAR_PWD_SMTP, NUM_GG_PERM_TODOLIST, CHA_ATTIVA_GG_PERM_TODOLIST, ID_RAGIONE_TO, ID_RAGIONE_CC,CHA_SMTP_SSL,CHA_SMTP_STA,FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS, ID_RAGIONE_COMPETENZA, ID_RAGIONE_CONOSCENZA, VAR_FORMATO_TIMBRO, ID_CARAT_DF, ID_COLORE_DF, ID_POS_DF, ORIENTAMENTO, TIPO_ROTAZ, VAR_FORMATO_DOMINIO, FONTCOLOR, PULS_COLOR, NUM_RECORD, ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR, CSS, VAR_FORMATO_PROT_TIT, SPEDIZIONE_AUTO_DOC, AVVISA_SPEDIZIONE_DOC, TIPO_DOC_OBBL, IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT, CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI, SMART_CLIENT_PDF_CONV_ON_SCAN, ID_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA, TRASMISSIONE_AUTO_DOC ) VALUES (@param2@)

query.name: U_AMMINISTRAZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AMMINISTRA SET VAR_DESC_AMM = @param1@, VAR_SMTP = @param2@, NUM_PORTA_SMTP = @param3@, VAR_FORMATO_SEGNATURA = @param4@, VAR_FORMATO_FASCICOLATURA = @param5@, VAR_DOMINIO = @param6@, VAR_USER_SMTP = @param7@, VAR_PWD_SMTP = @param8@, ID_RAGIONE_TO = @param9@, ID_RAGIONE_CC = @param10@, NUM_GG_PERM_TODOLIST = @param11@, CHA_ATTIVA_GG_PERM_TODOLIST = @param12@, CHA_SMTP_SSL = @param14@, CHA_SMTP_STA = @param15@, ID_RAGIONE_COMPETENZA = @param17@, ID_RAGIONE_CONOSCENZA = @param18@, FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS = @param16@, VAR_FORMATO_TIMBRO = @param19@, ID_CARAT_DF = @param20@, ID_COLORE_DF = @param21@, ID_POS_DF = @param22@, ORIENTAMENTO = @param23@, TIPO_ROTAZ = @param24@, VAR_FORMATO_DOMINIO = @param25@, ID_CLIENT_MODEL_PROCESSOR = @param26@, VAR_FORMATO_PROT_TIT = @param27@, SPEDIZIONE_AUTO_DOC=@spedizioneAutoDoc@, AVVISA_SPEDIZIONE_DOC=@avvisaSpedizioneDoc@, TIPO_DOC_OBBL=@tipoDocObbl@, CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI='@cha_tipo_componenti@', IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT='@isEnabledSmartClient@', SMART_CLIENT_PDF_CONV_ON_SCAN='@smartClientPdfConvOnScan@', TRASMISSIONE_AUTO_DOC=@trasmissioneAutoDoc@, ID_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA='@ID_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @sys_id@

query.name: I_RAG_TRASM_NEW_AMM
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM (@param1@ VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_VIS, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_TIPO_DEST, CHA_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, ID_AMM, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, CHA_RAG_SISTEMA) SELECT @param2@ VAR_DESC_RAGIONE, CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE, CHA_VIS, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTI, CHA_TIPO_DEST, CHA_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTE, CHA_EREDITA, @param3@, CHA_TIPO_RISPOSTA, VAR_NOTIFICA_TRASM, 'N', CHA_RAG_SISTEMA FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE ID_AMM IS NULL

query.name: U_RAG_TRASM_NEW_AMM
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AMMINISTRA SET @nomecampo@ = (SELECT system_id FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE ID_AMM = @idamm@ AND VAR_DESC_RAGIONE = (SELECT var_desc_ragione FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE system_id = @idToCc@)) WHERE system_id = @idamm@

query.name: AMM_CAN_DELETE_AMM
query.value: select count(system_id) from profile where id_people_prot in (select system_id from people where id_amm = @idAmm@)

query.name: PD_AGGIORNA_DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM
query.value: UPDATE DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM SET Descrizione = '@descrizioneOggettoCustom@', Orizzontale_Verticale = '@orizzontaleVerticaleOggettoCustom@', Campo_Obbligatorio = '@campoObbligatorioOggettoCustom@', Multilinea = '@multilineaOggettoCustom@', Numero_Di_Linee ='@numeroLineeOggettoCustom@', Numero_Di_Caratteri ='@numeroCaratteriOggettoCustom@', Campo_Di_Ricerca ='@campoRicercaOggettoCustom@', Reset_Anno = '@Reset_Anno@', Formato_Contatore = '@Formato_Contatore@', ID_R_DEFAULT = @ID_R_DEFAULT@, RICERCA_CORR = '@RICERCA_CORR@', CAMPO_COMUNE = @CAMPO_COMUNE@, CHA_TIPO_TAR = '@tipoContatore@', CONTA_DOPO = @contaDopo@, REPERTORIO = @repertorio@, DA_VISUALIZZARE_RICERCA = @da_visualizzare_ricerca@, FORMATO_ORA = '@formatoOra@', TIPO_LINK = '@TIPO_LINK@', TIPO_OBJ_LINK = '@TIPO_OBJ_LINK@', MODULO_SOTTOCONTATORE = @moduloSottocontatore@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_AGGIORNA_DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC SET Descrizione = '@descrizioneOggettoCustom@', Orizzontale_Verticale = '@orizzontaleVerticaleOggettoCustom@', Campo_Obbligatorio = '@campoObbligatorioOggettoCustom@', Multilinea = '@multilineaOggettoCustom@', Numero_Di_Linee ='@numeroLineeOggettoCustom@', Numero_Di_Caratteri ='@numeroCaratteriOggettoCustom@', Campo_Di_Ricerca ='@campoRicercaOggettoCustom@', Reset_Anno = '@Reset_Anno@', Formato_Contatore = '@Formato_Contatore@', ID_R_DEFAULT = @ID_R_DEFAULT@, RICERCA_CORR = '@RICERCA_CORR@', CAMPO_COMUNE = @CAMPO_COMUNE@, CHA_TIPO_TAR = '@tipoContatore@', CONTA_DOPO = @contaDopo@, REPERTORIO = @repertorio@, DA_VISUALIZZARE_RICERCA = @da_visualizzare_ricerca@, FORMATO_ORA = '@formatoOra@', TIPO_LINK = '@TIPO_LINK@', TIPO_OBJ_LINK = '@TIPO_OBJ_LINK@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_UPDATE_SCADENZE

query.name: PD_SYSTEM_ID_OGGETTI_CUSTOM
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_OGGETTO), DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP WHERE DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER IS NULL ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_SYSTEM_ID_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_OGGETTO), DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC WHERE DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT IS NULL ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_SYSTEM_ID_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_1
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_OGGETTO), DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP WHERE DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER = '@docNumber@' ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_SYSTEM_ID_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_1_FASC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_OGGETTO), DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC WHERE DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT = '@idProject@' ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_SYSTEM_ID_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_2
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_OGGETTO), DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP WHERE DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER IS NULL ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_GET_OGGETTI_CUSTOM
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP WHERE DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP.ID_OGG_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_GET_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC WHERE DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_GET_VALORE_DB_OGGETTO_CUSTOM_1

query.name: PD_GET_VALORE_DB_OGGETTO_CUSTOM_1_FASC
query.value: SELECT Valore_Oggetto_Db, Anno, ID_AOO_RF,CODICE_DB,MANUAL_INSERT FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC WHERE ID_OGGETTO = @idOggettoCustom@ AND Id_Project = '@idProject@'

query.name: PD_GET_DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_VALORI
