query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_STATO IS NULL AND ID_DIAGRAMMA IS NULL AND ID_TIPO_DOC = @idTipoDoc@

query.name: DS_DISASSOCIA_TIPO_DOC_DIAGRAMMA_2
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_STATO IS NULL AND ID_MOD_TRASM IS NOT NULL AND ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_TIPO_DOC = @idTipoDoc@

query.name: DS_INS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_DOC_DIAGRAMMA_1
DS_INS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_DOC_DIAGRAMMA_2
DS_DISASSOCIA_TIPO_DOC_DIAGRAMMA_3
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_TIPO_DOC = @idTipoDoc@ AND ID_STATO = @idStato@

query.name: DS_INS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_DOC_DIAGRAMMA_3
DS_IS_STATO_TRASM_AUTO
query.value: SELECT ID_MOD_TRASM, TRASM_AUT FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_STATO = @idStato@ AND ID_TIPO_DOC = @idTemplate@

query.name: DS_UPDATE_STATI_AUTOMATICI
query.value: UPDATE DPA_PASSI SET ID_STATO_AUTO = @id_stato_automatico@, DESC_STATO_AUTO = '@desc_stato_automatico@' WHERE ID_STATO = @id_stato_padre@

query.name: DS_DEL_TRASM_STORICO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TRASM_DIAGR WHERE ID_STATO = @idStato@ AND DOC_NUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: DS_GET_DPA_DIAGRAMMI_DOC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_STATO) FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI, DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES, DPA_STATI WHERE DPA_DIAGRAMMI.DOC_NUMBER = DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.DOC_NUMBER AND DPA_STATI.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_DIAGRAMMI.ID_STATO AND DPA_STATI.STATO_FINALE <> 1 AND DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_DIAGRAMMI.ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@

query.name: DS_INS_TRASM_STORICO
DS_GET_ID_TRASM_DIAGR
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASM FROM DPA_TRASM_DIAGR WHERE DOC_NUMBER = @docNumber@ AND ID_STATO = @idStato@

query.name: DS_GET_TRASM_DIAGR_AR
query.value: SELECT DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_ACCETTATA AS ACCETTATA FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_RAGIONE = DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TRASMISSIONE.system_id = DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.system_id = DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND DPA_TRASMISSIONE.SYSTEM_ID = @idTrasmissione@

query.name: DS_GET_TRASM_DIAGR_AR_1
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM WHERE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_RAGIONE = DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TRASMISSIONE.system_id = DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.system_id = DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' AND DPA_TRASMISSIONE.SYSTEM_ID = @idTrasmissione@ AND (CHA_ACCETTATA = '0' AND CHA_VALIDA='1')

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM
query.value: select * from dpa_modelli_trasm mod where mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '1' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and not exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm) ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM_1
query.value: select mod.* from dpa_modelli_trasm mod, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest mittDest where mod.system_id = mittDest.id_modello and (mod.id_people = @idPeople@ or mod.id_people is null) and ( mittDest.id_corr_globali =0 or mittDest.id_corr_globali = @idCorrGlobali@) and mittDest.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST = 'M' and mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '0' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and not exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm) ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM_2
query.value: select * from dpa_modelli_trasm mod where mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '1' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm and DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_tipo_doc=@idTipoDoc@ @condizione@ ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_PER_TRASM_3
query.value: select mod.* from dpa_modelli_trasm mod, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest mittDest where mod.system_id = mittDest.id_modello and (mod.id_people = @idPeople@ or mittDest.id_corr_globali = @idCorrGlobali@) and mittDest.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST = 'M' and mod.id_amm = @idAmm@ @paramRegistri@ and mod.single = '0' and mod.cha_tipo_oggetto = '@cha_tipo_oggetto@' and exists (select DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI where mod.system_id=DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_mod_trasm and DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.id_tipo_doc=@idTipoDoc@ @condizione@ ORDER BY mod.NOME

query.name: MT_NEXT_VAL
query.value: select seq_dpa_modelli_trasm.nextval from dual

query.name: LS_IS_UNIQUE_COD_MODELLO_TRASM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_MODELLI_TRASM WHERE @parametri@

query.name: MT_UPDATE_MODELLO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_MODELLI_TRASM SET ID_AMM=@param0@, NOME='@param1@', CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO='@param2@', ID_REGISTRO=@param3@, VAR_NOTE_GENERALI='@param4@', SINGLE='@param5@', ID_PEOPLE = @param7@, CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI = '@cedeDir@', ID_PEOPLE_NEW_OWNER = @idpeople_new_owner@, ID_GROUP_NEW_OWNER = @idgroup_new_owner@, NO_NOTIFY = '@no_notify@', CHA_MANTIENI_LETTURA = '@mantieniLettura@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID= @param6@

query.name: MT_SALVA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST
MT_GET_MODELLI_BY_NAME
query.value: SELECT DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.SYSTEM_ID, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.NOME, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.ID_REGISTRO, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.ID_PEOPLE, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.SINGLE, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.ID_AMM, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.ID_PEOPLE_NEW_OWNER, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.ID_GROUP_NEW_OWNER, DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.NO_NOTIFY FROM DPA_MODELLI_TRASM, DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST WHERE UPPER(NOME) = '@nome@' AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = '@tipoOggetto@' AND DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.system_id = DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST.id_modello AND cha_tipo_mitt_dest = 'M' @idCorrGlob@ @idRegistro@

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI
query.value: SELECT DPA_MODELLI_TRASM.SYSTEM_ID,NOME,CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO,ID_REGISTRO,VAR_NOTE_GENERALI,ID_PEOPLE,SINGLE,ID_AMM,CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI,ID_PEOPLE_NEW_OWNER, NO_NOTIFY, CHA_MANTIENI_LETTURA, ID_GROUP_NEW_OWNER, NO_NOTIFY, isvalidmodellotrasmissione(dpa_modelli_trasm.SYSTEM_ID) AS invalid FROM DPA_MODELLI_TRASM WHERE ID_AMM = @param1@ @param2@ order by id_registro,single,nome

query.name: MT_GET_MODELLI_1
query.value: SELECT dpa_modelli_trasm.*, m.*, isvalidmodellotrasmissione(dpa_modelli_trasm.SYSTEM_ID) AS invalid, GetNumMittentiModelliTrasm(dpa_modelli_trasm.SYSTEM_ID) AS mittNum FROM dpa_modelli_trasm, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest m WHERE dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id=m.id_modello AND id_amm = @idAmm@ AND (dpa_modelli_trasm.id_people=@idPeople@ OR dpa_modelli_trasm.id_people IS NULL) AND m.cha_tipo_mitt_dest = 'M' AND dpa_modelli_trasm.single = '0' AND (id_corr_globali = @idCorrGlobali@ OR id_corr_globali = 0) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT dpa_ass_diagrammi.id_mod_trasm FROM dpa_ass_diagrammi WHERE m.id_modello=dpa_ass_diagrammi.id_mod_trasm) @param1@ ORDER BY nome

query.name: MT_GET_MITTENTE
query.value: SELECT DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST.SYSTEM_ID,ID_MODELLO,CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST, getCodRubricacorr(DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST.id_corr_globali) VAR_COD_RUBRICA,ID_RAGIONE,CHA_TIPO_TRASM,VAR_NOTE_SING, getdesccorr(dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_corr_globali) VAR_DESC_CORR,DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST.CHA_TIPO_URP,DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST.ID_CORR_GLOBALI,DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST.HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS FROM DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST WHERE ID_MODELLO = @param1@ AND CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST = 'M'

query.name: MT_GET_DESTINATARI
query.value: SELECT rt.var_desc_ragione, md.system_id, md.id_modello, md.cha_tipo_mitt_dest, getcodrubricacorr (md.id_corr_globali) var_cod_rubrica, md.id_ragione, md.cha_tipo_trasm, md.var_note_sing, getdesccorr (md.id_corr_globali) var_desc_corr, md.cha_tipo_urp, rt.cha_tipo_ragione, md.id_corr_globali, md.scadenza, md.hide_doc_versions, cg.dta_fine, cg.cha_disabled_trasm FROM dpa_modelli_mitt_dest md INNER JOIN dpa_ragione_trasm rt ON md.id_ragione = rt.system_id LEFT JOIN dpa_corr_globali cg ON md.id_corr_globali = cg.system_id WHERE id_modello = @param1@ AND cha_tipo_mitt_dest IN ('D', 'UT_P', 'R_P', 'RSP_P', 'UO_P', 'R_S', 'RSP_M', 'S_M') ORDER BY id_ragione

query.name: MT_DELETE_MODELLO
query.value: DELETE DPA_MODELLI_TRASM WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: MT_DELETE_MODELLI_MITT_DEST
query.value: DELETE DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST WHERE ID_MODELLO = @param1@

query.name: MT_DELETE_DEST_MODELLI
query.value: DELETE DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST WHERE ID_MODELLO = @param1@ AND VAR_COD_RUBRICA = '@param2@' AND ID_RAGIONE = '@param3@'

query.name: MT_DELETE_DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST
query.value: DELETE DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST WHERE ID_MODELLO = @idModTrasmissione@

query.name: S_PROJECT_COMPONENTS_4
query.value: SELECT LINK FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS PC,PROFILE P WHERE PC.PROJECT_ID IN ( @param1@ ) AND PC.LINK=P.SYSTEM_ID @param2@

query.name: UPDATE_GROUPS_SPOSTA_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE GROUPS SET GROUP_ID = '@param1@', GROUP_NAME = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: UPDATE_CORR_GLOB_SPOSTA_RUOLO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CORR_GLOBALI SET VAR_CODICE = '@param1@', VAR_COD_RUBRICA = '@param1@', VAR_DESC_CORR = '@param2@', ID_UO = @param3@, CHA_RIFERIMENTO = NULL WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param4@

query.name: S_GET_DETTAGLIO_DOCUMENTO_NO_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ a.system_id, a.docnumber, a.docname, a.status, a.docserver_loc, a.PATH, @creationDate@ AS creation_date, @creationTime@ as creation_time, a.id_registro, a.cha_tipo_proto, a.id_oggetto, a.num_proto, a.num_anno_proto, a.var_proto_eme, @dta_proto_eme@ as dta_proto_eme, a.cha_assegnato, a.var_cognome_eme, a.var_nome_eme, a.id_parent, @dta_proto@ as dta_proto, a.cha_mod_oggetto, a.cha_mod_mitt_dest, a.cha_mod_mitt_int, a.var_proto_in, a.id_annullatore, a.var_aut_annulla, a.cha_invio_conferma, @dta_proto_in@ as dta_proto_in, @dta_annulla@ as dta_annulla, a.var_segnatura, a.cha_da_proto, a.var_note, a.cha_fascicolato, a.id_tipo_atto, a.cha_privato, a.cha_evidenza, a.var_prof_oggetto AS var_desc_oggetto, a.id_people_prot, a.id_ruolo_prot, a.id_uo_prot, '255' as accessrights, d.type_id, d.description, d.system_id AS sys_doctypes, a.author, a.id_ruolo_creatore, a.id_uo_creatore, a.cha_interop, a.dta_scadenza, a.cha_personale, a.cha_in_cestino, a.id_documento_principale, a.prot_tit, a.num_in_fasc, a.id_fasc_prot_tit, a.num_prot_tit, a.id_titolario, a.cha_riff_mitt, a.id_people_delegato, a.CHA_DOCUMENTO_DA_PEC, a.LAST_FORWARD, a.PRINTS_NUM, a.CHA_COD_T_A, a.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROFILE a, DOCUMENTTYPES d WHERE @docNumber@ and a.documenttype=d.system_id

query.name: RDE_UNLOCK_USER_LOGIN
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)=UPPER('@param1@')

query.name: S_DOCACQUISITO
query.value: SELECT VAR_IMPRONTA, VERSION_ID FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param1@ AND VERSION_ID=@param2@

query.name: AMM_S_UO_SMISTAMENTO
query.value: SELECT a.system_id as idCorrGlob, a.num_livello as livello, a.var_desc_corr as descrizione, NVL((SELECT 1 FROM DPA_UO_SMISTAMENTO c WHERE c.id_uo = a.system_id AND c.id_registro = @param1@),0) AS attivo FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, DPA_UO_REG b WHERE b.id_uo = a.system_id AND b.id_registro = @param1@

query.name: AMM_D_UO_SMISTAMENTO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_UO_SMISTAMENTO WHERE id_uo = @param1@ AND id_registro = @param2@

query.name: AMM_I_UO_SMISTAMENTO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_UO_SMISTAMENTO (@param1@ ID_UO, ID_REGISTRO) VALUES (@param2@ @param3@, @param4@)

query.name: AMM_S_COUNT_UO_SMISTAMENTO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM DPA_UO_SMISTAMENTO WHERE ID_UO = @param1@ AND ID_REGISTRO = @param2@

query.name: S_GET_UO_IN_AOO_WITH_REG
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT VAR_COD_RUBRICA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_UO_REG B WHERE B.ID_UO = A.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_AMM = @param1@ ORDER BY VAR_COD_RUBRICA

query.name: DOC_DELETE_VERSION_COMPONENTS
query.value: DELETE FROM COMPONENTS WHERE VERSION_ID = @version_id@ AND DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: DOC_DELETE_VERSION_VERSIONS
query.value: DELETE FROM VERSIONS WHERE VERSION_ID = @version_id@ AND DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_CURRENT_UO
query.value: SELECT var_codice AS Codice, var_cod_rubrica AS CodiceRubrica, var_desc_corr AS Descrizione, id_amm AS IDAmministrazione, num_livello AS Livello, id_parent AS IDParent, var_codice_aoo AS CodiceRegistroInterop, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI c WHERE c.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND c.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND c.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.id_uo = a.system_id) AS Ruoli, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI b WHERE b.cha_tipo_urp = 'U' AND b.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND b.id_parent = a.system_id AND b.dta_fine IS NULL ) AS SottoUo, classifica_uo AS ClassificaUo FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a WHERE a.cha_tipo_urp = 'U' AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND a.dta_fine IS NULL AND a.system_id = @param1@ ORDER BY var_desc_corr asc

query.name: S_GET_FASCICOLO_BY_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, A.VAR_NOTE, @dataApertura@ AS DTA_APERTURA, @dataChiusura@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.ID_UO_LF, A.DTA_UO_LF, A.DTA_CREAZIONE, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.ID_TITOLARIO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.DTA_SCADENZA FROM PROJECT A, SECURITY B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@ AND A.SYSTEM_ID=B.THING AND (A.ID_AMM IS NULL OR A.ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ ) AND (B.PERSONORGROUP=@idGruppo@ OR B.PERSONORGROUP=@idPeople@ ) AND B.ACCESSRIGHTS > 0 AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' and (checkVisibilitaArchivio('F', A.SYSTEM_ID, @idGruppo@) > 0)

query.name: S_PROFILE_DATI_PROTO
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ A.NUM_PROTO, A.DTA_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_AUT_ANNULLA FROM PROFILE A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_DPARegistriAOO1
query.value: SELECT ID_UTENTEAOO, ID_RUOLOAOO, FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE VAR_CODICE = @param1@

query.name: S_PeopleP
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param2@

query.name: S_DPA_TRASM_SyIDTrRic
query.value: SELECT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ @param1@ FROM @param2@ WHERE @param3@ ORDER BY @orderCondition@, c.system_id desc

query.name: S_DPA_LOGIN_D
query.value: SELECT @param2@ FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_SECURITY_GENERIC
S_DELETED_SECURITY
U_PROJECT_3_PARAMS
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET VAR_COD_ULTIMO = '@param1@', VAR_CHIAVE_FASC = '@params2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: CHECKINOUT_GET_LAST_VERSION_DATA
query.value: SELECT C.PATH, C.FILE_SIZE, C.VAR_IMPRONTA, C.VERSION_ID, C.DOCNUMBER, V.VERSION, V.SUBVERSION, V.VERSION_LABEL FROM COMPONENTS C, VERSIONS V WHERE C.VERSION_ID = ( SELECT MAX(VERSION_ID) FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER =(SELECT P.DOCNUMBER FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID = @idDocument@) AND VERSION NOT IN (0) ) AND C.VERSION_ID=V.VERSION_ID

query.name: CHECKINOUT_GET_DOCUMENT_STATUS
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID, C.ID_DOCUMENT, C.DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, C.ID_USER, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, C.ID_ROLE, PR.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS ROLE_NAME, C.CHECK_OUT_DATE, C.DOCUMENT_LOCATION, C.MACHINE_NAME FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT C LEFT JOIN PEOPLE P ON C.ID_USER=P.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG ON CG.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_ROLE LEFT JOIN PROFILE PR ON C.ID_DOCUMENT=PR.SYSTEM_ID WHERE C.ID_DOCUMENT=@idDocument@ AND C.ID_USER=P.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: CHECKINOUT_CHECKOUT_DOCUMENT
CHECKINOUT_CHECKIN_DOCUMENT
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@id@

query.name: CHECKINOUT_UNDO_CHECKOUT_DOCUMENT
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@id@

query.name: CHECKINOUT_IS_CHECKOUT_DOCUMENT
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID, C.ID_DOCUMENT, C.DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, C.ID_USER, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, PR.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, C.ID_ROLE, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS ROLE_NAME, C.CHECK_OUT_DATE, C.DOCUMENT_LOCATION, C.MACHINE_NAME FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT C LEFT JOIN PEOPLE P ON C.ID_USER=P.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG ON CG.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_ROLE LEFT JOIN PROFILE PR ON C.ID_DOCUMENT=PR.SYSTEM_ID WHERE C.ID_DOCUMENT=@idDocument@ AND C.DOCUMENT_NUMBER=@documentNumber@

query.name: CHECKINOUT_IS_OWNER_CHECKED_OUT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT WHERE ID_DOCUMENT=@idDocument@ AND DOCUMENT_NUMBER=@documentNumber@ AND ID_USER='@idUser@'

query.name: CHECKINOUT_GET_CHECKED_OUT_DOCUMENTS
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_STATUS, C.ID_DOCUMENT AS ID_DOCUMENT, C.DOCUMENT_NUMBER AS DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, C.ID_USER, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, PR.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, C.ID_ROLE, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS ROLE_NAME, C.CHECK_OUT_DATE AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, C.DOCUMENT_LOCATION AS DOCUMENT_LOCATION, C.MACHINE_NAME AS MACHINE_NAME FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT C LEFT JOIN PEOPLE P ON C.ID_USER=P.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG ON CG.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_ROLE LEFT JOIN PROFILE PR ON C.ID_DOCUMENT=PR.SYSTEM_ID WHERE P.ID_AMM=@idAmm@ ORDER BY C.CHECK_OUT_DATE DESC

query.name: CHECKINOUT_GET_CHECKED_OUT_DOCUMENTS_USER
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_STATUS, C.ID_DOCUMENT AS ID_DOCUMENT, C.DOCUMENT_NUMBER AS DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, C.ID_USER, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, PR.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, C.ID_ROLE, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS ROLE_NAME, C.CHECK_OUT_DATE AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, C.DOCUMENT_LOCATION AS DOCUMENT_LOCATION, C.MACHINE_NAME AS MACHINE_NAME FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT C LEFT JOIN PEOPLE P ON C.ID_USER=P.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG ON CG.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_ROLE LEFT JOIN PROFILE PR ON C.ID_DOCUMENT=PR.SYSTEM_ID WHERE C.ID_USER=@idUser@ AND P.ID_AMM=@idAmm@ ORDER BY C.CHECK_OUT_DATE DESC

query.name: CHECKINOUT_IS_ADMIN_USER
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM PEOPLE WHERE CHA_AMMINISTRATORE='1' AND SYSTEM_ID='@idUser@'

query.name: CHECKINOUT_FORCE_UNDO_CHECKOUT_DOCUMENT
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CHECKIN_CHECKOUT WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@id@

query.name: CHECKINOUT_HUMMY_GET_DOCUMENT_STATUS
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, C.DOCNUMBER AS DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, C.TYPIST AS ID_USER, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, C.CHECKOUT_TIME AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, LOCATION AS DOCUMENT_LOCATION FROM CHECKOUT C, PEOPLE P, PROFILE PR WHERE C.DOCNUMBER=@documentNumber@ AND C.TYPIST=P.SYSTEM_ID AND C.DOCNUMBER=PR.DOCNUMBER

query.name: CHECKINOUT_HUMMY_IS_OWNER_CHECKED_OUT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM CHECKOUT WHERE DOCNUMBER=@documentNumber@ AND TYPIST=@idUser@

query.name: CHECKINOUT_HUMMY_IS_CHECKED_OUT
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, C.DOCNUMBER AS DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, C.TYPIST AS ID_USER, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, C.CHECKOUT_TIME AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, C.LOCATION AS DOCUMENT_LOCATION FROM CHECKOUT C, PEOPLE P, PROFILE PR WHERE C.DOCNUMBER=@documentNumber@ AND C.TYPIST=P.SYSTEM_ID AND C.DOCNUMBER=PR.DOCNUMBER

query.name: S_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE_LIST
query.value: select sr.SYSTEM_ID, sr.VAR_DESCRIZIONE from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE sr, PEOPLE p where sr.VAR_PAGINA_RIC=@param1@ and sr.ID_PEOPLE=@param2@ and sr.ID_PEOPLE=p.SYSTEM_ID @param4@ @param5@ union select sr.SYSTEM_ID, sr.VAR_DESCRIZIONE from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE sr, GROUPS g where sr.VAR_PAGINA_RIC=@param1@ and sr.ID_GRUPPO=@param3@ and sr.ID_GRUPPO=g.SYSTEM_ID @param4@ @param5@ order by VAR_DESCRIZIONE

query.name: S_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE_LIST_NOPAGE
query.value: select sr.SYSTEM_ID, sr.VAR_DESCRIZIONE from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE sr, PEOPLE p where sr.ID_PEOPLE=@param2@ and sr.ID_PEOPLE=p.SYSTEM_ID @param4@ @param5@ union select sr.SYSTEM_ID, sr.VAR_DESCRIZIONE from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE sr, GROUPS g where sr.ID_GRUPPO=@param3@ and sr.ID_GRUPPO=g.SYSTEM_ID @param4@ @param5@ order by VAR_DESCRIZIONE

query.name: S_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE_ID
query.value: select SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESCRIZIONE, ID_PEOPLE, ID_GRUPPO, VAR_PAGINA_RIC, TIPO, GRID_ID from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE where SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: S_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE_COUNT
query.value: select count(*) from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE where VAR_DESCRIZIONE=@param1@ and (ID_PEOPLE=@param2@ OR ID_GRUPPO=@param3@) and TIPO = '@param4@'

query.name: D_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE_ID
query.value: delete from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE where SYSTEM_ID=@param1@

query.name: I_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE
query.value: insert into DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE (SYSTEM_ID, VAR_DESCRIZIONE, ID_PEOPLE, ID_GRUPPO, VAR_PAGINA_RIC, VAR_FILTRI_RIC,CHA_IN_ADL,TIPO,GRID_ID) values (@param1@@param2@, @param3@, @param4@, @param5@, EMPTY_CLOB(),@param6@,'@param7@',@param8@)

query.name: CHECKINOUT_HUMMY_GET_CHECKED_OUT_DOCUMENTS
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_STATUS, PR.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_DOCUMENT, C.DOCNUMBER AS DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, P.USER_ID AS USER_ID, C.CHECKOUT_TIME AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, C.LOCATION AS DOCUMENT_LOCATION FROM CHECKOUT C, PEOPLE P, PROFILE PR WHERE C.TYPIST=P.SYSTEM_ID AND PR.DOCNUMBER=C.DOCNUMBER AND P.ID_AMM=@idAmm@ ORDER BY C.CHECKOUT_DATE DESC

query.name: CHECKINOUT_HUMMY_GET_CHECKED_OUT_DOCUMENTS_USER
query.value: SELECT C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_STATUS, PR.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_DOCUMENT, C.DOCNUMBER AS DOCUMENT_NUMBER, PR.VAR_SEGNATURA, P.USER_ID AS USER_ID, C.CHECKOUT_TIME AS CHECK_OUT_DATE, C.LOCATION AS DOCUMENT_LOCATION FROM CHECKOUT C, PEOPLE P, PROFILE PR WHERE C.TYPIST=P.SYSTEM_ID AND PR.DOCNUMBER=C.DOCNUMBER AND C.TYPIST=@idUser@ AND P.ID_AMM=@idAmm@ ORDER BY C.CHECKOUT_DATE DESC

query.name: S_PATH_MODELLO
query.value: SELECT PATH_MOD_@numeroModello@ as PATH FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT ID_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@)

query.name: S_PATH_MODELLO_ALLEGATO
query.value: SELECT PATH_ALL_@numeroModello@ as PATH FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT ID_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@)

query.name: S_OGGETTI_MODELLO
query.value: SELECT b.descrizione AS chiave, a.VALORE_OGGETTO_DB AS valore, e.descrizione, b.FORMATO_CONTATORE as FORMATO_CONTATORE ,a.anno as ANNO,a.id_aoo_rf as AOO_RF FROM DPA_ASSOCIAZIONE_TEMPLATES a, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM b, DPA_TIPO_ATTO c, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM d, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO e WHERE a.DOC_NUMBER = @docNumber@ AND a.id_template = c.system_id AND a.id_oggetto = b.system_id AND c.ABILITATO_SI_NO = 1 AND a.id_oggetto = d.system_id AND d.id_tipo_oggetto = e.system_id AND UPPER(c.IN_ESERCIZIO) = UPPER('si')

query.name: I_PROJECT_ET
VIS_RUOLO_NODO_TIT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SECURITY WHERE (ACCESSRIGHTS) > 0 AND (PERSONORGROUP= @param1@ OR PERSONORGROUP= @param2@) AND THING = @param3@

query.name: PD_GET_SCADENZE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO WHERE DPA_TIPO_ATTO.SYSTEM_ID = @idTipoAtto@

query.name: PD_GET_ID_TEMPLATE
query.value: SELECT ID_TIPO_ATTO as ID_TEMPLATE FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_CLASSIFICAZIONI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(A.SYSTEM_ID)) FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' AND A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT A.ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT A, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.PROJECT_ID AND B.LINK=@idProfile@) AND CHECKSECURITY(a.SYSTEM_ID,@idPeople@,@idGroup@,'F' )>0

query.name: S_GET_DOCNUMBER
query.value: SELECT P.DOCNUMBER FROM PROFILE P, DPA_EL_REGISTRI R WHERE P.ID_REGISTRO=R.SYSTEM_ID AND R.ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ AND R.VAR_CODICE='@registroProtocollo@' AND P.NUM_PROTO=@protocollo@ AND P.NUM_ANNO_PROTO=@annoProtocollo@

query.name: GET_LAST_VERSION_ALLEGATO
query.value: SELECT MAX ( TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(C.VERSION_LABEL,2,LENGTH(C.VERSION_LABEL))) ) AS VERSION_INDEX FROM PROFILE A, COMPONENTS B, VERSIONS C WHERE A.DOCNUMBER = B.DOCNUMBER AND B.VERSION_ID = C.VERSION_ID AND C.VERSION = 0 AND A.DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@ ORDER BY VERSION_INDEX DESC

query.name: S_PROTOASL_GET_DATA
query.value: select * from DPA_V_DOC_TRASM union select * from DPA_V_DOCUMENTI where not exists (select ID_PROFILE from DPA_V_DOC_TRASM where DPA_V_DOCUMENTI.ID_PROFILE = DPA_V_DOC_TRASM.ID_PROFILE)

query.name: I_PROTOASL_STORICIZZA_DATI
S_NOME_AMM_DA_PEOPLE
query.value: SELECT a.var_desc_amm FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA a, PEOPLE b WHERE a.system_id = b.id_amm AND b.system_id = @param1@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_AMMINISTRAZIONI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,VAR_CODICE_AMM,VAR_DESC_AMM,VAR_LIBRERIA FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REGISTRI_BY_AMM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,VAR_CODICE,VAR_DESC_REGISTRO FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_AMM = @IDAMM@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_DATI_AMMINSTRAZIONE_BY_COD
query.value: SELECT VAR_DESC_AMM,VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @IDAMM@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_DATI_REGISTRO_BY_ID_REG
query.value: SELECT VAR_DESC_REGISTRO FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@IDREG@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_COD_AMM_BY_DESC_AMM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE VAR_CODICE_AMM='@CODAMM@'

query.name: PR_DO_GET_ANNI_PROFILAZIONE_BY_REG
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE,'YYYY'))) AS ANNO FROM PROFILE WHERE id_registro =@IDREG@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_SEDI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT (VAR_SEDE) AS SEDE FROM PROFILE WHERE VAR_SEDE IS NOT NULL AND (VAR_SEDE <>' ')

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_BY_REG
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(AnnualeDocTableFunction (@MESE@,@ANNO@,@IDREG@,@IDAMM@,'@SEDE@',@TIT@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_MENSILE_BY_REG
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(MensileDocTableFunction (@MESE@,@ANNO@,@IDREG@,@IDAMM@,'@SEDE@',@TIT@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_CLASS
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(DocClassTableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,'@SEDE@',@TIT@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_CLASS_NEW
query.value: SELECT TOT_DOC_CLASS, COD_CLASS, DESC_CLASS, TOT_DOC_CLASS_VT, PERC_DOC_CLASS_VT, NUM_LIVELLO FROM MV_PROSPETTI_docclass_all mv -- materializza dati ricavati da invocazione della docclasstablefunction_new where mv.ID_AMM = @IDAMM@ and mv.ID_REGISTR = @IDREG@ and mv.ID_ANNO = @ANNO@ @SEDE@ @TIT@ order by mv.VAR_COD_LIV1

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_CLASS_COMPATTA_NEW
query.value: SELECT tot_doc_class, cod_class, desc_class , tot_doc_class_vt, perc_doc_class_vt, num_livello FROM mv_prospetti_docclasscomp_all mv -- materializza dati ricavati da invocazione della docclasscomptablefunction_new WHERE mv.ID_AMM = @IDAMM@ and mv.ID_REGISTR = @IDREG@ and mv.ID_ANNO = @ANNO@ @SEDE@ @TIT@ ORDER BY to_number(substr( cod_class, instr(cod_class, ' - ')+3 , length(cod_class) - instr(cod_class,' - ')) ), cod_class

query.name: PR_GET_COUNT_REPORT_DOC_CLASS_COMPATTA_NEW
query.value: SELECT sum(distinct Tot_Doc_Class ) FROM mv_prospetti_docclasscomp_all mv -- materializza dati ricavati da invocazione della docclasscomptablefunction_new WHERE mv.ID_AMM = @IDAMM@ and mv.ID_REGISTR = @IDREG@ and mv.ID_ANNO = @ANNO@ @SEDE@ @TIT@

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_CLASS_COMPATTA
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(DocClassCompTableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,'@SEDE@',@TIT@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_TRASM_INTEROP
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(InteropTableFunction (@ANNO@,@IDREG@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_FASC_VT
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(FascicoliVTETableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,@MESE@,@TIT@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_FASC_VT_COMPATTA
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(FascicoliVTTableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,@MESE@,@TIT@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(FascicoliTableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,@MESE@,@TITOLARIO@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_MENSILE_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(MensileFascicoliTableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,@MESE@,@TITOLARIO@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_TEMPO_MEDIO_LAV
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(TempiMediTableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,@TITOLARIO@))

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_TEMPO_MEDIO_LAV_COMPACT
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(TempiMediCompattaTableFunction (@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,@TITOLARIO@))

query.name: PR_DO_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_X_UO
query.value: SELECT * FROM table(DocUoTableFunction (@ANNO@,@IDREG@,@IDAMM@))

query.name: PR_EXEC_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_X_SEDE
query.value: BEGIN SP_DPA_PR_DOCXSEDE(@IDAMM@,@IDREG@,@ANNO@,@IDPEOPLE@,'@TIMESTAMP@'); END;

query.name: PR_DO_GET_REPORT_ANNUALE_DOC_X_SEDE
query.value: SELECT to_char(partenza.creation_year,'yyyy') AS anno , partenza.var_sede AS sede , ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) + nvl(grigi.totale_grigi,0) ) tot_doc, nvl(grigi.totale_grigi,0) AS grigi, ROUND ( nvl(grigi.totale_grigi,0) / ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) + nvl(grigi.totale_grigi,0) ), 4 ) * 100 AS perc_grigi, ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) ) AS prot, ROUND ( ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) ) / ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) + nvl(grigi.totale_grigi,0) ), 4 )*100 AS perc_prot, nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) AS annull, ROUND ( nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) / ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) ), 4 )*100 AS perc_annull, nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) AS arrivo, ROUND ( nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) / ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) ), 4 )*100 AS perc_arrivo, nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) AS partenza, ROUND ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) / ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) ), 4 )*100 AS perc_partenza, nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) AS interni, ROUND ( nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) / ( nvl(partenza.totale_partenza,0) + nvl(arrivo.totale_arrivo,0) + nvl(annullati.totale_annullati,0) + nvl(interni.totale_interni,0) ), 4 )*100 AS perc_interni FROM (SELECT trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY') as creation_year, nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.') as var_sede, SUM (p.undistinct_count) totale_arrivo FROM mv_prospetti_documenti p WHERE p.cha_tipo_proto = 'A' and cha_da_proto = '0' AND p.flag_annullato = 0 and p.CHA_IN_CESTINO_0FORNULL = 0 GROUP BY trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY'), nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.')) arrivo , (SELECT trunc(creation_month,'YY') as creation_year, nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.') as var_sede, SUM (p.undistinct_count) totale_grigi FROM mv_prospetti_docgrigi p WHERE p.id_registro = 86107 GROUP BY trunc(creation_month,'YY') , nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.') ) grigi , (SELECT trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY') as creation_year, nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.') as var_sede, SUM (p.undistinct_count) totale_partenza FROM mv_prospetti_documenti p WHERE p.cha_tipo_proto = 'P' AND p.flag_annullato = 0 and p.CHA_IN_CESTINO_0FORNULL = 0 GROUP BY trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY') , nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.') ) partenza , (SELECT trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY') as creation_year, nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.') as var_sede, SUM (p.undistinct_count) totale_interni FROM mv_prospetti_documenti p WHERE p.cha_tipo_proto = 'I' AND p.flag_annullato = 0 AND p.flag_annullato = 0 and p.CHA_IN_CESTINO_0FORNULL = 0 GROUP BY trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY') , nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.')) interni , (SELECT trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY') as creation_year, nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.') as var_sede, SUM (p.undistinct_count) totale_annullati FROM mv_prospetti_documenti p WHERE p.flag_annullato = 1 and cha_da_proto = '0' and p.CHA_IN_CESTINO_0FORNULL = 0 GROUP BY trunc(proto_month, 'YYYY') , nvl(p.var_sede,'n.d.')) annullati WHERE partenza.creation_year = arrivo.creation_year (+) AND partenza.creation_year = annullati.creation_year (+) AND partenza.creation_year = interni.creation_year (+) AND partenza.creation_year = grigi.creation_year (+) AND partenza.var_sede = arrivo.var_sede (+) AND partenza.var_sede = annullati.var_sede (+) AND partenza.var_sede = interni.var_sede (+) AND partenza.var_sede = grigi.var_sede (+) and to_char(partenza.creation_year,'yyyy') = @ANNO@

query.name: S_CONTA_TRASM_TDL_OLTRE_GG_AVVISO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(d.ID_TRASMISSIONE) FROM dpa_todolist d WHERE ( ( d.id_people_dest = @param2@ AND d.id_ruolo_dest = 0 OR d.id_ruolo_dest = @param1@ AND d.id_people_dest = @param2@ ) AND TO_DATE (d.dta_invio, 'DD/MM/YYYY') < TO_DATE ((SYSDATE - NUMTODSINTERVAL (@param5@, 'DAY')), 'DD/MM/YYYY') )

query.name: U_TDL_OLTRE_GG_AVVISO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0', DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST = TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YY') WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA IN ( SELECT B.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND ((B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND C.ID_PEOPLE = @param2@) OR B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param3@) AND C.CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO < @param5@ ) AND ID_PEOPLE = @param2@ @paramTrasm@

query.name: U_TDL_OLTRE_GG_AVVISO_NO_WF
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0', DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST = TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YY') WHERE ID_TRASM_SINGOLA IN ( SELECT B.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND B.ID_RAGIONE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE NOT IN ('W') AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND ((B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND C.ID_PEOPLE = @param2@) OR B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param3@) AND C.CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO < @param5@ ) AND ID_PEOPLE = @param2@ @paramTrasm@

query.name: UPDATE_TODOLIST_ACL
query.value: UPDATE dpa_trasm_utente SET CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0', CHA_VISTA = (CASE WHEN DTA_VISTA IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHERE (SYSTEM_ID = @param3@ OR SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT TU.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU,DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@param4@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID in (@param5@) AND TS.SYSTEM_ID=TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND TS.CHA_TIPO_DEST= 'U') ) AND CHA_VALIDA='1'

query.name: S_DATEDIFF_FROM_DUAL
query.value: SELECT TO_DATE((SYSDATE-NUMTODSINTERVAL(@param1@,'DAY')),'DD/MM/YY') AS data FROM DUAL

query.name: S_DPA_TRASM_SyIDTrEff
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASM, A.DTA_INVIO, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AS ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, B.ID_RAGIONE FROM @param2@ WHERE @param3@ ORDER BY @orderCondition@

query.name: DO_GET_IDPROFILE_BY_DATA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.ID_REGISTRO = @IDREGISTRO@ AND P.NUM_ANNO_PROTO = @ANNOPROTO@ AND P.NUM_PROTO = @NUMPROTO@ --and (checkSecurityDocumento(P.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGruppo@,'D') > 0)

query.name: S_DPA_STATO_INVIO_ELENCO
query.value: SELECT a.VAR_INDIRIZZO, a.VAR_CODICE_AOO, a.VAR_CODICE_AMM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.DTA_SPEDIZIONE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH:MI:SS')) AS DTA_SPEDIZIONE, b.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_STATO_INVIO a, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI b WHERE a.ID_PROFILE = @param1@ AND a.DTA_SPEDIZIONE IS NOT NULL AND a.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = b.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: U_DPA_REG_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_REG_FASC SET NUM_RIF = @param1@ WHERE ID_TITOLARIO = @param2@ AND ID_REGISTRO @param3@

query.name: S_DPA_REG_FASC
query.value: SELECT NUM_RIF FROM DPA_REG_FASC WHERE ID_TITOLARIO = @param1@ AND ID_REGISTRO @param2@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_REG_FASC.ID_REGISTRO, DPA_REG_FASC.ID_TITOLARIO, DPA_REG_FASC.NUM_RIF

query.name: U_DPATrasmUtente_setDataVista
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_VISTA = '1', DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.DTA_VISTA = (CASE WHEN DTA_VISTA IS NULL THEN @dataOdierna@ ELSE DTA_VISTA END), DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_IN_TODOLIST = (SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(C.SYSTEM_ID)>0 THEN '0' ELSE ''||DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_IN_TODOLIST||'' END) AS RTN FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B,DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C,DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND C.CHA_VALIDA = '1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND C.ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@ AND A.@tipoObj@ = @idObj@ AND B.ID_RAGIONE = D.SYSTEM_ID AND (D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'N' OR D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'I') AND C.CHA_VISTA='0') WHERE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.CHA_VISTA = '0' AND DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@ AND DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA IN (SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA A, DPA_TRASMISSIONE B WHERE A.ID_TRASMISSIONE = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.@tipoObj@ = @idObj@)

query.name: S_DPARegProtoForUpdate
query.value: SELECT NUM_RIF FROM DPA_REG_PROTO WHERE @param1@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_REG_PROTO.ID_REGISTRO,dpa_reg_proto.num_rif

query.name: S_REGISTRO_RUOLO
query.value: SELECT id_registro FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG WHERE ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @param1@ AND dta_fine IS NULL

query.name: S_DPAAreaLavoro
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_AREA_LAVORO WHERE @param2@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI
S_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT a.*,getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR FROM ( SELECT @index@ ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @order@) AS RN, A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.AUTHOR, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id @from@ WHERE @security@ @filters@ ) a WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_VELOCE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, CODICE FROM ( SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, (case when a.num_proto is not null then a.num_proto when a.num_proto is null then a.docnumber end) as codice FROM PROFILE a WHERE @security@ @filters@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate @unionStampe@ ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < = @rowCount@

query.name: S_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_VELOCE
query.value: SELECT a.*, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG,getInADL(SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL,getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG,getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, SYSTEM_ID, DOCNUMBER, DTA_ANNULLA, VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, ID_REGISTRO, CHA_TIPO_PROTO, CHA_EVIDENZA, NUM_ANNO_PROTO, CREATION_DATE, NUM_PROTO, VAR_SEGNATURA, DTA_PROTO, CHA_IMG, CHA_PRIVATO, CHA_PERSONALE, ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, ID_TIPO_ATTO, DESC_TIPO_ATTO, AUTHOR FROM ( SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_IMG, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.author a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id WHERE @security@ @filters@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < = @rowCount@ ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: UPDATE_SCADENZA_PROFILE
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET DTA_SCADENZA = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+NUMTODSINTERVAL(@scadenza_gg@,'DAY'),'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: UPDATE_SCADENZA_PROFILE_1
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET DTA_SCADENZA = TO_DATE('@data@','dd/mm/yyyy') WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: TRASM_SCADENZE_DOC
query.value: SELECT distinct(thing),personorgroup,profile.system_id as P_SYSTEM_ID,docnumber FROM profile, dpa_tipo_atto, security, people, dpa_stati, dpa_diagrammi WHERE profile.id_tipo_atto = dpa_tipo_atto.system_id AND profile.dta_scadenza = @param1@ AND profile.system_id = security.thing AND people.system_id = security.personorgroup AND security.accessrights=0 AND security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A' AND profile.docnumber = dpa_diagrammi.doc_number AND dpa_diagrammi.id_diagramma = dpa_stati.id_diagramma AND dpa_stati.stato_finale <> 1

query.name: TRASM_SCADENZE_MITT
query.value: SELECT distinct(personorgroup),thing,profile.system_id as P_SYSTEM_ID,docnumber FROM profile, dpa_tipo_atto, security, people WHERE profile.id_tipo_atto = dpa_tipo_atto.system_id AND profile.dta_scadenza = @param1@ AND profile.system_id = security.thing AND security.accessrights=255 AND docnumber = @docNumber@ AND security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A'

query.name: TRASM_SCADENZE_DEST
query.value: select personorgroup, accessrights, docnumber, thing, cha_tipo_diritto, 'R' as tipo from profile, dpa_tipo_atto, security, groups where profile.id_tipo_atto = dpa_tipo_atto.system_id and profile.dta_scadenza = @param1@ and profile.system_id = security.thing and security.accessrights > 0 and docnumber = @docNumber@ and groups.system_id = security.personorgroup and security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A' union select personorgroup, accessrights, docnumber, thing, cha_tipo_diritto, 'P' as tipo from profile, dpa_tipo_atto, security, people where profile.id_tipo_atto = dpa_tipo_atto.system_id and profile.dta_scadenza = @param1@ and profile.system_id = security.thing and security.accessrights > 0 and docnumber = @docNumber@ and people.system_id = security.personorgroup and security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A'

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_LIST_DOCUMENTI_TRASMESSI_FILTERS
query.value: SELECT E.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID, D.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE AS TIPO_RAGIONE, A.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE, B.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_SINGOLA, C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI AS NOTE_GENERALI FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM D, PROFILE E @queryFrom@ WHERE A.ID_PROFILE=E.SYSTEM_ID and A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND B.ID_RAGIONE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND C.CHA_VALIDA='1' AND A.DTA_INVIO IS NOT NULL AND ((B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @param1@ AND C.ID_PEOPLE=@param2@) OR B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE= (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_PEOPLE=@param2@ AND CHA_TIPO_URP = 'P')) AND A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO = 'D' AND C.CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '1' AND (E.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param3@) OR E.ID_REGISTRO IS NULL) @filterString@ ORDER BY A.DTA_INVIO DESC,B.ID_TRASMISSIONE DESC

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_LIST_DOCUMENTI_IN_TODO
query.value: SELECT ID_PROFILE AS SYSTEM_ID, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'TIPO_RAGIONE') AS TIPO_RAGIONE, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_TRASMISSIONE AS ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE, VAR_NOTE_GEN AS NOTE_GENERALI, VAR_NOTE_SING AS NOTE_INDIVIDUALI, DTA_INVIO AS DTAINVIO , nvl(A.DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(A.DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS MITT_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT FROM DPA_TODOLIST A, PROFILE B, DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM C WHERE ID_PROFILE > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @param1@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @param2@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @param1@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND A.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param3@) AND ID_PROFILE = B.SYSTEM_ID AND B.DTA_ANNULLA IS NULL AND C.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AND C.CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI='N' ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_LIST_DOCUMENTI_IN_TODO_FILTERED
query.value: SELECT ID_PROFILE AS SYSTEM_ID, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'TIPO_RAGIONE') AS TIPO_RAGIONE, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_TRASMISSIONE AS ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE, VAR_NOTE_GEN AS NOTE_GENERALI, VAR_NOTE_SING AS NOTE_INDIVIDUALI, DTA_INVIO AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS MITT_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROFILE > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @param1@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @param2@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @param1@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND ID_REGISTRO IN (@param3@) @filtri@ ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA WHERE @param2@

query.name: SCADENZE_TRASMISSIONI_DOC
query.value: select dpa_trasmissione.DTA_INVIO, dpa_trasmissione.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, dpa_trasm_singola.CHA_TIPO_TRASM, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROFILE, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROJECT, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PEOPLE as ID_MITTENTE, profile.docnumber, dpa_trasmissione.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO @param1@ from dpa_trasmissione, dpa_trasm_singola, dpa_trasm_utente, profile where dpa_trasmissione.system_id = dpa_trasm_singola.id_trasmissione and dpa_trasm_utente.id_trasm_singola = dpa_trasm_singola.system_id and dpa_trasmissione.id_Profile = profile.system_id and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_valida <> 0 and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_in_todolist = 0 and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_accettata = 0 and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_rifiutata = 0 and dpa_trasm_singola.dta_scadenza = TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YY') union select dpa_trasmissione.DTA_INVIO, dpa_trasmissione.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, dpa_trasm_singola.CHA_TIPO_TRASM, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROFILE, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROJECT, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PEOPLE as ID_MITTENTE, profile.docnumber, dpa_trasmissione.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO @param1@ from dpa_trasmissione, dpa_trasm_singola, dpa_trasm_utente, profile where dpa_trasmissione.system_id = dpa_trasm_singola.id_trasmissione and dpa_trasm_utente.id_trasm_singola = dpa_trasm_singola.system_id and dpa_trasmissione.id_Profile = profile.system_id and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_in_todolist = 1 and dpa_trasm_singola.dta_scadenza = TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YY') ORDER BY ID_PROFILE

query.name: SCADENZE_TRASMISSIONI_FASC
query.value: select dpa_trasmissione.DTA_INVIO, dpa_trasmissione.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROFILE, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROJECT, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PEOPLE as ID_MITTENTE, dpa_trasmissione.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO @param1@ from dpa_trasmissione, dpa_trasm_singola, dpa_trasm_utente, project where dpa_trasmissione.system_id = dpa_trasm_singola.id_trasmissione and dpa_trasm_utente.id_trasm_singola = dpa_trasm_singola.system_id and dpa_trasmissione.id_Project = project.system_id and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_valida <> 0 and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_in_todolist = 0 and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_accettata = 0 and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_rifiutata = 0 and dpa_trasm_singola.dta_scadenza = TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YY') union select dpa_trasmissione.DTA_INVIO, dpa_trasmissione.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROFILE, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PROJECT, dpa_trasmissione.ID_PEOPLE as ID_MITTENTE, dpa_trasmissione.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO @param1@ from dpa_trasmissione, dpa_trasm_singola, dpa_trasm_utente, project where dpa_trasmissione.system_id = dpa_trasm_singola.id_trasmissione and dpa_trasm_utente.id_trasm_singola = dpa_trasm_singola.system_id and dpa_trasmissione.id_Project = project.system_id and dpa_trasm_utente.cha_in_todolist = 1 and dpa_trasm_singola.dta_scadenza = TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'DD/MM/YY') ORDER BY ID_PROJECT

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_DTA_ACCETTATA_NEW
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DTA_ACCETTATA = @param1@ @param2@ WHERE (SYSTEM_ID = @param3@ OR SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT TU.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU,DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@param4@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=@param5@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID=TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND TS.CHA_TIPO_DEST= 'U' AND TX.DTA_INVIO is not null) ) AND CHA_VALIDA='1'

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_RIFIUTATA_NEW
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET CHA_IN_TODOLIST = '0', CHA_RIFIUTATA='1' @param100@ WHERE (SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ OR SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT TU.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU,DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@param2@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=@param3@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID=TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND TS.CHA_TIPO_DEST= 'U') ) AND CHA_VALIDA='1'

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_GET_DOCUMENTI_DA_FASCICOLARE
query.value: select p.system_id as ID_PROFILE, p.docnumber as DOCNUMBER, p.creation_date as DATA_CREAZIONE, p.num_proto as NUMERO_PROTOCOLLO, p.dta_proto as DATA_PROTOCOLLO, p.cha_tipo_proto as TIPO_DOCUMENTO, p.id_registro as ID_REGISTRO, r.var_codice as CODICE_REGISTRO, v.version_id as VERSION_ID, v.version_label as VERSION_LABEL, v.comments as VERSION_NOTE, pj2.system_id as ID_FASCICOLO, pj2.var_codice as CODICE_FASCICOLO, pj2.description as DESCRIZIONE_FASCICOLO, pj2.cha_tipo_proj AS TIPO_FASCICOLO, pj2.cartaceo as FASCICOLO_CARTACEO, v.cartaceo as DOCUMENTO_CARTACEO from profile p left outer join dpa_el_registri r on p.id_registro = r.system_id, versions v, project_components pjc, project pj1, project pj2 where p.docnumber = v.docnumber and p.system_id = pjc.link and pjc.project_id = pj1.system_id and pj1.id_fascicolo = pj2.system_id and v.version_id = ( select max(v1.version_id) from versions v1, components c where v1.docnumber=p.docnumber and v1.version_id = c.version_id and not c.var_impronta is null ) and v.version_id not in ( select fc.version_id from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc where fc.project_id = pj2.system_id ) @filters@ order by v.version_id desc, p.num_proto desc, p.dta_proto desc

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_GET_DOCUMENTI_FASCICOLATI
query.value: select p.system_id as ID_PROFILE, p.docnumber as DOCNUMBER, p.creation_date as DATA_CREAZIONE, p.num_proto as NUMERO_PROTOCOLLO, p.dta_proto as DATA_PROTOCOLLO, p.cha_tipo_proto as TIPO_DOCUMENTO, p.id_registro as ID_REGISTRO, r.var_codice as CODICE_REGISTRO, v.version_id as VERSION_ID, v.version_label as VERSION_LABEL, v.comments as VERSION_NOTE, pj.system_id as ID_FASCICOLO, pj.var_codice as CODICE_FASCICOLO, pj.description as DESCRIZIONE_FASCICOLO, pj.cha_tipo_proj AS TIPO_FASCICOLO, fc.system_id as ID_FASCICOLAZIONE, fc.data_archiviazione as DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE, pj.cartaceo as FASCICOLO_CARTACEO, v.cartaceo as DOCUMENTO_CARTACEO from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc, profile p, versions v, dpa_el_registri r, project pj where fc.id_document = p.system_id and p.docnumber = v.docnumber and p.id_registro = r.system_id and pj.system_id = fc.project_id @filters@ order by fc.data_archiviazione desc, v.version_id desc, p.num_proto desc, p.dta_proto desc

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_GET_FILE_REQUEST_DATA
query.value: SELECT C.PATH, C.FILE_SIZE, C.VAR_IMPRONTA, C.VERSION_ID, C.DOCNUMBER, V.VERSION, V.SUBVERSION, V.VERSION_LABEL FROM COMPONENTS C, VERSIONS V WHERE C.VERSION_ID=V.VERSION_ID AND C.VERSION_ID = @versionId@

query.name: I_FASC_CARTACEA_INSERT_DOCUMENTO
D_FASC_CARTACEA_DELETE_DOCUMENTO_DA_FASCICOLO
query.value: delete from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea where project_id = @idFascicolo@ and id_document = @idDocumento@

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_GET_FASCICOLI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: select pj.system_id as ID_FASCICOLO, pj.var_codice as CODICE_FASCICOLO, pj.description as DESCRIZIONE_FASCICOLO, pj.cha_tipo_proj AS TIPO_FASCICOLO, pj.cartaceo as FASCICOLO_CARTACEO from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc, project pj where pj.system_id = fc.project_id and fc.version_id = @versionId@ order by fc.system_id desc

query.name: U_SET_FASCICOLO_CARTACEO
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET CARTACEO = 1 WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idFascicolo@ AND (CARTACEO IS NULL OR CARTACEO = 0)

query.name: U_SET_VERSIONE_CARTACEA
query.value: UPDATE VERSIONS SET CARTACEO = 1 WHERE VERSION_ID = @idVersione@ AND (CARTACEO IS NULL OR CARTACEO = 0)

query.name: S_IS_DOCUMENTO_CARTACEO
query.value: SELECT CARTACEO FROM VERSIONS WHERE VERSION_ID = @idVersione@

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_GET_COUNT_DOCUMENTI_DA_FASCICOLARE_PAGING
query.value: select /*+index (p indx_profile_time) index(pjc) index (v INDX_VERSIONS1) */ max(rownum) from profile p, versions v, project_components pjc, project pj1, project pj2 where p.docnumber = v.docnumber and p.system_id = pjc.link and pjc.project_id = pj1.system_id and pj1.id_fascicolo = pj2.system_id and v.version_id =getmaxver(p.docnumber) and v.version_id not in ( select fc.version_id from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc where fc.project_id = pj2.system_id ) and NVL(p.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' and p.cha_in_archivio <> '1' @filters@

query.name: S_GET_MY_DOC_TODOLIST
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO AS DTAINVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy')AS DTA_INVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER')AS SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'OGGETTO_MITTENTE')AS OGGETTO_MITTENTE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'CHA_TIPO_PROTO')AS TIPO_PROTO, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DTA_DOC, vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'NUMPROTO') AS NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROFILE > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_GET_MY_DOC_TODOLIST_FILTERED
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO AS DTAINVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy')AS DTA_INVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER')AS SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'OGGETTO_MITTENTE')AS OGGETTO_MITTENTE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'CHA_TIPO_PROTO')AS TIPO_PROTO, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DTA_DOC, vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'NUMPROTO') AS NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROFILE > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) @filtri@ ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_GET_MY_FASC_TODOLIST
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO AS DTAINVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy')AS DTA_INVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROJECT, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DESC_FASC')AS DESC_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'CODFASC') AS COD_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROJECT > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_GET_MY_FASC_TODOLIST_FILTERED
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO AS DTAINVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy')AS DTA_INVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROJECT, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DESC_FASC')AS DESC_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'CODFASC') AS COD_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROJECT > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filtri@ ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_GET_DOCUMENTI_DA_FASCICOLARE_PAGING
query.value: select * from ( select rownum RN, ID_PROFILE, DOCNUMBER, DATA_CREAZIONE, NUMERO_PROTOCOLLO, DATA_PROTOCOLLO, TIPO_DOCUMENTO, ID_REGISTRO, CODICE_REGISTRO, VERSION_ID, VERSION_LABEL, VERSION_NOTE, ID_FASCICOLO, CODICE_FASCICOLO, DESCRIZIONE_FASCICOLO, TIPO_FASCICOLO, FASCICOLO_CARTACEO, DOCUMENTO_CARTACEO from ( select /*+index (v INDX_VERSIONS1)*/ p.system_id as ID_PROFILE, p.docnumber as DOCNUMBER, p.creation_date as DATA_CREAZIONE, p.num_proto as NUMERO_PROTOCOLLO, p.dta_proto as DATA_PROTOCOLLO, p.cha_tipo_proto as TIPO_DOCUMENTO, p.id_registro as ID_REGISTRO, r.var_codice as CODICE_REGISTRO, v.version_id as VERSION_ID, v.version_label as VERSION_LABEL, v.comments as VERSION_NOTE, pj2.system_id as ID_FASCICOLO, pj2.var_codice as CODICE_FASCICOLO, pj2.description as DESCRIZIONE_FASCICOLO, pj2.cha_tipo_proj AS TIPO_FASCICOLO, pj2.cartaceo as FASCICOLO_CARTACEO, v.cartaceo as DOCUMENTO_CARTACEO from profile p left outer join dpa_el_registri r on p.id_registro = r.system_id, versions v, project_components pjc, project pj1, project pj2 where p.docnumber = v.docnumber and p.system_id = pjc.link and pjc.project_id = pj1.system_id and pj1.id_fascicolo = pj2.system_id and v.version_id = ( select max(v1.version_id) from versions v1, components c where v1.docnumber=p.docnumber and v1.version_id = c.version_id and not c.var_impronta is null ) and v.version_id not in ( select fc.version_id from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc where fc.project_id = pj2.system_id ) and NVL(p.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' and p.cha_in_archivio <> '1' @filters@ order by v.version_id desc, p.num_proto desc, p.dta_proto desc ) where rownum < = @totalRows@ ) where rn between @startRow@ and @endRow@

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_IS_DOCUMENTO_FASCICOLATO
query.value: select count(fc.system_id) from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc where fc.project_id = @projectId@ and fc.version_id = @versionId@

query.name: S_GET_DATI_FASCICOLAZIONE_CARTACEA
query.value: select fc.system_id as ID_FASCICOLAZIONE, fc.data_archiviazione as DATA_ARCHIVIAZIONE from dpa_fascicolazione_cartacea fc where fc.project_id = @projectId@ and fc.version_id = @versionId@

query.name: S_CATENE_DOC_GET_DOCUMENTO_MITTENTE
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, TO_CHAR(A.CREATION_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, TO_CHAR(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') as DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 'x' FROM security c WHERE c.thing = a.system_id AND ( c.personorgroup IN (@idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AND c.accessrights > 0 ) ) AND A.DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@ AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO = '@tipoDocumento@'

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_MENU_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID AS IDMENU, VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE, VAR_VISIBILITA_MENU AS VISIBILITA, (SELECT ID_CORR_GLOBALE FROM DPA_USERADMIN_VOCI_MENU WHERE DPA_VOCI_MENU_ADMIN.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_USERADMIN_VOCI_MENU.ID_VOCE_MENU AND DPA_USERADMIN_VOCI_MENU.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = @idCorrGlob@ ) AS ASSOCIATO FROM DPA_VOCI_MENU_ADMIN --WHERE --ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_MENU_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: select id_voce_menu from dpa_useradmin_voci_menu where id_corr_globale = @idCorrGlob@

query.name: D_MENU_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: delete from dpa_useradmin_voci_menu where id_corr_globale = @idCorrGlob@

query.name: I_MENU_ASS_UTENTE
query.value: insert into dpa_useradmin_voci_menu (id_corr_globale, id_voce_menu, id_amm) values (@idCorrGlob@,@idVoceMenu@,@idAmm@)

query.name: S_AMM_LOGIN3
query.value: SELECT system_id AS ID, cha_amministratore AS TIPO, var_nome AS NOME, var_cognome AS COGNOME, id_amm AS IDAMM FROM PEOPLE WHERE upper(user_id) = upper('@param1@') AND disabled = 'N' AND cha_amministratore in ('1','2','3')

query.name: I_TIPO_FUNZ_NEW_AMM
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE ( @param1@ VAR_COD_TIPO, VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN, CHA_VIS, ID_AMM ) SELECT @param2@ VAR_COD_TIPO, VAR_DESC_TIPO_FUN, CHA_VIS, @param3@ FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE WHERE ID_AMM IS NULL

query.name: I_ASS_TIPO_FUNZ_FUNZ_NEW_AMM
query.value: insert into dpa_funzioni (@param1@ ID_AMM, COD_FUNZIONE, VAR_DESC_FUNZIONE, ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE ) select @param2@ b1.id_amm, a1.COD_FUNZIONE, a1.VAR_DESC_FUNZIONE, b1.system_id from dpa_funzioni a1, dpa_tipo_funzione b1, dpa_tipo_funzione c1 where a1.id_amm is null and a1.ID_TIPO_FUNZIONE = c1.system_id and b1.var_cod_tipo=c1.var_cod_tipo and b1.id_amm=@param3@ and c1.id_amm is null

query.name: S_GET_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPES
query.value: SELECT SF.SYSTEM_ID, SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, SF.FILE_TYPE_USED, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM AS CODICE_AMMINISTRAZIONE, SF.DESCRIPTION, SF.FILE_EXTENSION, SF.MAX_FILE_SIZE, SF.MAX_FILE_SIZE_ALERT_MODE, SF.CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL, SF.DOCUMENT_TYPE, SF.FILE_TYPE_SIGNATURE, SF.FILE_TYPE_PRESERVATION, SF.FILE_TYPE_VALIDATION FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SF, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE = @idAmministrazione@ ORDER BY SF.DESCRIPTION

query.name: S_GET_DEFAULT_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPES
query.value: SELECT SF.SYSTEM_ID, SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, SF.FILE_TYPE_USED, '' AS CODICE_AMMINISTRAZIONE, SF.DESCRIPTION, SF.FILE_EXTENSION, SF.MAX_FILE_SIZE, SF.MAX_FILE_SIZE_ALERT_MODE, SF.CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL, SF.DOCUMENT_TYPE, SF.FILE_TYPE_SIGNATURE, SF.FILE_TYPE_PRESERVATION, SF.FILE_TYPE_VALIDATION FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SF WHERE SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE IS NULL ORDER BY SF.DESCRIPTION

query.name: S_GET_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPE
query.value: SELECT SF.SYSTEM_ID, SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE, SF.FILE_TYPE_USED, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM AS CODICE_AMMINISTRAZIONE, SF.DESCRIPTION, SF.FILE_EXTENSION, SF.MAX_FILE_SIZE, SF.MAX_FILE_SIZE_ALERT_MODE, SF.CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL, SF.DOCUMENT_TYPE, SF.FILE_TYPE_SIGNATURE, SF.FILE_TYPE_PRESERVATION, SF.FILE_TYPE_VALIDATION FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SF, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND A.SYSTEM_ID = @idAmministrazione@ AND UPPER(SF.FILE_EXTENSION) = UPPER('@fileExtension@') ORDER BY SF.DESCRIPTION

query.name: S_GET_SUPPORTED_FILE_ADMIN
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: S_GET_EMAIL_ADDRESS_AMMINISTRA
query.value: SELECT FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: S_GET_ADMIN_SUPPORTED_FILE_MODELS
query.value: SELECT SF.FILE_EXTENSION, SF.CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL, SF.DOCUMENT_TYPE FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SF WHERE SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE = @idAmministrazione@ AND SF.FILE_TYPE_USED = 1

query.name: S_GET_ADMIN_BY_CODE_SUPPORTED_FILE_MODELS
query.value: SELECT SF.FILE_EXTENSION, SF.CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SF, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = SF.ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE AND A.VAR_CODICE_AMM = '@codiceAmministrazione@'

query.name: U_SET_CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL_2
query.value: UPDATE DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SET CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL = @containsFileModel@ WHERE ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE VAR_CODICE_AMM = '@codiceAmministrazione@') AND SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO WHERE FILE_EXTENSION = '@fileType@' AND ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE VAR_CODICE_AMM = '@codiceAmministrazione@'))

query.name: I_INSERT_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPES
U_UPDATE_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPES
query.value: UPDATE DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO SET DESCRIPTION = '@description@', FILE_TYPE_USED = @fileTypeUsed@, FILE_EXTENSION = '@fileExtensione@', MAX_FILE_SIZE = @maxFileSize@, MAX_FILE_SIZE_ALERT_MODE = @maxFileSizeAlertMode@, CONTAINS_FILE_MODEL = @containsFileModel@, DOCUMENT_TYPE = @documentType@, FILE_TYPE_SIGNATURE = @fileTypeSignature@, FILE_TYPE_PRESERVATION = @fileTypePreservation@, FILE_TYPE_VALIDATION = @fileTypeValidation@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: D_REMOVE_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPES
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: S_CONTAINS_FILE_TYPE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_FORMATI_DOCUMENTO WHERE FILE_EXTENSION = '@fileExtension@' AND ID_AMMINISTRAZIONE = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: S_GET_TIPO_DOCUMENTO_FROM_DOCNUMBER
query.value: SELECT P.CHA_TIPO_PROTO FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: U_FASC_CARTACEA_SCARTA_DOCUMENTO_NON_CARTACEO
query.value: UPDATE VERSIONS SET SCARTA_FASC_CARTACEA = 1 WHERE VERSION_ID = @versionId@

query.name: S_FASC_CARTACEA_GET_COUNT_FASCICOLI_DOCUMENTO
query.value: select count(*) from project_components where link = @docNumber@

query.name: S_PIANI_RIENTRO_ISTRUTTORIA
query.value: select project_id, system_id, oggetto, num_proto, dta_proto, dta_annulla, aut_annulla, description, dta_scadenza, atto, segn, tipo_proto, parent from ( select pf.project_id as project_id, d.system_id as system_id, d.var_prof_oggetto as oggetto, d.num_proto as num_proto, d.dta_proto as dta_proto, d.dta_annulla as dta_annulla, d.var_aut_annulla as aut_annulla, f.description as description, f.dta_uo_lf as dta_scadenza, a.var_desc_atto as atto, d.var_segnatura as segn, d.cha_tipo_proto as tipo_proto, d.id_parent as parent from profile d, project f, project c, project_components pf, dpa_tipo_atto a where d.id_registro = @param1@ and d.system_id = pf.link and d.id_tipo_atto = a.system_id and d.cha_tipo_proto = 'A' and dta_annulla is null and c.system_id = pf.project_id and f.system_id = c.id_parent and f.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and f.cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'P' and c.cha_tipo_proj = 'C' and pf.project_id not in (select system_id from project where upper(var_codice)=upper('PFP') and id_registro =@param1@) and f.dta_uo_lf between to_date('@param2@','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('@param3@','dd/mm/yyyy') and dta_proto between to_date('@param2@','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('@param3@','dd/mm/yyyy') and f.system_id not in ( select t.id_project from dpa_trasmissione t,dpa_trasm_singola b,dpa_ragione_trasm c where t.system_id=b.id_trasmissione and b.id_ragione=c.system_id and t.cha_tipo_oggetto='F' and upper(c.var_Desc_ragione) in ('CONCERTO_TECNICO','COMPETENZA_TECNICA') ) union select pf.project_id as project_id, d.system_id as system_id, d.var_prof_oggetto as oggetto, d.num_proto as num_proto, d.dta_proto as dta_proto, d.dta_annulla as dta_annulla, d.var_aut_annulla as aut_annulla, f.description as description, f.dta_uo_lf as dta_scadenza, a.var_desc_atto as atto, d.var_segnatura as segn, d.cha_tipo_proto as tipo_proto, d.id_parent as parent from profile d, project f, project c, project_components pf, dpa_tipo_atto a where d.id_registro = @param1@ and d.system_id = pf.link and d.id_tipo_atto = a.system_id and d.cha_tipo_proto = 'A' and dta_annulla is null and c.system_id = pf.project_id and f.system_id = c.id_parent and f.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' and f.cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'P' and c.cha_tipo_proj = 'C' and pf.project_id not in (select system_id from project where upper(var_codice)=upper('PFP') and id_registro =@param1@) and f.dta_uo_lf between to_date('@param2@','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('@param3@','dd/mm/yyyy') and d.dta_proto between to_date('@param2@','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('@param3@','dd/mm/yyyy') and d.dta_proto > ( select distinct tf.dta_invio from dpa_v_txfasc tf where tf.dta_invio between to_date('@param2@','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('@param3@','dd/mm/yyyy') --coincide con il periodo del report and upper(tf.ragione) in ('CONCERTO_TECNICO','COMPETENZA_TECNICA') and f.system_id=tf.id_fasc ) ) order by project_id asc

query.name: S_PIANI_RIENTRO_TRASMESSI_MEF
query.value: SELECT pf.project_id AS project_id, d.system_id AS system_id, d.var_prof_oggetto AS oggetto, d.num_proto AS num_proto, d.dta_proto AS dta_proto, d.dta_annulla AS dta_annulla, d.var_aut_annulla AS aut_annulla, f.description AS description, f.dta_uo_lf AS dta_scadenza, a.var_desc_atto AS atto, d.var_segnatura AS segn, d.cha_tipo_proto AS tipo_proto, d.id_parent AS PARENT FROM PROFILE d, project f, project c, project_components pf, dpa_tipo_atto a WHERE d.id_registro = @param1@ AND d.system_id = pf.LINK AND d.id_tipo_atto = a.system_id AND d.cha_tipo_proto = 'A' AND dta_annulla IS NULL AND c.system_id = pf.project_id AND f.system_id = c.id_parent AND f.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND f.cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'P' AND c.cha_tipo_proj = 'C' AND pf.project_id NOT IN ( SELECT system_id FROM project WHERE UPPER (var_codice) = UPPER ('PFP') AND id_registro = @param1@) AND f.dta_uo_lf BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND dta_proto BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND f.system_id IN ( SELECT id_fasc FROM dpa_v_txfasc tf WHERE dta_invio BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(ragione) in ('CONCERTO_TECNICO','COMPETENZA_TECNICA') AND tf.id_corr_glob IN ( SELECT system_id FROM (SELECT /* +(index r)*/ r.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'IGSS') AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'IGSS') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I')))))) AND dta_proto @param4@ (SELECT MAX (dta_invio) FROM dpa_v_txfasc tf WHERE dta_invio BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(ragione) in ('CONCERTO_TECNICO','COMPETENZA_TECNICA') AND tf.id_corr_glob IN ( SELECT system_id FROM (SELECT /* +(index r)*/ r.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'IGSS') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'IGSS') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I'))))))

query.name: S_PIANI_RIENTRO_RICEVUTI_MEF
query.value: SELECT pf.project_id AS project_id, d.system_id AS system_id, d.var_prof_oggetto AS oggetto, d.num_proto AS num_proto, d.dta_proto AS dta_proto, d.dta_annulla AS dta_annulla, d.var_aut_annulla AS aut_annulla, f.description AS description, f.dta_uo_lf AS dta_scadenza, a.var_desc_atto AS atto, d.var_segnatura AS segn, d.cha_tipo_proto AS tipo_proto, d.id_parent AS PARENT FROM PROFILE d, project f, project c, project_components pf, dpa_tipo_atto a WHERE d.id_registro = @param1@ AND d.system_id = pf.LINK AND d.id_tipo_atto = a.system_id AND d.cha_tipo_proto = 'A' AND dta_annulla IS NULL AND c.system_id = pf.project_id AND f.system_id = c.id_parent AND f.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND f.cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'P' AND c.cha_tipo_proj = 'C' AND pf.project_id NOT IN ( SELECT system_id FROM project WHERE UPPER (var_codice) = UPPER ('PFP') AND id_registro = @param1@) AND f.dta_uo_lf BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND dta_proto BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND f.system_id IN ( SELECT t.id_project FROM dpa_trasmissione t, dpa_trasm_singola b, dpa_ragione_trasm c WHERE t.system_id = b.id_trasmissione AND b.id_ragione = c.system_id AND b.cha_tipo_dest = 'R' AND b.id_corr_globale IN ( SELECT system_id FROM (SELECT /* +(index r)*/ r.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I'))))) AND t.id_project IS NOT NULL AND UPPER (c.var_desc_ragione) IN ('CONCERTO_TECNICO', 'COMPETENZA_TECNICA')) AND d.dta_proto @param4@ (SELECT MAX (t.dta_invio) FROM dpa_trasmissione t, dpa_trasm_singola b, dpa_ragione_trasm c WHERE t.system_id = b.id_trasmissione AND t.dta_invio BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND b.id_ragione = c.system_id AND b.cha_tipo_dest = 'R' AND b.id_corr_globale IN ( SELECT system_id FROM (SELECT /* +(index r)*/ r.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I'))))) AND UPPER (c.var_desc_ragione) IN ('CONCERTO_TECNICO', 'COMPETENZA_TECNICA') AND t.id_project = f.system_id)
