AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'IGSS') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I')))))) AND dta_proto @param4@ (SELECT MAX (dta_invio) FROM dpa_v_txfasc tf WHERE dta_invio BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') and upper(ragione) in ('CONCERTO_TECNICO','COMPETENZA_TECNICA') AND tf.id_corr_glob IN ( SELECT system_id FROM (SELECT /* +(index r)*/ r.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'IGSS') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'IGSS') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I'))))))

query.name: S_PIANI_RIENTRO_RICEVUTI_MEF_FP
query.value: SELECT pf.project_id AS project_id, d.system_id AS system_id, d.var_prof_oggetto AS oggetto, d.num_proto AS num_proto, d.dta_proto AS dta_proto, d.dta_annulla AS dta_annulla, d.var_aut_annulla AS aut_annulla, f.description AS description, f.dta_uo_lf AS dta_scadenza, a.var_desc_atto AS atto, d.var_segnatura AS segn, d.cha_tipo_proto AS tipo_proto, d.id_parent AS PARENT FROM PROFILE d, project f, project c, project_components pf, dpa_tipo_atto a WHERE d.id_registro = @param1@ AND d.system_id = pf.LINK AND d.id_tipo_atto = a.system_id AND d.cha_tipo_proto = 'A' AND dta_annulla IS NULL AND c.system_id = pf.project_id AND f.system_id = c.id_parent AND f.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND f.cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'P' AND c.cha_tipo_proj = 'C' AND pf.project_id IN ( SELECT system_id FROM project WHERE UPPER (var_codice) = UPPER ('PFP') AND id_registro = @param1@) --coincide con il periodo del report AND dta_proto BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') --coincide con il periodo del report AND f.system_id IN ( SELECT t.id_project FROM dpa_trasmissione t, dpa_trasm_singola b, dpa_ragione_trasm c WHERE t.system_id = b.id_trasmissione --and t.dta_invio between to_date('@param2@','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('@param3@','dd/mm/yyyy') --coincide con il periodo del report AND b.id_ragione = c.system_id AND b.cha_tipo_dest = 'R' AND b.id_corr_globale IN ( SELECT system_id FROM (SELECT /* +(index r)*/ r.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I'))))) AND t.id_project IS NOT NULL AND UPPER (c.var_desc_ragione) IN ('CONCERTO_TECNICO', 'COMPETENZA_TECNICA')) AND d.dta_proto @param4@ (SELECT MAX (t.dta_invio) FROM dpa_trasmissione t, dpa_trasm_singola b, dpa_ragione_trasm c WHERE t.system_id = b.id_trasmissione AND t.dta_invio BETWEEN TO_DATE ('@param2@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND TO_DATE ('@param3@', 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND b.id_ragione = c.system_id AND b.cha_tipo_dest = 'R' AND b.id_corr_globale IN ( SELECT system_id FROM (SELECT /* +(index r)*/ r.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I') UNION (SELECT u.system_id AS system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali u, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.people_system_id = u.id_people AND pg.groups_system_id IN ( SELECT /* +(index r)*/ id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali r WHERE r.id_uo IN ( SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali CONNECT BY PRIOR system_id = id_parent START WITH system_id = (SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE UPPER (var_cod_rubrica ) = 'DGPROG') --uo mef e sue uo sottoposte mef AND r.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND r.cha_tipo_ie = 'I'))))) AND UPPER (c.var_desc_ragione) IN ('CONCERTO_TECNICO', 'COMPETENZA_TECNICA') AND t.id_project = f.system_id)

query.name: S_PIANI_RIENTRO_TRASMESSI_REGIONE_FP
query.value: SELECT pf.project_id AS project_id, d.system_id AS system_id, d.var_prof_oggetto AS oggetto, d.num_proto AS num_proto, d.dta_proto AS dta_proto, d.dta_annulla AS dta_annulla, d.var_aut_annulla AS aut_annulla, f.description AS description, f.dta_uo_lf AS dta_scadenza, a.var_desc_atto AS atto, d.var_segnatura AS segn, d.cha_tipo_proto AS tipo_proto, doc.num_proto AS PARENT, doc.dta_proto AS parent_dta_proto, dpa_valore_oggetto_tipo_atto(d.id_tipo_atto, d.docnumber) AS stato FROM PROFILE d, PROFILE doc, project f,project_components pf, project c WHERE d.id_registro = @param1@ AND d.system_id = pf.LINK and d.id_tipo_atto = a.system_id AND d.cha_tipo_proto = 'P' and dta_annulla is null AND d.id_parent = doc.system_id AND c.system_id = pf.project_id AND f.system_id = c.id_parent AND f.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND f.cha_tipo_fascicolo = 'P' AND c.cha_tipo_proj = 'C' and pf.project_id in (select system_id from project where upper(var_codice)=upper('PFP') and id_registro = @param1@) and nvl(d.id_parent,0) > 0 and dta_proto between to_date('@param2@','dd/mm/yyyy') and to_date('@param3@','dd/mm/yyyy') ORDER BY pf.project_id ASC

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_DTA_VISTA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DTA_VISTA = @param1@, CHA_VISTA='1' WHERE (SYSTEM_ID = @param3@ OR SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT TU.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU,DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@param4@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=@param5@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID=TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND TS.CHA_TIPO_DEST= 'U') ) AND CHA_VALIDA='1' AND DTA_VISTA IS NULL

query.name: S_PROFILE_ANNULLAMENTO
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER=@param1@ AND DTA_ANNULLA IS NOT NULL

query.name: DELETE_SECURITY_VISIBILITA
query.value: DELETE FROM SECURITY WHERE THING=@param1@ AND PERSONORGROUP = @param2@

query.name: SELECT_ID_PROTOCOLLO_USCITA_ORIGINARIO
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT A.DOCNUMBER FROM PROFILE A, DPA_EL_REGISTRI B, DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR C WHERE A.ID_REGISTRO = B.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_PROFILE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND A.NUM_PROTO = @param1@ and num_anno_proto = @param3@ ANd B.VAR_CODICE = '@param2@' AND C.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST IN ('C', 'D')

query.name: GET_NODO_TITOLARIO_BY_CODICE
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT, DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE PROJECT.ID_AMM = DPA_AMMINISTRA.SYSTEM_ID AND VAR_CODICE = '@codice@' AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND PROJECT.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ @registro@ @idTitolario@

query.name: GET_NODO_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = P.ID_AMM AND P.SYSTEM_ID = @idTitolario@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_REGISTRO_DPA_REG_FASC
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_REG_FASC WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@idRegistro@

query.name: S_J_PROJECT__SECURITY_BIS
query.value: SELECT /*+INDEX (A) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_COD_LIV1, A.DESCRIPTION, A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_CODICE FROM PROJECT A WHERE @security@ AND A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ='T' AND (A.ID_REGISTRO IS NULL OR A.ID_REGISTRO=@param3@) @param4@ @param5@ ORDER BY A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.VAR_COD_LIV1

query.name: S_Project1_BIS
S_Project3_BIS
S_VAR_COD_LIV1_BIS
TITOLARIO_DELETE
query.value: DELETE FROM PROJECT WHERE (ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@ OR SYSTEM_ID = @idTitolario@) AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: TITOLARIO_INSERT
query.value: INSERT INTO project ( @colID@ DESCRIPTION, ICONIZED, CHA_TIPO_PROJ, VAR_CODICE, ID_AMM, NUM_LIVELLO, ID_PARENT, VAR_NOTE, DTA_APERTURA, CHA_STATO, VAR_COD_LIV1, CHA_RW, NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, ID_TITOLARIO, DTA_ATTIVAZIONE, MAX_LIV_TIT ) VALUES( @id@ '@description@', 'Y', 'T', '@varCodice@', @idAmm@, 0, 0, '@varNote@', SYSDATE, 'D', '0000', 'W', 0, 0, SYSDATE, @maxLivTit@ )

query.name: TITOLARIO_EXIST_IN_DEF
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND ID_PARENT = 0 AND CHA_STATO = 'D'

query.name: TITOLARIO_UPDATE
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET VAR_NOTE = '@varNote@', DESCRIPTION = '@description@', MAX_LIV_TIT = @maxLivTit@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: TITOLARIO_UPDATE_VAR_CHIAVE_FASC
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET VAR_CHIAVE_FASC = '@varChiaveFasc@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: TITOLARIO_SET_ATTIVO
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET CHA_STATO = 'A' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: TITOLARIO_SET_CESSATO
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET DTA_CESSAZIONE = SYSDATE, CHA_STATO = 'C' WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND CHA_STATO = 'A' AND ID_PARENT = 0 AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND ID_TITOLARIO = 0 AND VAR_CODICE = 'T'

query.name: TITOLARIO_GET_TITOLARI
query.value: SELECT P.*, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM PROJECT P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE P.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND P.ID_TITOLARIO = 0 AND P.ID_PARENT = 0 AND P.ID_AMM = A.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY P.CHA_STATO, P.DTA_CESSAZIONE DESC

query.name: S_NODO_TITOLARIO_SECURITY_2
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id as IDRECORD, a.var_codice as CODICE, a.description as DESCRIZIONE, a.num_livello as LIVELLO, a.id_registro as REGISTRO, a.id_parent as IDPARENT, a.var_cod_liv1 as CODLIV, a.cha_stato as STATO, a.dta_attivazione as DATA_ATTIVAZIONE, a.dta_cessazione as DATA_CESSAZIONE, a.num_mesi_conservazione as NUMMESICONSERVAZIONE, (SELECT count(b.system_id) FROM PROJECT b WHERE b.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND b.id_amm = @idAmm@ AND b.id_parent = a.system_id ) as FIGLIO FROM PROJECT a WHERE a.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND a.system_id = @systemIdTit@ ORDER BY a.var_cod_liv1

query.name: TITOLARIO_BY_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT P.*, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM PROJECT P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@ AND P.ID_AMM = A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: EXIST_TEMPLATES_FASC
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUMBER_TEMPLATES FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC

query.name: GET_TITOLARIO_ATTIVO
query.value: SELECT P.*, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM PROJECT P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE P.CHA_STATO = 'A' AND P.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND P.ID_TITOLARIO = 0 AND P.VAR_CODICE = 'T' AND P.ID_PARENT = 0 AND P.ID_AMM = A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: PASSWORD_CONFIG_GET_DATA
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ENABLE_PASSWORD_EXPIRATION, PASSWORD_EXPIRATION_DAYS, PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH, PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHAR_LIST FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID @idAmministrazione@

query.name: PASSWORD_CONFIG_GET_DATA_FROM_USER_ID
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.ENABLE_PASSWORD_EXPIRATION, A.PASSWORD_EXPIRATION_DAYS, A.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH, A.PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHAR_LIST FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA A, PEOPLE P WHERE UPPER(P.USER_ID) = UPPER('@userId@') AND A.SYSTEM_ID = P.ID_AMM

query.name: PASSWORD_CONFIG_SET_DATA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AMMINISTRA SET ENABLE_PASSWORD_EXPIRATION = @enablePasswordExpiration@, PASSWORD_EXPIRATION_DAYS = @passwordExpirationDays@, PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH = @passwordMinLength@, PASSWORD_SPECIAL_CHAR_LIST = @passwordSpecialChars@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID @idAmministrazione@

query.name: PASSWORD_DOMAIN_AUTH_ENABLED
query.value: SELECT VAR_DOMINIO FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID @idAmministrazione@

query.name: PASSWORD_EXPIRATION_SET_CREATION_DATE_ALL_USER
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLE SET PASSWORD_CREATION_DATE = @passwordCreationDate@ WHERE ID_AMM @idAmministrazione@

query.name: PASSWORD_EXPIRATION_EXPIRE_ALL
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLE SET PASSWORD_CREATION_DATE = NULL WHERE ID_AMM @idAmministrazione@ AND (CHA_AMMINISTRATORE IS NULL OR CHA_AMMINISTRATORE = '0')

query.name: USER_PASSWORD_GET_PASSWORD
query.value: SELECT P.ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD FROM PEOPLE P WHERE UPPER(P.USER_ID) = UPPER('@userId@')

query.name: USER_PASSWORD_SET_PASSWORD
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLE SET USER_PASSWORD = NULL, ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD = '@encryptedPassword@', PASSWORD_CREATION_DATE = @passwordCreationDate@ WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@userId@')

query.name: USER_PASSWORD_GET_DATA
query.value: SELECT P.PASSWORD_CREATION_DATE, P.PASSWORD_NEVER_EXPIRE, P.CHA_AMMINISTRATORE FROM PEOPLE P WHERE UPPER(P.USER_ID) = UPPER('@userId@')

query.name: USER_PASSWORD_SET_PASSWORD_NEVER_EXPIRE_OPTION
query.value: UPDATE PEOPLE SET PASSWORD_NEVER_EXPIRE = @passwordNeverExpire@ WHERE UPPER(USER_ID) = UPPER('@userId@') AND (CHA_AMMINISTRATORE IS NULL OR CHA_AMMINISTRATORE = '0')

query.name: AMM_GET_DETTAGLI_UTENTE_AMMINISTRATORE
query.value: SELECT p.system_id AS ID, p.cha_amministratore AS TIPO, p.var_nome AS NOME, p.var_cognome AS COGNOME, p.id_amm AS IDAMM, cg.system_id AS ID_CORR_GLOBALI FROM PEOPLE p,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI cg WHERE upper(user_id) = upper('@userId@') AND disabled = 'N' AND cha_amministratore in ('1','2','3') AND p.system_id = cg.id_people (+)

query.name: U_PROJECT_3
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID in (@idFascicolo@,@idFolder@)

query.name: S_SMISTADOC_GET_RUOLI_UO_SOTTOSTANTI_PROTO_SEMPL
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT CG.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, CG.ID_UO AS ID_UO, CG.ID_GRUPPO AS ID_GRUPPO, CG.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE_RUOLO, CG.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE_RUOLO, CG.CHA_RIFERIMENTO AS RUOLO_RIFERIMENTO, (case when TR.NUM_LIVELLO > @livello@ then 0 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO = @livello@ then 2 when TR.NUM_LIVELLO < @livello@ then 1 end ) AS GERARCHIA FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CG, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO TR, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG RR WHERE CG.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = TR.SYSTEM_ID AND RR.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = CG.SYSTEM_ID AND CG.ID_TIPO_RUOLO = TR.SYSTEM_ID AND RR.ID_REGISTRO IN (@param2@) AND RR.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CG.ID_UO = @param1@ AND CG.CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CG.DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: AMM_U_UPDATE_MSG_NOTIFICA_RAGIONE_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM SET @testoMsgNotificaDoc@ @testoMsgNotificaFasc@ WHERE ID_AMM=@idAmministrazione@ @paramAllRag@

query.name: S_NODI_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM project WHERE ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@ AND ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: TITOLARIO_DELETE_2
query.value: DELETE FROM project WHERE system_id = @idTitolario@

query.name: TITOLARIO_GET_NODI
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' @condRegistro@ ORDER BY VAR_COD_LIV1

query.name: REMOVE_USER_LOGIN_LOCK
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOGIN WHERE DST='@dst@'

query.name: HUMMY_I_MANUAL_CHECKOUT_DOCUMENT
HUMMY_D_MANUAL_CHECKOUT_DOCUMENT
query.value: DELETE FROM CHECKOUT WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: HUMMY_U_MANUAL_CHECKINOUT_DOCUMENT_STATE
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET STATUS = @status@ WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docNumber@

query.name: PD_GET_CAMPI_COMUNI_FASC
query.value: SELECT DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC WHERE DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT IS NULL AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_COMUNE = 1

query.name: PD_DELETE_CAMPI_COMUNI_FASC
query.value: DELETE DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGGETTO = @idOggettoCustom@ AND ID_PROJECT IS NULL

query.name: PD_INSERT_DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC
PD_DELETE_DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGG_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_UPDATE_DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC SET POSIZIONE = @posizione@ WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGG_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_IS_IN_USE_CAMPO_COMUNE_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC WHERE ID_TEMPLATE < > @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGGETTO = @idOggetto@ AND ID_PROJECT IS NULL

query.name: PD_INSERT_DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP
PD_DELETE_DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP WHERE ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND ID_OGG_CUSTOM = @idOggettoCustom@

query.name: PD_GET_CONT_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTATORI_DOC WHERE ID_OGG = @idOggetto@ AND ID_TIPOLOGIA = @idTipologia@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_CONTATORI_DOC.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: PD_UPDATE_CONT_DOC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CONTATORI_DOC SET VALORE = @valoreContatore@, ANNO = @anno@, VALORE_SC = @valoreSottocontatore@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idContatore@

query.name: PD_GET_CONT_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTATORI_FASC WHERE ID_OGG = @idOggetto@ AND ID_TIPOLOGIA = @idTipologia@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_CONTATORI_FASC.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: PD_UPDATE_CONT_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CONTATORI_FASC SET VALORE = @valoreContatore@, ANNO = @anno@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idContatore@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_TODO_LIST_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ID_TRASMISSIONE)) FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROFILE > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) @filters@

query.name: S_TODO_LIST_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @order@) AS RN, ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, DTAINVIO, DTA_SCAD_DESC, DTA_SCAD_ASC, UT_MITT, RUOLO_MITT, UT_DEST, RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, OGGETTO_MITTENTE, TIPO_PROTO, DTA_DOC, NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM,Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG FROM ( SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER')AS SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'OGGETTO_MITTENTE')AS OGGETTO_MITTENTE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'CHA_TIPO_PROTO')AS TIPO_PROTO, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DTA_DOC, vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'NUMPROTO') AS NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROFILE > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) @filters@ ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_TODO_LIST_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ID_TRASMISSIONE)) FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROJECT > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filters@

query.name: S_TODO_LIST_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @order@) AS RN, ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, DTAINVIO, DTA_SCAD_DESC,DTA_SCAD_ASC, UT_MITT, RUOLO_MITT, UT_DEST, RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROJECT, DESC_FASC, COD_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM FROM ( SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy')AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROJECT, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DESC_FASC')AS DESC_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'CODFASC') AS COD_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROJECT > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filters@ ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_INFO_TRASMISSIONI_EFFETTUATE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(system_id) FROM dpa_trasmissione WHERE @filters@

query.name: S_GET_INFO_TRASMISSIONI_EFFETTUATE
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.dta_invio DESC) AS RN, a.system_id, a.id_ruolo_in_uo as ruolo_system_id, g.var_cod_rubrica as ruolo_mittente, a.id_people as user_system_id, p.full_name as user_id, a.cha_tipo_oggetto, a.id_profile, a.id_project, @dtaInvio@ AS dta_invio, a.var_note_generali, a.cha_salvata_con_cessione, g.VAR_DESC_CORR as ruolo, p.user_id as us_id, a.id_people_delegato FROM dpa_trasmissione a INNER JOIN people p ON a.id_people = p.system_id INNER JOIN dpa_corr_globali g ON a.id_ruolo_in_uo = g.system_id WHERE @filters@ ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_INFO_TRASMISSIONI_RICEVUTE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ t.system_id FROM dpa_trasmissione t INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_singola ts ON t.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_utente tu ON ts.system_id = tu.id_trasm_singola WHERE @filters@ AND t.dta_invio IS NOT NULL AND ts.id_corr_globale = @idCorrGlobale@ AND tu.id_people = @idPeople@ UNION SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ t.system_id FROM dpa_trasmissione t INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_singola ts ON t.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_utente tu ON ts.system_id = tu.id_trasm_singola WHERE @filters@ AND t.dta_invio IS NOT NULL AND ts.id_corr_globale = @idPeopleCorrGlobale@ )

query.name: S_GET_INFO_TRASMISSIONI_RICEVUTE
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY data_invio DESC) AS RN, system_id, cha_tipo_dest, ruolo_system_id, ruolo, user_system_id, user_id, cha_tipo_oggetto, id_profile, id_project, dta_invio, var_note_generali, id_ragione, ragione, dta_scadenza, cha_salvata_con_cessione, ruolo_mittente, us_id, id_people_delegato FROM ( SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ t.system_id, ts.cha_tipo_dest, ts.id_corr_globale as ruolo_system_id, getDescCorr(t.id_ruolo_in_uo) as ruolo, t.id_people as user_system_id, getPeopleName(t.id_people) as user_id, t.cha_tipo_oggetto, t.id_profile, t.id_project, t.dta_invio AS data_invio, @dtaInvio@ AS dta_invio, t.var_note_generali, ts.id_ragione, rt.var_desc_ragione AS ragione, @dtaScadenza@ AS dta_scadenza, t.cha_salvata_con_cessione, GETCODRUBRICACORR(t.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO) as ruolo_mittente, GETPEOPLEUSERID(t.id_people) as us_id, t.id_people_delegato FROM dpa_trasmissione t INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_singola ts ON t.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_utente tu ON ts.system_id = tu.id_trasm_singola INNER JOIN dpa_ragione_trasm rt ON ts.id_ragione = rt.system_id WHERE @filters@ AND t.dta_invio IS NOT NULL AND ts.id_corr_globale = @idPeopleCorrGlobale@ UNION SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ t.system_id, ts.cha_tipo_dest, ts.id_corr_globale as ruolo_system_id, getDescCorr(t.id_ruolo_in_uo) as ruolo, t.id_people as user_system_id, getPeopleName(t.id_people) as user_id, t.cha_tipo_oggetto, t.id_profile, t.id_project, t.dta_invio AS data_invio, @dtaInvio@ AS dta_invio, t.var_note_generali, ts.id_ragione, rt.var_desc_ragione AS ragione, @dtaScadenza@ AS dta_scadenza, t.cha_salvata_con_cessione, GETCODRUBRICACORR(t.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO) as ruolo_mittente, GETPEOPLEUSERID(t.id_people) as us_id, t.id_people_delegato FROM dpa_trasmissione t INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_singola ts ON t.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione INNER JOIN dpa_trasm_utente tu ON ts.system_id = tu.id_trasm_singola INNER JOIN dpa_ragione_trasm rt ON ts.id_ragione = rt.system_id WHERE @filters@ AND t.dta_invio IS NOT NULL AND ts.id_corr_globale = @idCorrGlobale@ AND tu.id_people = @idPeople@ ORDER BY dta_invio DESC)) WHERE rn BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_INFO_TRASMISSIONI_FILTERED
query.value: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.system_id) FROM dpa_trasmissione a @from@ INNER JOIN people p ON a.id_people = p.system_id INNER JOIN dpa_corr_globali g ON a.id_ruolo_in_uo = g.system_id WHERE @filters@

query.name: S_GET_INFO_TRASMISSIONI_FILTERED
query.value:
select distinct
system_id, ruolo_system_id, ruolo_mittente, user_system_id, user_id, cha_tipo_oggetto, id_profile, id_project, dta_invio, var_note_generali, cha_salvata_con_cessione, ruolo, us_id, id_people_delegato
from ( select /*+ FIRST_ROWS(n) */ a.*, ROWNUM rnum from ( SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.dta_invio DESC) AS RN, a.system_id, a.id_ruolo_in_uo as ruolo_system_id, g.var_cod_rubrica as ruolo_mittente, a.id_people as user_system_id, p.full_name as user_id, a.cha_tipo_oggetto, a.id_profile, a.id_project, @dtaInvio@ AS dta_invio, a.var_note_generali, a.cha_salvata_con_cessione, g.VAR_DESC_CORR as ruolo, p.user_id as us_id, a.id_people_delegato FROM dpa_trasmissione a @from@ INNER JOIN people p ON a.id_people = p.system_id INNER JOIN dpa_corr_globali g ON a.id_ruolo_in_uo = g.system_id WHERE @filters@ ) a where ROWNUM <= @endRow@ ) where rnum >= @startRow@

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_RF_RUOLO_REG
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_l_ruolo_reg WHERE id_ruolo_in_uo NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT id_ruolo_in_uo FROM dpa_l_ruolo_reg WHERE id_registro IN (@idAooColl@)) AND id_registro = @idRF@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_RF_REGISTRO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE CHA_RF = 1 AND ID_AOO_COLLEGATA = @idRegistro@

query.name: S_J_DPA_L_RUOLO_REG_REGISTRI_E_RF
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE, A.NUM_RIF, A.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO, A.VAR_EMAIL_REGISTRO, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_AMM, @param1@ FROM DPA_L_RUOLO_REG B, DPA_EL_REGISTRI A WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_REGISTRO AND @param2@ @param4@ ORDER BY @param3@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_OGGETTI_ASSOCIATI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_OGGETTARIO WHERE ID_REGISTRO=@idElemento@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_COUNT_CORRISPONDENTI_ASSOCIATI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE CHA_TIPO_IE = 'E' AND ID_REGISTRO = @idElemento@

query.name: S_DPAOggettario
query.value: SELECT /*+INDEX (DPA_OGGETTARIO) */@param1@ FROM DPA_OGGETTARIO WHERE @param2@

query.name: GET_RUOLI_ASSOCIATI_REGISTRO_RF
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID AS IDRUOLO, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICE, A.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO AS GRUPPO, A.ID_AMM AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG B WHERE B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_REGISTRO = @idRegistro@

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_RUOLI_RICERCA
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID AS IDCORRGLOBALE, A.ID_GRUPPO AS IDGRUPPO, A.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA AS CODICERUBRICA, A.VAR_DESC_CORR AS DESCRIZIONE, A.ID_AMM AS IDAMMINISTRAZIONE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE exists (select 'x' from DPA_L_RUOLO_REG B where A.SYSTEM_ID = B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO AND B.DTA_FINE IS NULL) @param4@ @param1@ AND A.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND A.ID_AMM = @param2@ @param3@

query.name: S_J_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI__TIPO_F_RUOLO__TIPO_FUNZIONE__TIPO_RUOLO__CORR_GLOBALI__L_RUOLO_REG_2
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.VAR_CODICE, A.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, D.VAR_DESC_RUOLO, A.ID_GRUPPO, A.ID_UO, D.NUM_LIVELLO, E.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A, DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO B, DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE C, DPA_TIPO_RUOLO D, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI E, DPA_L_RUOLO_REG F WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R' AND F.ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND B.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.ID_TIPO_FUNZ = C.SYSTEM_ID AND C.VAR_COD_TIPO = '@prau@' AND D.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_TIPO_RUOLO AND E.SYSTEM_ID = A.ID_UO AND F.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = A.SYSTEM_ID AND C.ID_AMM = @param2@ AND (A.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM <> '1' OR A.CHA_DISABLED_TRASM IS NULL)

query.name: PD_DISABLE_CONT_DOC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CONTATORI_DOC SET ABILITATO = 0 WHERE ID_OGG = @idOgg@

query.name: PD_DISABLE_CONT_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CONTATORI_FASC SET ABILITATO = 0 WHERE ID_OGG = @idOgg@

query.name: PD_INSERT_CONT_DOC
PD_INSERT_CONT_FASC
PD_EXIST_CONT_DOC
query.value:
SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTATORI_DOC WHERE ID_OGG = @idOggetto@ AND ID_TIPOLOGIA = @idTipologia@
@param1@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_CONTATORI_DOC.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: PD_EXIST_CONT_FASC
query.value:
SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTATORI_FASC WHERE ID_TIPOLOGIA = @idTipologia@
@param1@ FOR UPDATE OF DPA_CONTATORI_FASC.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: PD_GET_CONT_DOC_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTATORI_DOC WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: PD_GET_CONT_FASC_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CONTATORI_FASC WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: DO_GET_IDPROFILE_BY_DATA_DOC_GRIGIO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE P WHERE P.DOCNUMBER = @ID_DOC@ AND NVL(P.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' --and (checkSecurityDocumento(P.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGruppo@,'D') > 0)

query.name: PD_IS_DOC_REPERTORIATO
query.value: select DISTINCT(profile.docnumber) from profile, dpa_associazione_templates, dpa_oggetti_custom where profile.docnumber = dpa_associazione_templates.doc_number and dpa_associazione_templates.id_oggetto = dpa_oggetti_custom.system_id and profile.docnumber = @docNumber@ and dpa_associazione_templates.id_template = @idTipoAtto@ and dpa_oggetti_custom.repertorio = 1 and dpa_associazione_templates.valore_oggetto_db is not null

query.name: U_DPA_TRASM_UTENTE_RIFIUTATA_NEW2
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TRASM_UTENTE SET DTA_RIFIUTATA = @param1@, DTA_VISTA = (CASE WHEN DTA_VISTA IS NULL THEN SYSDATE ELSE DTA_VISTA END), CHA_VISTA = (CASE WHEN DTA_VISTA IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) @param2@ WHERE (SYSTEM_ID = @param3@ OR SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT TU.SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE TU,DPA_TRASMISSIONE TX,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA TS WHERE TU.ID_PEOPLE=@param4@ AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=TS.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND TX.SYSTEM_ID=@param5@ AND TS.SYSTEM_ID=TU.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND TS.CHA_TIPO_DEST= 'U' AND TX.DTA_INVIO is not null) ) AND CHA_VALIDA='1'

query.name: S_COUNT_FASCICOLI_PAGING
S_FASCICOLI_PAGING
query.value: SELECT a.*,getAccessRights(@idGrp@,@idPeo@,a.system_id) as accessrights,getCodtit(a.id_parent) as codTit, getInConservazione(null, a.system_id,'F', @idPeo@, @idGrp@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE @tipoContatore_cond@ FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @customOrder@) as rn, a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note,@dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,a.AUTHOR, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.ID_UO_CREATORE, a.cha_controllato, a.cha_consenti_class, a.ID_RUOLO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_UO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_AUTHOR_CHIUSURA, a.DTA_APERTURA AS DTA_APERTURA_ORDER, a.DTA_CHIUSURA AS DTA_CHIUSURA_ORDER, a.id_titolario, @adl@ @customFieldForOrder@ FROM project a @tblCL1@ WHERE @security@ AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' @idReg@ @whereTlbCL1@ @guiFilters@ ) a WHERE rn BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@ --order by contatoreOrdinamento desc

query.name: S_REPORT_AV_1
query.value: SELECT upper(getcodreg (pr.id_registro)) AS REGISTRO, upper(getdesccorr (tx.id_ruolo_in_uo)) AS RUOLO, upper(getpeoplename (tx.id_people)) AS UTENTE, upper(vardescribe (ts.id_ragione, 'RAGIONETRASM')) AS RAGIONE, count(*) AS TOT FROM dpa_trasmissione tx, dpa_trasm_singola ts, --dpa_trasm_utente tu, profile pr, dpa_ragione_trasm rt WHERE tx.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione --AND ts.system_id = tu.id_trasm_singola AND tx.id_profile = pr.system_id AND ts.id_ragione = rt.system_id @condWhere@ GROUP BY (getcodreg (pr.id_registro), getdesccorr (tx.id_ruolo_in_uo), getpeoplename (tx.id_people), vardescribe (ts.id_ragione, 'RAGIONETRASM'))

query.name: S_REPORT_AV_2
query.value: SELECT upper(getcodreg (id_registro)) AS REGISTRO, upper(vardescribe (id_ruolo_dest, 'DESC_RUOLO')) AS RUOLO, upper(vardescribe (id_ragione_trasm, 'RAGIONETRASM')) AS RAGIONE, count(*) AS TOT FROM dpa_todolist WHERE id_ruolo_dest not in (0) @condWhere@ GROUP BY (getcodreg (id_registro), vardescribe (id_ruolo_dest,'DESC_RUOLO'), vardescribe (id_ragione_trasm, 'RAGIONETRASM'))

query.name: S_REPORT_AV_3
query.value: SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile6)*/ upper(getcodreg (id_registro)) AS REGISTRO , sum(getprotocollato(system_id,'T','@abilProtInt@')) AS PROTOCOLLATI, sum(getprotocollato(system_id,'A','@abilProtInt@')) AS ARRIVO, sum(getprotocollato(system_id,'P','@abilProtInt@')) AS PARTENZA, @protInterni@ sum(GetDocFascicolato(SYSTEM_ID)) AS FASCICOLATI, sum(decode(dta_annulla,null,0,1)) AS ANNULLATI, sum(to_number(getimg(docnumber))) AS IMMAGINE FROM profile WHERE cha_tipo_proto not in ('R','G') AND nvl(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' and cha_in_archivio <> '1' @condWhere@ GROUP BY id_registro ORDER BY getcodreg (id_registro)

query.name: S_REPORT_AV_4
query.value: SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile6)*/ upper(getcodreg (id_registro)) AS REGISTRO, upper(GETDESCCORR(id_ruolo_prot)) AS RUOLO, sum(getprotocollato(system_id,'T','@abilProtInt@')) AS PROTOCOLLATI, sum(getprotocollato(system_id,'A','@abilProtInt@')) AS ARRIVO, sum(getprotocollato(system_id,'P','@abilProtInt@')) AS PARTENZA, @protInterni@ sum(GetDocFascicolato(SYSTEM_ID)) AS FASCICOLATI, sum(decode(dta_annulla,null,0,1)) AS ANNULLATI, sum(to_number(getimg(docnumber))) as IMMAGINE FROM profile WHERE cha_tipo_proto not in ('R','G') AND nvl(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' and cha_in_archivio <> '1' @condWhere@ GROUP BY id_registro, GETDESCCORR(id_ruolo_prot) ORDER BY getcodreg (id_registro)

query.name: RF_EXIST
query.value: select count(*) from dpa_el_registri where id_amm = @idAmm@ and cha_rf = '1'

query.name: I_INSERT_NOTA
U_UPDATE_NOTA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_NOTE SET Testo = '@testo@', TipoVisibilita = '@tipoVisibilita@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @id@

query.name: D_DELETE_NOTA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_NOTE N WHERE N.SYSTEM_ID = @id@

query.name: S_GET_NOTA
query.value: SELECT N.SYSTEM_ID, N.TESTO, N.DATACREAZIONE, N.IDUTENTECREATORE, N.IDRUOLOCREATORE, N.TIPOVISIBILITA, N.TIPOOGGETTOASSOCIATO, N.IDOGGETTOASSOCIATO, N.IDRFASSOCIATO, P.USER_ID, P.FULL_NAME, G.GROUP_ID, G.GROUP_NAME, N.IDPEOPLEDELEGATO FROM DPA_NOTE N LEFT JOIN People P ON N.IDUTENTECREATORE = P.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN Groups G ON N.IDRUOLOCREATORE = G.SYSTEM_ID WHERE N.SYSTEM_ID = @id@ AND (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'T' OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'F' and N.IDRFASSOCIATO in (select id_registro from dpa_l_ruolo_reg rr where rr.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @idRuoloCorrGlobali@)) OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'P' AND N.IDUTENTECREATORE = @idUtenteCreatore@) OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'R' AND N.IDRUOLOCREATORE = @idRuoloCreatore@))

query.name: S_GET_NOTE
query.value: SELECT N.SYSTEM_ID, N.TESTO, N.DATACREAZIONE, N.IDUTENTECREATORE, N.IDRUOLOCREATORE, N.TIPOVISIBILITA, N.TIPOOGGETTOASSOCIATO, N.IDOGGETTOASSOCIATO, N.IDRFASSOCIATO, P.USER_ID, P.FULL_NAME, G.GROUP_ID, G.GROUP_NAME, N.IDPEOPLEDELEGATO FROM DPA_NOTE N LEFT JOIN People P ON N.IDUTENTECREATORE = P.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN Groups G ON N.IDRUOLOCREATORE = G.SYSTEM_ID WHERE N.TIPOOGGETTOASSOCIATO = '@tipoOggetto@' AND N.IDOGGETTOASSOCIATO = @idOggetto@ AND (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'T' OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'F' and N.IDRFASSOCIATO in (select id_registro from dpa_l_ruolo_reg rr where rr.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @idRuoloCorrGlobali@)) OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'P' AND N.IDUTENTECREATORE = @idUtenteCreatore@) OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'R' AND N.IDRUOLOCREATORE = @idRuoloCreatore@)) @filtro@ ORDER BY N.DATACREAZIONE DESC

query.name: S_GET_ULTIMA_NOTA_INSERITA
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT N.SYSTEM_ID, N.TESTO, N.DATACREAZIONE, N.IDUTENTECREATORE, N.IDRUOLOCREATORE, N.TIPOVISIBILITA, N.TIPOOGGETTOASSOCIATO, N.IDOGGETTOASSOCIATO, N.IDRFASSOCIATO, P.USER_ID, P.FULL_NAME, G.GROUP_ID, G.GROUP_NAME, N.IDPEOPLEDELEGATO FROM DPA_NOTE N LEFT JOIN People P ON N.IDUTENTECREATORE = P.SYSTEM_ID LEFT JOIN Groups G ON N.IDRUOLOCREATORE = G.SYSTEM_ID WHERE N.TIPOOGGETTOASSOCIATO = '@tipoOggetto@' AND N.IDOGGETTOASSOCIATO = @idOggetto@ AND (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'T' OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'F' and N.IDRFASSOCIATO in (select id_registro from dpa_l_ruolo_reg rr where rr.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = @idRuoloCorrGlobali@)) OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'P' AND N.IDUTENTECREATORE = @idUtenteCreatore@) OR (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'R' AND N.IDRUOLOCREATORE = @idRuoloCreatore@)) ORDER BY N.DATACREAZIONE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: S_GET_VISIBILITA_NOTA
query.value: SELECT TIPOVISIBILITA FROM DPA_NOTE WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @id@

query.name: S_IS_CREATORE_NOTA
query.value: SELECT COUNT(N.SYSTEM_ID) FROM DPA_NOTE N WHERE N.SYSTEM_ID = @id@ AND N.IDUTENTECREATORE = @idUtenteCreatore@

query.name: S_LOG_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO, A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE FROM DPA_LOG A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO = '@param2@' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE != 'OPEN_DET_DOC' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA UNION ALL SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO, A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE FROM DPA_LOG_STORICO A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO = '@param2@' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE != 'OPEN_DET_DOC' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA ) A ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_LOG_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO FROM DPA_LOG A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO IN ('FOLDER', 'FASCICOLO') AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA UNION ALL SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO FROM DPA_LOG_STORICO A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO IN ('FOLDER', 'FASCICOLO') AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA ) A ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_LOG_ATTIVI_AMM
query.value: SELECT a.VAR_CODICE as CODICE, a.VAR_DESCRIZIONE as DESCRIZIONE, a.VAR_OGGETTO as OGGETTO, VAR_METODO as METODO, 1 as ATTIVO FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG a , DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI b WHERE a.system_id = b.system_id_anagrafica AND b.id_amm = @param1@ AND a.VAR_CODICE like 'AMM_%' ORDER BY a.VAR_OGGETTO

query.name: J_LOG_ATTIVI_DISATTIVI_AMM
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.VAR_CODICE AS CODICE, a.VAR_DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE, a.VAR_OGGETTO AS OGGETTO, VAR_METODO AS METODO, 0 AS ATTIVO FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG a , DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI b WHERE a.system_id NOT IN (SELECT system_id_anagrafica FROM DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI WHERE id_amm = @param1@) AND b.ID_AMM = @param1@ AND a.VAR_CODICE like 'AMM_%' ORDER BY a.VAR_OGGETTO

query.name: S_LOG_DISATTIVI_AMM
query.value: SELECT VAR_CODICE as CODICE, VAR_DESCRIZIONE as DESCRIZIONE, VAR_OGGETTO as OGGETTO, VAR_METODO as METODO, 0 as ATTIVO FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG WHERE VAR_CODICE like 'AMM_%' ORDER BY VAR_OGGETTO

query.name: D_LOG_ATTIVATI_AMM
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI WHERE ID_AMM = @param1@ AND SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG WHERE VAR_CODICE LIKE 'AMM_%')

query.name: I_DPALOG_STORICO
S_NUM_RECORD
query.value: SELECT NUM_RECORD, CHA_ARCHIVIAZIONE_LOG FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: U_NUM_RECORD
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AMMINISTRA SET CHA_ARCHIVIAZIONE_LOG = '@param2@', NUM_RECORD = @param3@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_RIC_DOC
query.value: SELECT a.*,getchaimg(A.docnumber) as CHA_IMG,getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL,getInConservazione(A.SYSTEM_ID, null,'D', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE, getchafirmato(A.docnumber) as CHA_FIRMATO @tipo_doc_cond@ @searchValueCustom@ FROM ( SELECT @index@ ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @order@) AS RN, A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(A.DTA_PROTO,A.CREATION_TIME) AS DATA, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, A.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR, a.prot_tit as PROT_TIT @customFieldFilter@ FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id @from@ WHERE @security@ @filters@ @unionStampe@ ) a WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@ --order by contatore_ordinamento Desc

query.name: S_RIC_DOC_VELOCE
query.value: SELECT a.*,getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL, getInConservazione(A.SYSTEM_ID, null,'D', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE,getchaimg(A.docnumber) as CHA_IMG , getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, SYSTEM_ID, DOCNUMBER, DTA_ANNULLA, VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, ID_REGISTRO, CHA_TIPO_PROTO, CHA_EVIDENZA, NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(DTA_PROTO,CREATION_DATE) AS DATA, CREATION_DATE, NUM_PROTO, VAR_SEGNATURA, DTA_PROTO, CHA_IMG, CHA_PRIVATO, CHA_PERSONALE, ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, ID_TIPO_ATTO, DESC_TIPO_ATTO, AUTHOR FROM ( SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE,A.AUTHOR,A.CHA_IMG, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id WHERE @security@ @filters@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC @unionStampe@ ) WHERE ROWNUM < = @rowCount@ ) a WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: MODELLI_TRASM_UTENTI_CON_NOTIFICA
query.value: select p.system_id as ID, p.user_id as CODICE, p.FULL_NAME as UTENTE, cg.VAR_DESC_CORR as RUOLO, getflagnotifica(@id_mod_mitt_dest@,p.system_id) as FLAG_NOTIFICA, p.var_cognome from people p, peoplegroups pg, dpa_corr_globali cg where cg.system_id = @id_corr_glob_ruolo@ and cg.id_gruppo = pg.groups_system_id and pg.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = p.system_id and pg.DTA_FINE is null order by p.var_cognome asc

query.name: MODELLI_TRASM_UTENTI_CON_NOTIFICA_P
query.value: select p.system_id as ID, p.user_id as CODICE, p.FULL_NAME as UTENTE, '' as RUOLO, getflagnotifica(@id_mod_mitt_dest@,p.system_id) as FLAG_NOTIFICA from people p where p.system_id = (select id_people from dpa_corr_globali where system_id = @id_corr_glob@) and p.disabled = 'N'

query.name: MODELLI_TRASM_DEL_UT_CON_NOTIFICA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_MODELLI_DEST_CON_NOTIFICA WHERE @id@

query.name: MODELLI_TRASM_INS_UT_CON_NOTIFICA
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_MODELLI_DEST_CON_NOTIFICA (@colID@ ID_MODELLO_MITT_DEST,ID_PEOPLE,ID_MODELLO) VALUES (@system_id@ @id_mod_mitt_dest@, @id_people@, @id_modello@)

query.name: MODELLI_TRASM_CESSIONE_DIRITTI
query.value: UPDATE DPA_MODELLI_TRASM SET CHA_CEDE_DIRITTI = '@flag_cessione@', ID_PEOPLE_NEW_OWNER = @id_people_new_owner@, ID_GROUP_NEW_OWNER = @id_group_new_owner@ WHERE @queryWhere@

query.name: S_UTENTI_BY_GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT p.system_id, p.user_id, p.full_name, p.matricola FROM people p, peoplegroups pg WHERE p.system_id = pg.people_system_id AND p.disabled = 'N' AND pg.dta_fine IS NULL AND pg.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID in( select id_gruppo from dpa_corr_globali where system_id = @param1@ )

query.name: GET_NUM_UTENTI_ATTIVI
query.value: select count(*) from people where id_amm = @param1@ and disabled = 'N'

query.name: GET_NUM_UTENTI_CONNESSI
query.value: select count(*) from DPA_LOGIN where id_amm = @param1@

query.name: S_DPAELRegistri_AMMINISTRA
query.value: SELECT (A.VAR_CODICE || ' - ' || A.VAR_DESC_REGISTRO) as VAR_DESC_REGISTRO, B.VAR_CODICE_AMM, B.VAR_DESC_AMM FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI A, DPA_AMMINISTRA B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = @param1@ AND B.SYSTEM_ID=A.ID_AMM

query.name: S_AMM_GET_LIST_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE
query.value: SELECT distinct a.system_id AS IDSYSTEM_MS, a.description AS DESCRIPTION, a.CHA_TIPO_CANALE AS CHA_TIPO_CANALE, a.DISABLED as DISABLED FROM DOCUMENTTYPES A WHERE CHA_TIPO_CANALE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DESCRIPTION

query.name: S_DPA_AMMINISTRA3_TIMBRO
AMM_S_CHECK_UNIQUE_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE DESCRIPTION='@descrizione@' AND DISABLED IS NULL

query.name: AMM_I_INSERT_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DOCUMENTTYPES ( SYSTEM_ID, TYPE_ID, DESCRIPTION, CHA_TIPO_CANALE ) VALUES ( @id@, '@typeId@', '@description@', '@chaTipoCanale@' )

query.name: AMM_S_GET_DESC_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE
query.value: SELECT TR.DESCRIPTION FROM DOCUMENTTYPES TR WHERE TR.SYSTEM_ID=@idMezzoSpedizione@ AND DISABLED IS NULL

query.name: AMM_U_UPDATE_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DOCUMENTTYPES SET DESCRIPTION='@descrizione@', CHA_TIPO_CANALE='@cha_tipo_canale@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@ AND DISABLED IS NULL

query.name: AMM_S_GET_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE
query.value: SELECT TR.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE, TR.CHA_TIPO_CANALE AS CHA_TIPO_CANALE, TR.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIZIONE, TR.TYPE_ID AS TYPE_ID, TR.DISABLED AS DISABLED FROM DOCUMENTTYPES TR WHERE TR.SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@ AND DISABLED IS NULL

query.name: AMM_D_DELETE_MEZZO_SPEDIZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DOCUMENTTYPES SET DISABLED = 'Y' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemID@

query.name: I_COLL_MSPEDIZ_DOCUMENTO
S_TRASM_UNO_TUTTI_ACC_RIF
query.value: SELECT count(DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.SYSTEM_ID) as CONTA FROM DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE WHERE DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.system_id = DPA_TRASM_UTENTE.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA AND DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA.SYSTEM_ID = @idTrasmSingola@ @queryWhere@

query.name: U_COLL_MSPEDIZ_DOCUMENTO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_COLL_MSPEDIZ_DOCUMENTO SET ID_DOCUMENTTYPES = @idDocumenttypes@ WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@ AND IDAMM = @idAmm@

query.name: D_COLL_MSPEDIZ_DOCUMENTO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_COLL_MSPEDIZ_DOCUMENTO WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@ AND IDAMM = @idAmm@

query.name: S_DPA_COLL_MSPEDIZ_DOC
query.value: SELECT B.SYSTEM_ID AS MEZZOSPEDIZIONE, B.DESCRIPTION AS DESCMEZZOSPEDIZIONE FROM DPA_COLL_MSPEDIZ_DOCUMENTO A, DOCUMENTTYPES B WHERE A.ID_DOCUMENTTYPES = B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_PROFILE = @param1@

query.name: S_UTENTE_RESP_AOO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, VAR_CODICE FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE ID_PEOPLE_AOO = @idPeople@

query.name: S_GET_RUOLO_RESP_UO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_GRUPPO, ID_TIPO_RUOLO, VAR_CODICE, VAR_COD_RUBRICA, VAR_DESC_CORR, CHA_RIFERIMENTO, ID_AMM, CHA_RESPONSABILE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE ID_UO = @idUo@ AND CHA_RESPONSABILE ='1' AND DTA_FINE IS NULL

query.name: U_DPAOggettario
query.value: UPDATE DPA_OGGETTARIO SET ID_REGISTRO = @idRegistro@, CHA_OCCASIONALE = '0', VAR_DESC_OGGETTO = '@param1@' WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_OGGETTO) = '@varCodOggetto@' AND ID_AMM = @param2@

query.name: S_DPA_EL_REG
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE @param1@

query.name: U_PULS_COLOR
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AMMINISTRA SET PULS_COLOR = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_FONT_COLOR
query.value: SELECT FONTCOLOR FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: U_FONT_COLOR
query.value: UPDATE DPA_AMMINISTRA SET FONTCOLOR = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_PULS_COLOR
query.value: SELECT PULS_COLOR FROM DPA_AMMINISTRA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_IS_RUOLO_PRAU
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_F_RUOLO WHERE id_Ruolo_in_uo= @id_ruolo_creatore@ AND ID_TIPO_FUNZ IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_TIPO_FUNZIONE WHERE UPPER(VAR_COD_TIPO)='PRAU')

query.name: S_IS_PROTOCOLLATO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(NUM_PROTO) FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @idprofile@

query.name: UPDATE_TRASM_UTENTE_TOGLIE_TODOLIST
query.value: update dpa_trasm_utente set cha_in_todolist = '0', dta_rimozione_todolist = @data_rimozione@ where cha_in_todolist = '1' and id_trasm_singola in (select ts.system_id from dpa_trasm_singola ts, dpa_trasmissione t where ts.cha_tipo_dest = 'R' and ts.id_corr_globale = (select system_id from dpa_corr_globali where id_gruppo = @idgruppo@) and id_trasmissione = t.system_id and (t.id_profile = @idoggetto@ or id_project = @idoggetto@))

query.name: S_GET_INFO_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, @dtaAnnulla@ AS DTA_ANNULLA, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, @creationDate@ AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.ID_TIPO_ATTO, @dtaProto@ AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR, TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO DESC_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE A LEFT JOIN DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA ON A.ID_TIPO_ATTO = TA.SYSTEM_ID WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @idProfile@) AND (checkSecurityDocumento(A.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGroup@,'D') > 0)

query.name: S_GET_INFO_DOCUMENTO_NO_SECURITY
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, @dtaAnnulla@ AS DTA_ANNULLA, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, @creationDate@ AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.ID_TIPO_ATTO, @dtaProto@ AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR, TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO DESC_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE A LEFT JOIN DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA ON A.ID_TIPO_ATTO = TA.SYSTEM_ID WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @idProfile@)

query.name: S_GET_SCHEDA_DOCUMENTO
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DOCNAME, A.STATUS, A.DOCSERVER_LOC, A.PATH, @creationDate@ AS CREATION_DATE, @creationTime@ AS CREATION_TIME, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.ID_OGGETTO, A.NUM_PROTO, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, A.VAR_PROTO_EME, @dtaProtoEme@ AS DTA_PROTO_EME, A.CHA_ASSEGNATO, A.VAR_COGNOME_EME, A.VAR_NOME_EME, A.ID_PARENT, @dtaProto@ AS DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_MOD_OGGETTO, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_DEST, A.CHA_MOD_MITT_INT, A.VAR_PROTO_IN, A.ID_ANNULLATORE, A.VAR_AUT_ANNULLA, A.CHA_INVIO_CONFERMA, @dtaProtoIn@ AS DTA_PROTO_IN, @dtaAnnulla@ AS DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, A.CHA_DA_PROTO, A.CHA_FASCICOLATO, A.ID_TIPO_ATTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, D.TYPE_ID, D.DESCRIPTION, A.ID_PEOPLE_PROT, A.ID_RUOLO_PROT, A.ID_UO_PROT, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, A.AUTHOR, A.CHA_INTEROP, A.DTA_SCADENZA, A.CHA_IN_CESTINO, getAccessRights(@idGroup@, @idPeople@, A.SYSTEM_ID) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, A.PROT_TIT, A.NUM_IN_FASC, A.ID_FASC_PROT_TIT, A.NUM_PROT_TIT, A.ID_TITOLARIO, A.CHA_RIFF_MITT, A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, A.CHA_DOCUMENTO_DA_PEC, A.FORWARDING_SOURCE, A.LAST_FORWARD, A.PRINTS_NUM, A.CHA_COD_T_A, A.COD_EXT_APP, getInConservazione(A.DOCNUMBER,'','D', @idPeople@,@idGroup@) as inConservazione FROM PROFILE A, DOCUMENTTYPES D WHERE A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND (checkSecurityDocumento(A.SYSTEM_ID, @idPeople@, @idGroup@,'D') > 0) AND @pk@

query.name: GET_LAST_VERSION_ALLEGATO_ESTESO
query.value: SELECT COUNT(VERSION_LABEL) FROM VERSIONS WHERE DOCNUMBER IN (SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE = @docNumber@)

query.name: U_DPAOggettario2
query.value: UPDATE DPA_OGGETTARIO SET CHA_OCCASIONALE = '1' WHERE UPPER(VAR_DESC_OGGETTO) = '@param1@' AND ID_AMM = @param2@ @param3@

query.name: S_FOLDER_BY_DESCR
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_PROJ6) index (B INDX_SEC5) */ DISTINCT(P.SYSTEM_ID) AS ID_FOLDER, P.ID_PARENT AS ID_PARENT_FOLDER, P.ID_FASCICOLO ID_FASCICOLO, P.DESCRIPTION FOLDER_DESCRIPTION, P.cha_tipo_fascicolo FROM PROJECT P, SECURITY B WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=B.THING AND P.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ @param5@ AND ( B.PERSONORGROUP=@param2@ OR B.PERSONORGROUP=@param3@ ) @param4@ AND B.ACCESSRIGHTS >= 0 ORDER BY DESCRIPTION ASC

query.name: S_FOLDER_BY_IDFASC
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_PROJ6) index (B INDX_SEC5) */ DISTINCT(P.SYSTEM_ID) AS ID_FOLDER, P.ID_PARENT AS ID_PARENT_FOLDER, P.ID_FASCICOLO ID_FASCICOLO, P.DESCRIPTION FOLDER_DESCRIPTION, P.cha_tipo_fascicolo FROM PROJECT P, SECURITY B WHERE P.SYSTEM_ID=B.THING AND P.ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@ AND ( B.PERSONORGROUP=@param2@ OR B.PERSONORGROUP=@param3@ ) AND B.ACCESSRIGHTS >= 0 ORDER BY DESCRIPTION ASC

query.name: S_CONTA_TRASM_DA_ACC
query.value: select count(tot_trasm) as tot_trasm from ( select tr.system_id as tot_trasm from dpa_trasmissione tr, dpa_trasm_singola ts, dpa_trasm_utente tu, dpa_ragione_trasm rt where tr.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione and ts.system_id = tu.id_trasm_singola and ts.ID_RAGIONE = rt.SYSTEM_ID and rt.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' and tu.DTA_ACCETTATA is not null and tr.@campoOggetto@ = @IDOggetto@ and (tu.ID_PEOPLE = @IDPeople@ or ts.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = (select system_id from dpa_corr_globali where id_gruppo = @IDGroup@)) union select tr.system_id as tot_trasm from dpa_trasmissione tr, dpa_trasm_singola ts, dpa_trasm_utente tu, dpa_ragione_trasm rt where tr.system_id = ts.id_trasmissione and ts.system_id = tu.id_trasm_singola and ts.ID_RAGIONE = rt.SYSTEM_ID and rt.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE != 'W' and tu.DTA_VISTA is not null and tr.@campoOggetto@ = @IDOggetto@ and (tu.ID_PEOPLE = @IDPeople@ or ts.ID_CORR_GLOBALE = (select system_id from dpa_corr_globali where id_gruppo = @IDGroup@)) )

query.name: S_EXPORT_TODO_LIST_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER')AS SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'OGGETTO_MITTENTE')AS OGGETTO_MITTENTE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'CHA_TIPO_PROTO')AS TIPO_PROTO, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DTA_DOC, vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'NUMPROTO') AS NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROFILE > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ and ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) AND ID_REGISTRO IN (@registri@) @filters@ ORDER BY @order@

query.name: S_EXPORT_TODO_LIST_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy')AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROJECT, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DESC_FASC')AS DESC_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'CODFASC') AS COD_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE ID_PROJECT > 0 AND ((ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@) OR (ID_PEOPLE_DEST = @idPeople@ AND ID_RUOLO_DEST = 0)) @filters@ ORDER BY @order@

query.name: INDS_INSERT_INDX_SIS
INDS_DELETE_INDX_SIS
query.value: DELETE DPA_INDX_SIS WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: INDS_GET_BY_IDAMM
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_INDX_SIS WHERE ID_AMM = @idAmm@ ORDER BY VOCE_INDICE

query.name: INDS_INSERT_ASS_INDX_SIS
INDS_DELETE_ASS_INDX_SIS
query.value: DELETE DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS WHERE ID_INDICE_SIS = @idIndiceSis@ AND ID_PROJECT = @idProject@

query.name: INDS_GET_BY_IDPROJECT
query.value: SELECT DPA_INDX_SIS.SYSTEM_ID, DPA_INDX_SIS.ID_AMM, DPA_INDX_SIS.VOCE_INDICE, DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS.ID_PROJECT FROM DPA_INDX_SIS, DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS WHERE DPA_INDX_SIS.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS.ID_INDICE_SIS AND DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS.ID_PROJECT = @idProject@ ORDER BY DPA_INDX_SIS.VOCE_INDICE

query.name: U_PROFILE_ANNULLA_PRED
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET CHA_TIPO_PROTO = 'G', LAST_EDIT_DATE = SYSDATE, CHA_DA_PROTO = 0, ID_PARENT = NULL, ID_REGISTRO = NULL WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: D_DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_DOC_ARRIVO_PAR WHERE ID_PROFILE IN ( @param1@ )

query.name: INDS_GET_NODI_BY_INDICE
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT, DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS, DPA_INDX_SIS where PROJECT.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS.ID_PROJECT AND DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS.ID_INDICE_SIS = DPA_INDX_SIS.SYSTEM_ID @titolario@ AND UPPER(DPA_INDX_SIS.VOCE_INDICE) = UPPER('@indice@')

query.name: TITOLARIO_GET_TITOLARI_UTILI
query.value: SELECT P.*, A.VAR_CODICE_AMM FROM PROJECT P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE P.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND P.ID_TITOLARIO = 0 AND P.ID_PARENT = 0 AND P.ID_AMM = A.SYSTEM_ID AND P.CHA_STATO < > 'D' ORDER BY P.CHA_STATO, P.DTA_CESSAZIONE DESC

query.name: S_SELECT_DATA_SCAMBIA_ALLEGATO
query.value: SELECT V.SUBVERSION, V.CARTACEO, V.SCARTA_FASC_CARTACEA, C.PATH, C.FILE_SIZE, C.VAR_IMPRONTA, C.EXT, C.CHA_FIRMATO FROM VERSIONS V INNER JOIN COMPONENTS C ON V.VERSION_ID = C.VERSION_ID WHERE V.VERSION_ID = @versionId@

query.name: U_UPDATE_VERSION_SCAMBIA_ALLEGATO
query.value: UPDATE VERSIONS SET SUBVERSION = @subVersion@, CARTACEO = @cartaceo@, SCARTA_FASC_CARTACEA = @scartaFascCartacea@ WHERE VERSION_ID = @versionId@

query.name: U_UPDATE_COMPONENTS_SCAMBIA_ALLEGATO
query.value: UPDATE COMPONENTS SET PATH = @path@, FILE_SIZE = @fileSize@, VAR_IMPRONTA = @impronta@, CHA_FIRMATO = '@firmato@', EXT = '@estensione@' WHERE VERSION_ID = @versionId@

query.name: S_IS_ALLEGATO_PROFILATO
query.value: SELECT ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM PROFILE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@

query.name: S_GET_INDICE_SISTEMATICO
query.value: SELECT PROJECT.VAR_CODICE, PROJECT.DESCRIPTION, PROJECT.ID_REGISTRO, DPA_INDX_SIS.VOCE_INDICE FROM PROJECT, DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS, DPA_INDX_SIS WHERE ID_TITOLARIO = @idTitolario@ AND CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS.ID_PROJECT (+)= PROJECT.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_INDX_SIS.SYSTEM_ID (+)= DPA_ASS_INDX_SIS.ID_INDICE_SIS @orderBy@

query.name: INDS_EXSIST_VOCE_INDICE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_INDX_SIS WHERE UPPER(VOCE_INDICE) = UPPER('@voceIndice@')

query.name: INDS_IS_ASSOCIATA_VOCE
S_Project14
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, DESCRIPTION, ID_PARENT FROM PROJECT WHERE CHA_TIPO_PROJ='C' AND ID_FASCICOLO=@param1@

I_CONSERVAZIONE
U_CONSERVAZIONE

query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE Upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = '@param1@' and id_amm=@param2@

query.name: S_SYSTEM_ID_DPA_CORR_GLOBALI_PARAM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI WHERE Upper(VAR_COD_RUBRICA) = '@param1@' and id_amm=@param2@ @params@

query.name: S_System_id__DocumentTypes
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM DOCUMENTTYPES WHERE @param1@

query.name: S_CONTA_TRASM_CON_WF_IN_TDL_PER_UT
query.value: select count(*) as tot_trasm from dpa_todolist tdl, dpa_ragione_trasm rt, dpa_trasm_singola ts where tdl.@campoOggetto@ = @IDOggetto@ and tdl.id_people_dest = @IDPeople@ and rt.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' and ts.ID_RAGIONE = rt.SYSTEM_ID and tdl.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = ts.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: S_CONTA_TRASM_CON_WF_IN_TDL_PER_RUOLO
query.value: select count(*) as tot_trasm from dpa_todolist tdl, dpa_ragione_trasm rt, dpa_trasm_singola ts where tdl.@campoOggetto@ = @IDOggetto@ and tdl.id_ruolo_dest = @IDGruppo@ and rt.CHA_TIPO_RAGIONE = 'W' and ts.ID_RAGIONE = rt.SYSTEM_ID and tdl.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA = ts.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: DS_GET_DIAGRAMMA_ASSOCIATO_FASC
query.value: SELECT ID_DIAGRAMMA FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@ AND ID_DIAGRAMMA IS NOT NULL

query.name: DS_GET_ID_MODELLO_TIPOFASC_DS
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@ AND ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_STATO = @idStato@

query.name: DS_GET_ID_MODELLO_TIPOFASC_DS_1
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@ AND (ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ OR ID_DIAGRAMMA IS NULL) AND ID_STATO IS NULL

query.name: DS_DISASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA_1
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_STATO IS NULL AND ID_DIAGRAMMA IS NULL AND ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@

query.name: DS_DISASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA_2
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_STATO IS NULL AND ID_MOD_TRASM IS NOT NULL AND ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@

query.name: DS_INS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA_1
DS_INS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA_2
DS_DISASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA_3
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@ AND ID_STATO = @idStato@

query.name: DS_INS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA_3
PD_UPDATE_SCADENZE_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_TIPO_FASC SET GG_SCADENZA = @scadenza@, GG_PRE_SCADENZA = @preScadenza@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idTemplate@

query.name: DS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@ AND ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_MOD_TRASM IS NULL AND ID_STATO IS NULL

query.name: DS_INS_ASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA
DS_GET_DPA_DIAGRAMMI_FASC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(ID_STATO) FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_STATI WHERE DPA_DIAGRAMMI.ID_PROJECT = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT AND DPA_STATI.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_DIAGRAMMI.ID_STATO AND DPA_STATI.STATO_FINALE <> 1 AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = @idTemplate@ AND DPA_DIAGRAMMI.ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@

query.name: DS_DISASSOCIA_TIPO_FASC_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@

query.name: DS_GET_BY_ID_TIPO_FASC
query.value: SELECT DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.ID_DIAGRAMMA FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = @id_tipo_fasc@ AND DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI.ID_TIPO_FASC AND DPA_TIPO_FASC.ID_AMM = @id_amm@ AND ID_DIAGRAMMA IS NOT NULL

query.name: DS_DEL_TRASM_STORICO_FASC
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_TRASM_DIAGR WHERE ID_STATO = @idStato@ AND ID_PROJECT = @idProject@

query.name: DS_GET_STATO_FASC_1
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_PROJECT = @idProject@

query.name: DS_UPDATE_DPA_DIAGRAMMI_FASC
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DIAGRAMMI SET ID_STATO = @idStato@ WHERE ID_PROJECT = @idProject@

query.name: DS_INS_DPA_DIAGRAMMI_STO_FASC
DS_INS_DPA_DIAGRAMMI_FASC
PD_GET_SCADENZE_FASC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC WHERE DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = @idTipoFasc@

query.name: UPDATE_SCADENZA_PROJECT
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET DTA_SCADENZA = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+NUMTODSINTERVAL(@scadenza_gg@,'DAY'),'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idProject@

query.name: UPDATE_SCADENZA_PROJECT_1
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET DTA_SCADENZA = TO_DATE('@data@','dd/mm/yyyy') WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idProject@

query.name: DS_IS_STATO_TRASM_AUTO_FASC
query.value: SELECT ID_MOD_TRASM, TRASM_AUT FROM DPA_ASS_DIAGRAMMI WHERE ID_STATO = @idStato@ AND ID_TIPO_FASC = @idTipoFasc@

query.name: DS_GET_ID_TRASM_DIAGR_FASC
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASM FROM DPA_TRASM_DIAGR WHERE ID_PROJECT = @idProject@ AND ID_STATO = @idStato@

query.name: DS_INS_TRASM_STORICO_FASC
DS_GET_DIAGRAMMA_STORICO_FASC
query.value: SELECT ID_USER, DTA_DATE, VAR_DESC_OLD_STATO, VAR_DESC_NEW_STATO, ID_PEOPLE, ID_RUOLO FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI_STO WHERE ID_PROJECT = @idProject@ ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID

query.name: PD_GET_ID_TEMPLATE_FASC
query.value: SELECT ID_TIPO_FASC as ID_TEMPLATE FROM PROJECT WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idProject@

query.name: S_CONTA_MOD_RAG_CESSIONE
query.value: select count(*) as tot from dpa_modelli_trasm m, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest md where md.ID_RAGIONE = @idRagione@ and m.cha_cede_diritti = '1' and m.system_id = md.id_modello

query.name: TRASM_SCADENZE_FASC
query.value: SELECT distinct(thing),personorgroup,project.system_id as P_SYSTEM_ID,project.system_id as idproject FROM project, dpa_tipo_fasc, security, people, dpa_stati, dpa_diagrammi WHERE project.id_tipo_fasc = dpa_tipo_fasc.system_id AND project.dta_scadenza = @param1@ AND project.system_id = security.thing AND people.system_id = security.personorgroup AND security.accessrights=0 AND security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A' AND project.system_id = dpa_diagrammi.id_project AND dpa_diagrammi.id_diagramma = dpa_stati.id_diagramma AND dpa_stati.stato_finale <> 1

query.name: TRASM_SCADENZE_MITT_FASC
query.value: SELECT distinct(personorgroup),thing,project.system_id as P_SYSTEM_ID,project.system_id as idproject FROM project, dpa_tipo_fasc, security, people WHERE project.id_tipo_fasc = dpa_tipo_fasc.system_id AND project.dta_scadenza = @param1@ AND project.system_id = security.thing AND security.accessrights=255 AND project.system_id = @idProject@ AND security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A'

query.name: TRASM_SCADENZE_DEST_FASC
query.value: select personorgroup, accessrights, project.system_id as idproject, thing, cha_tipo_diritto, 'R' as tipo from project, dpa_tipo_fasc, security, groups where project.id_tipo_fasc = dpa_tipo_fasc.system_id and project.dta_scadenza = @param1@ and project.system_id = security.thing and security.accessrights > 0 and project.system_id = @idProject@ and groups.system_id = security.personorgroup and security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A' union select personorgroup, accessrights, project.system_id as idproject, thing, cha_tipo_diritto, 'P' as tipo from project, dpa_tipo_fasc, security, people where project.id_tipo_fasc = dpa_tipo_fasc.system_id and project.dta_scadenza = @param1@ and project.system_id = security.thing and security.accessrights > 0 and project.system_id = @idProject@ and people.system_id = security.personorgroup and security.cha_tipo_diritto <> 'A'

query.name: S_IS_NOTE_DOCUMENTO_SOLA_LETTURA
query.value: SELECT getAccessRights(@idRuoloCreatore@, @idUtenteCreatore@, @idOggetto@) AS ACCESS_RIGHTS, p.cha_in_cestino AS IN_CESTINO FROM PROFILE p WHERE p.system_id = @idOggetto@

query.name: S_IS_NOTE_FASCICOLO_SOLA_LETTURA
query.value: SELECT getAccessRights(@idRuoloCreatore@, @idUtenteCreatore@, @idOggetto@) AS ACCESS_RIGHTS FROM PROJECT p WHERE p.system_id = @idOggetto@

query.name: S_VISIB_RUOLO_NODI_TITOLARIO
query.value: SELECT p.system_id as IDRECORD, p.var_codice as CODICE, p.description as DESCRIZIONE, p.num_livello as LIVELLO, p.var_cod_liv1 as CODLIV, p.id_parent as IDPARENT FROM PROJECT p, SECURITY s WHERE p.system_id = s.THING AND p.cha_tipo_proj = 'T' AND s.accessrights IN (255,47,63) AND s.PERSONORGROUP = @idgruppo@ ORDER BY p.var_cod_liv1

query.name: INS_DOC_IN_CONVERSIONE_PDF
DEL_DOC_IN_CONVERSIONE_PDF
query.value: DELETE DPA_CONV_PDF_SERVER WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@

query.name: IS_DOC_IN_CONVERSIONE_PDF
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CONV_PDF_SERVER WHERE ID_PROFILE = @idProfile@

query.name: S_DPA_MODELLI_TRASM_GENERIC
query.value: SELECT @campi@ FROM DPA_MODELLI_TRASM WHERE @condizioni@

query.name: S_UTENTE_UNICO_IN_NOTIFICHE
query.value: SELECT m.* FROM DPA_MODELLI_TRASM m, DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST d, DPA_MODELLI_DEST_CON_NOTIFICA n WHERE n.ID_MODELLO_MITT_DEST = d.SYSTEM_ID and d.ID_MODELLO = m.SYSTEM_ID and (select count(*) from dpa_modelli_dest_con_notifica where ID_MODELLO_MITT_DEST = n.ID_MODELLO_MITT_DEST) = 1 and d.ID_CORR_GLOBALI = (select system_id from dpa_corr_globali where id_gruppo = @idGruppo@) AND n.ID_PEOPLE = @idPeople@

query.name: S_MAX_PESO_UO_ORG
query.value: select max(id_peso_org) as maggiore from dpa_corr_globali where id_parent = @idParent@ and cha_tipo_urp = 'U' and cha_tipo_ie = 'I' and dta_fine is null

query.name: S_MAX_PESO_RUOLO_ORG
query.value: select max(id_peso_org) as maggiore from dpa_corr_globali where id_uo = @idUO@ and cha_tipo_urp = 'R' and cha_tipo_ie = 'I' and dta_fine is null

query.name: S_PREDISPOSTI_IN_REGISTRO
query.value: select * from profile where cha_da_proto = '1' and ID_REGISTRO = @idReg@ and cha_in_cestino = '0'

query.name: AMM_U_UPDATE_RF
query.value: update DPA_EL_REGISTRI set CHA_DISABILITATO = '1' where ID_AOO_COLLEGATA = @param1@ and CHA_RF = '1'

query.name: AMM_SELECT_DISABLED_DPA_EL_REGISTRI
query.value: select CHA_DISABILITATO from DPA_EL_REGISTRI where SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: S_CSS_AMMINISTRA
query.value: select b.THEME || '^' || b.system_id || '^' || b.color from DPA_AMMINISTRA a, DPA_THEMES b where a.SYSTEM_ID = @idAmm@ and a.css = b.system_id

query.name: S_DPA_THEMES
query.value: select SYSTEM_ID, THEME from DPA_THEMES

query.name: U_THEME_DPA_AMMINISTRA
query.value: update DPA_AMMINISTRA set CSS = @param1@ where system_id = @idAmm@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_UNION
S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_VELOCE_UNION
query.value: SELECT COUNT(SYSTEM_ID) FROM ( SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE a WHERE @security@ @filters@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC UNION SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID FROM PROFILE a @from_cons@ WHERE @security@ @filters_cons@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate @unionStampe@ ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < = @rowCount@

query.name: S_RIC_DOC_UNION
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @index@ ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @order@, a.system_id desc) AS RN, A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(A.DTA_PROTO,A.CREATION_TIME) AS DATA, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG , A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR, getchafirmato(A.docnumber) as CHA_FIRMATO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id @from@ WHERE @security@ @filters@ UNION SELECT @index@ ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @order@, a.system_id desc) AS RN, A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(A.DTA_PROTO,A.CREATION_TIME) AS DATA, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR, getchafirmato(a.docnumber) as CHA_FIRMATO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id @from_cons@ WHERE @security@ @filters_cons@ @unionStampe@ ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_RIC_DOC_VELOCE_UNION
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, SYSTEM_ID, DOCNUMBER, DTA_ANNULLA, VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, ID_REGISTRO, CHA_TIPO_PROTO, CHA_EVIDENZA, NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(DTA_PROTO,CREATION_DATE) AS DATA, CREATION_DATE, NUM_PROTO, VAR_SEGNATURA, DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG, CHA_PRIVATO, CHA_PERSONALE, getInADL(SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL,ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, ID_TIPO_ATTO, DESC_TIPO_ATTO, AUTHOR, getchafirmato(DOCNUMBER) as CHA_FIRMATO FROM ( SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG , A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL,A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR, getchafirmato(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_FIRMATO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id WHERE @security@ @filters@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC UNION SELECT ROWNUM RN, SYSTEM_ID, DOCNUMBER, DTA_ANNULLA, VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, ID_REGISTRO, CHA_TIPO_PROTO, CHA_EVIDENZA, NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(DTA_PROTO,CREATION_DATE) AS DATA, CREATION_DATE, NUM_PROTO, VAR_SEGNATURA, DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG , CHA_PRIVATO, CHA_PERSONALE, getInADL(SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL,ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, ID_TIPO_ATTO, DESC_TIPO_ATTO, AUTHOR, getchafirmato(DOCNUMBER) as CHA_FIRMATO FROM ( SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, getchaimg(A.DOCNUMBER) AS CHA_IMG , A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL,A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR, getchafirmato(A.DOCNUMBER) as CHA_FIRMATO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id @from_cons@ WHERE @security@ @filters_cons@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC @unionStampe@ ) WHERE ROWNUM < = @rowCount@ ) WHERE RN BETWEEN @startRow@ AND @endRow@

query.name: S_RICERCA_ALL_CORRISPONDENTI1
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (a ) index (b ) index (r )*/ a.system_id, a.id_amm, r.var_codice, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.var_codice_amm, a.var_codice_aoo, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, a.var_cognome, a.var_nome, b.var_indirizzo, b.var_cap, b.var_citta, b.var_provincia,b.var_localita, b.var_nazione, b.var_telefono, b.var_telefono2, b.var_fax, id_old, a.var_email,b.VAR_NOTE, b.var_cod_fisc, b.var_cod_pi FROM dpa_corr_globali a, dpa_dett_globali b, dpa_el_registri r WHERE a.system_id = b.id_corr_globali(+) AND a.id_registro = r.system_id(+) AND a.cha_tipo_corr not in ( 'O','C') AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'E' AND a.dta_fine is null AND a.id_amm = @idamm@ AND UPPER(a.var_cod_rubrica) not like UPPER('INTEROP_%') @registri@ ORDER BY a.var_desc_corr

query.name: S_RICERCA_ALL_CORRISPONDENTI
query.value: Select /*+ index (a ) index (b ) index (r )*/ a.system_id, a.id_amm, r.var_codice, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.var_codice_amm, a.var_codice_aoo, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, a.var_cognome, a.var_nome, b.var_indirizzo, b.var_cap, b.var_citta, b.var_provincia,b.var_localita, b.var_nazione, b.var_telefono, b.var_telefono2, B.Var_Fax, Id_Old, MAIL_E_NOTE_CORR_ESTERNI(a.system_id) as VAR_EMAIL, B.Var_Note, B.Var_Cod_Fisc, B.Var_Cod_Pi, dt.description From Dpa_Corr_Globali A, Dpa_Dett_Globali B, Dpa_El_Registri R, Dpa_T_Canale_Corr Tcc, Documenttypes Dt Where A.System_Id = B.Id_Corr_Globali(+) And Tcc.Id_Corr_Globale(+) = A.System_Id And Dt.System_Id=Tcc.Id_Documenttype AND a.id_registro = r.system_id(+) AND a.cha_tipo_corr not in ( 'O','C') AND a.cha_tipo_ie = 'E' AND a.dta_fine is null AND a.id_amm = @idamm@ And Upper(A.Var_Cod_Rubrica) Not Like Upper('INTEROP_%') @registri@ Order By 1, A.Var_Desc_Corr

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATES_ARCHIVIO_DEPOSITO
query.value: select distinct(dpa_tipo_atto.system_id), dpa_tipo_atto.VAR_DESC_ATTO, dpa_tipo_atto.Abilitato_SI_NO, dpa_tipo_atto.In_Esercizio, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_Mod_1, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_Mod_2, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_Mod_SU, dpa_tipo_atto.Path_All_1, dpa_tipo_atto.GG_SCADENZA, dpa_tipo_atto.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, dpa_tipo_atto.CHA_PRIVATO from dpa_tipo_atto, dpa_associazione_templates, dpa_oggetti_custom, dpa_tipo_oggetto where dpa_tipo_atto.system_id = dpa_associazione_templates.id_template and dpa_associazione_templates.id_oggetto = dpa_oggetti_custom.system_id and dpa_oggetti_custom.id_tipo_oggetto = dpa_tipo_oggetto.system_id and UPPER(dpa_tipo_oggetto.DESCRIZIONE) like UPPER('%CONTATORE%') and UPPER(dpa_oggetti_custom.FORMATO_CONTATORE) like UPPER('%ANNO%') and dpa_tipo_atto.id_amm = @idAmm@ @seRepertorio@

query.name: S_PROJECT_TRASFERIMENTO_DEPOSITO
