query.value: SELECT '1' FROM (profile p join versions v on p.docnumber=v.docnumber and v.version_id=@version_id@) left join dpa_notifica n on v.version_id=n.version_id WHERE (n.version_id=@version_id@ AND (upper(p.var_prof_oggetto) = upper('Ricevuta di avvenuta consegna') OR upper(p.var_prof_oggetto) = upper('Ricevuta di mancata consegna'))) OR (upper(p.var_prof_oggetto) = upper('Ricevuta di avvenuta consegna') OR upper(p.var_prof_oggetto) = upper('Ricevuta di mancata consegna'))

query.name: S_DPA_TIPO_NOTIFICA_BY_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_NOTIFICA WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemid@

query.name: D_DPA_NOTIFICA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_NOTIFICA WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@

I_DPA_TIMESTAMP_DOC
S_DPA_TIMESTAMP_DOC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIMESTAMP_DOC WHERE VERSION_ID = @versionId@ AND DOC_NUMBER = @docNumber@ ORDER BY DTA_CREAZIONE DESC

query.name: S_J_PROJECT_NO_SECURITY2
query.value: SELECT /*+ INDEX (A) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DESCRIPTION, A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ, A.VAR_CODICE, A.ID_AMM,A.NUM_LIVELLO, A.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO, A.ID_FASCICOLO, A.ID_PARENT, A.VAR_COD_ULTIMO, checksecurity(a.system_id, @param4@, @param5@, 'F') as SICUREZZA, @param1@ AS DTA_APERTURA,@param2@ AS DTA_CHIUSURA, A.CHA_STATO, A.ID_TIPO_PROC, A.VAR_NOTE, A.ID_REGISTRO,getaccessrights(@param4@,@param5@,A.system_id) AS ACCESSRIGHTS, A.CARTACEO, ID_TITOLARIO, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, A.NUM_FASCICOLO, A.AUTHOR, A.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, A.ID_UO_CREATORE, getFascPrimaria(@param3@, A.SYSTEM_ID) as CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA, A.CHA_CONSENTI_CLASS, A.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'F' AND A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT A.ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT A, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.PROJECT_ID AND B.LINK=@param3@) ORDER BY SICUREZZA DESC, A.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: VERIFY_DOC_NO_MITT
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dpa_doc_arrivo_par d, PROFILE c, dpa_el_registri e WHERE d.id_mitt_dest = 0 AND c.system_id = d.id_profile AND (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM dpa_doc_arrivo_par f WHERE f.id_profile = c.system_id AND @where@ AND id_mitt_dest != 0) = 0 AND c.id_registro = e.system_id AND e.id_amm = @idAmm@ @tipoDoc@

query.name: VERIFY_DOC_NO_DEST
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dpa_doc_arrivo_par d, PROFILE c, dpa_el_registri e WHERE d.id_mitt_dest = 0 AND c.system_id = d.id_profile AND (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM dpa_doc_arrivo_par f WHERE f.id_profile = c.system_id AND @where@ AND id_mitt_dest != 0) = 0 AND c.id_registro = e.system_id AND e.id_amm = @idAmm@ @tipoDoc@

query.name: VERIFY_DOC_NO_CC
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dpa_doc_arrivo_par d, PROFILE c, dpa_el_registri e WHERE d.id_mitt_dest = 0 AND c.system_id = d.id_profile AND (SELECT COUNT (*) FROM dpa_doc_arrivo_par f WHERE f.id_profile = c.system_id AND @where@ AND id_mitt_dest != 0) = 0 AND c.id_registro = e.system_id AND e.id_amm = @idAmm@ @tipoDoc@

query.value: SELECT getaccessrights(@param1@,@param2@,@param3@) AS ACCESSRIGHTS FROM DUAL

query.name: S_ESISTE_FASC_PRIMARIA
query.value: select count(*) from PROJECT_COMPONENTS where LINK=@link@ and CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA='1'

query.name: S_GET_FASC_PRIMARIA
query.value: select DESCRIPTION from PROJECT A where A.SYSTEM_ID IN (SELECT A.ID_FASCICOLO FROM PROJECT A, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.PROJECT_ID AND B.LINK=@idProfile@ and CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA='1')

query.name: S_GET_FASCICOLI_FASC_PRIMARIA
query.value: SELECT * FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS WHERE LINK = @param1@

query.value: UPDATE PROJECT_COMPONENTS SET CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA = '1' WHERE PROJECT_ID = @param1@ and link=@param2@

query.name: ANNULLA_FASCICOLAZIONE_PRIMARIA
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT_COMPONENTS SET CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA='0' WHERE LINK = @param1@ and CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA='1'

query.name: NUOVA_FASCICOLAZIONE_PRIMARIA
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT_COMPONENTS SET CHA_FASC_PRIMARIA='1' WHERE LINK = @param1@ and PROJECT_ID in (select system_id from PROJECT where ID_FASCICOLO = @idProject@)

query.name: GET_SMART_CLIENT_CONFIGURATIONS_PER_USER
query.value: SELECT p.IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT as user_config_enabled, p.CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI as user_tipo_components, p.smart_client_pdf_conv_on_scan as user_pdf_conv_enabled, a.IS_ENABLED_SMART_CLIENT as admin_config_enabled, a.CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI as admin_tipo_components, a.smart_client_pdf_conv_on_scan as admin_pdf_conv_enabled FROM people p LEFT JOIN dpa_amministra a on p.id_amm = a.system_id WHERE p.system_id = @idPeople@

query.name: CHECK_MITT_DEST_MODELLO
query.value: SELECT corr.VAR_CODICE AS codice FROM DPA_MODELLI_TRASM mod JOIN DPA_MODELLI_MITT_DEST md ON mod.SYSTEM_ID=md.ID_MODELLO JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI corr ON md.ID_CORR_GLOBALI=corr.SYSTEM_ID WHERE md.CHA_TIPO_MITT_DEST='@tipo@' AND mod.SYSTEM_ID='@codice_modello@' AND UPPER(corr.VAR_CODICE)=UPPER('@codice_ruolo@')

query.name: GET_CODICE_FASC

query.name: SET_NOTE_ACCETTAZIONE_UT

query.name: DOCUMENTI_R_W_SENZA_RISALITA
query.value: SELECT p.system_id AS ID FROM PROFILE p, security s WHERE s.personorgroup IN (SELECT g.id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali g WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CHA_TIPO_IE='I') AND s.PERSONORGROUP in (select g.SYSTEM_ID from GROUPS g where UPPER(group_id) = UPPER('@codice_ruolo@')) AND p.cha_privato = '1' AND s.accessrights IN (255, 63) and nvl(p.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0') != '1' AND s.thing = p.system_id AND p.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE is null AND p.SYSTEM_ID NOT IN( SELECT p.system_id AS ID FROM PROFILE p, security s WHERE s.personorgroup IN (SELECT g.id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali g WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CHA_TIPO_IE='I') AND s.PERSONORGROUP in (select g.SYSTEM_ID from GROUPS g where UPPER(group_id) = UPPER('@codice_ruolo_nuovo@')) AND p.cha_privato = '1' AND s.accessrights IN (255, 63) AND nvl(p.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0') != '1' AND s.thing = p.system_id AND p.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE is null )

query.name: DOCUMENTI_R_W_CON_RISALITA
query.value: SELECT p.system_id AS ID--, s.accessrights AS diritti FROM PROFILE p, security s WHERE s.personorgroup IN (SELECT g.id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali g WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CHA_TIPO_IE='I') AND s.PERSONORGROUP in (select g.SYSTEM_ID from GROUPS g where UPPER(group_id) = UPPER('@codice_ruolo@')) AND p.cha_privato = '0' AND s.accessrights IN (255, 63) AND nvl(p.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0') != '1' AND s.thing = p.system_id AND P.SYSTEM_ID NOT IN ( SELECT p.system_id AS ID--, s.accessrights AS diritti FROM PROFILE p, security s WHERE s.personorgroup IN (SELECT g.id_gruppo FROM dpa_corr_globali g WHERE CHA_TIPO_URP='R' AND CHA_TIPO_IE='I') AND s.PERSONORGROUP in (select g.SYSTEM_ID from GROUPS g where UPPER(group_id) = UPPER('@codice_ruolo_nuovo@')) AND p.cha_privato = '0' AND s.accessrights IN (255, 63) AND nvl(p.CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0') != '1' AND s.thing = p.system_id)

query.name: S_TODOLIST_MIGRAZIONE
query.value: SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, DTAINVIO, DTA_SCAD_DESC, DTA_SCAD_ASC, DTA_VISTA, UT_MITT, RUOLO_MITT, UT_DEST, RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, OGGETTO_MITTENTE, TIPO_PROTO, DTA_DOC, NUM_PROTO, ID_PROJECT, DESC_FASC, COD_FASC, DTA_CREAZ, NUM_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM,Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'COMPONENTS_CHA_FIRMATO') AS CHA_FIRMATO, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO FROM ( SELECT ID_TRASMISSIONE, ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, ID_TRASM_UTENTE, DTA_INVIO, TO_CHAR(DTA_INVIO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTAINVIO, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_DESC, nvl(DTA_SCADENZA,to_date('01/01/2100','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_SCAD_ASC, nvl(DTA_VISTA,to_date('01/01/1753','dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_VISTA, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_MITT, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_RUOLO_MITT, 'GROUPNAME') AS RUOLO_MITT, Vardescribe(ID_PEOPLE_DEST, 'PEOPLENAME') AS UT_DEST, Vardescribe(ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, 'RAGIONETRASM') AS RAG_TRASM, VAR_NOTE_GEN, VAR_NOTE_SING, DTA_SCADENZA, TO_CHAR(DTA_SCADENZA,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DTA_SCAD_CHAR, ID_PROFILE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER')AS SEGNA_DOCNUMBER, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'OGGETTO_MITTENTE')AS OGGETTO_MITTENTE, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'CHA_TIPO_PROTO')AS TIPO_PROTO, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'DATADOC') AS DTA_DOC, vardescribe(ID_PROFILE, 'NUMPROTO') AS NUM_PROTO, ID_PEOPLE_MITT AS ID_PEOPLE_MITT, ID_RUOLO_MITT AS ID_RUOLO_MITT, ID_RAGIONE_TRASM AS ID_RAGIONE_TRASM, ID_RUOLO_DEST AS ID_RUOLO_DEST, ID_PEOPLE_DEST AS ID_PEOPLE_DEST, CHA_TIPO_TRASM AS CHA_TIPO_TRASM, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'PROFILE_CHA_IMG') AS CHA_IMG, Vardescribe(ID_PROFILE,'COMPONENTS_CHA_FIRMATO') AS CHA_FIRMATO, ID_PROJECT, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DESC_FASC')AS DESC_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'CODFASC') AS COD_FASC, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'DTA_CREAZ') AS DTA_CREAZ, Vardescribe(ID_PROJECT, 'NUM_FASC') AS NUM_FASC, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO FROM DPA_TODOLIST WHERE (ID_PROFILE > 0 or ID_PROJECT > 0) AND (ID_RUOLO_DEST = @idGruppo@ OR ID_RUOLO_DEST=0)and (ID_PEOPLE_DEST in( select pg.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID from peoplegroups pg where pg.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = @idGruppo@ and dta_fine is null)) )

query.name: S_ACCESS_RIGHTS
query.value: SELECT getaccessrights(@param1@,@param2@,@param3@) AS ACCESSRIGHTS FROM PROJECT A WHERE A.system_id=@param3@

query.name: S_ROOTFOLDER_FASC
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE ID_FASCICOLO = @param1@

query.name: S_GET_LDAP_USER_CONFIG_BY_NAME
query.value: select p.ldap_id_sync, p.ldap_never_sync, p.ldap_authenticated from people p where upper(p.user_id) = upper('@userName@')

query.name: COUNT_PROJECT_MASSIVE_OPERATION_UNION
COUNT_PROJECT_MASSIVE_OPERATION
TITOLARIO_CHIUDI_NODI
query.value: UPDATE PROJECT SET PROJECT.CHA_STATO = 'C', PROJECT.DTA_CHIUSURA = SYSDATE WHERE PROJECT.CHA_TIPO_FASCICOLO = 'G' AND (PROJECT.DTA_CHIUSURA IS NULL OR PROJECT.DTA_CHIUSURA = '') AND PROJECT.ID_TITOLARIO IN ( SELECT SYSTEM_ID FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND PROJECT.CHA_STATO = 'A' AND PROJECT.ID_PARENT = 0 AND PROJECT.CHA_TIPO_PROJ = 'T' AND PROJECT.ID_TITOLARIO = 0 AND PROJECT.VAR_CODICE = 'T' )

query.name: I_DPA_TRASMISSIONE_insertTrasmissioneDtaInvio
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_TRASMISSIONE ( @param1@ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, ID_PEOPLE, CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, ID_PROFILE, ID_PROJECT,VAR_NOTE_GENERALI, CHA_SALVATA_CON_CESSIONE, ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO,dta_invio) VALUES ( @param2@@param3@,@param4@,'@param5@',@param6@,@param7@,'@param8@','@cessione@', @delegato@,@dta_invio@)

query.name: S_COUNT_MODELLI_DELEGA
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_MODELLI_DELEGA A LEFT OUTER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C ON A.ID_RUOLO_DELEGANTE=C.SYSTEM_ID,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO=B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGANTE = @idUtente@ @param1@

query.name: S_GET_MODELLI_DELEGA
query.value: SELECT A.*,B.VAR_DESC_CORR AS FULL_NAME,C.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_MODELLI_DELEGA A LEFT OUTER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C ON A.ID_RUOLO_DELEGANTE=C.SYSTEM_ID,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO=B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGANTE = @idUtente@ @param1@

query.name: S_GET_MODELLI_DELEGA_PAGING
S_GET_MODELLI_DELEGA_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT A.*,B.VAR_DESC_CORR AS FULL_NAME,C.VAR_DESC_CORR FROM DPA_MODELLI_DELEGA A LEFT OUTER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C ON A.ID_RUOLO_DELEGANTE=C.SYSTEM_ID,DPA_CORR_GLOBALI B WHERE A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO=B.SYSTEM_ID AND A.SYSTEM_ID = @idModello@

query.name: I_INSERT_MODELLO_DELEGA
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_MODELLI_DELEGA (@colId@ID_PEOPLE_DELEGANTE,ID_RUOLO_DELEGANTE,ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO,ID_RUOLO_DELEGATO,DTA_INIZIO,DTA_FINE,INTERVALLO,NOME) VALUES (@id@@insertList@)

query.name: U_UPDATE_MODELLO_DELEGA
query.value: UPDATE DPA_MODELLI_DELEGA SET ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO=@idDelegato@, ID_RUOLO_DELEGATO=@idRuoloDelegato@, ID_RUOLO_DELEGANTE=@idRuoloDelegante@, DTA_INIZIO=@dataInizio@, DTA_FINE=@dataFine@, INTERVALLO=@intervallo@, NOME=@nome@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@idModello@

query.name: D_DELETE_MODELLO_DELEGA
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_MODELLI_DELEGA WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN (@idModelli@)

query.name: S_DISSERVIZIO
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID ,STATO ,TESTO_NOTIFICA ,TESTO_EMAIL_NOTIFICA ,TESTO_PAG_CORTESIA ,TESTO_EMAIL_RIPRESA ,NOTIFICATO FROM DPA_DISSERVIZI

query.name: I_DISSERVIZIO
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_DISSERVIZI (SYSTEM_ID ,STATO ,TESTO_NOTIFICA ,TESTO_EMAIL_NOTIFICA ,TESTO_PAG_CORTESIA ,TESTO_EMAIL_RIPRESA ,NOTIFICATO) VALUES (SEQ_DPA_DISSERVIZI.NEXTVAL ,'@stato@' ,'@notifica@' ,'@email@' ,'@cortesia@' ,'@ripresa@' ,'@notificato@')

query.name: U_DISSERVIZIO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DISSERVIZI SET TESTO_NOTIFICA = '@notifica@' ,TESTO_EMAIL_NOTIFICA = '@email@' ,TESTO_PAG_CORTESIA = '@cortesia@' ,TESTO_EMAIL_RIPRESA = '@ripresa@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemid@

query.name: U_STATO_DISSERVIZIO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DISSERVIZI SET STATO = '@stato@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemid@

query.name: D_DISSERVIZIO
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_DISSERVIZI WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemid@

query.name: U_NOTIFICA_ALL_UTENTE
query.value: update PEOPLE set ACCETTAZIONE_DISSERV = '@accettaz@'

query.name: U_NOTIFICA_UTENTE
query.value: update PEOPLE set ACCETTAZIONE_DISSERV = '@accettaz@' where SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: S_STATO_NOTIFICA_UTENTE
query.value: select ACCETTAZIONE_DISSERV from PEOPLE where SYSTEM_ID = '@systemId@'

query.name: S_LISTA_MAIL_UTENTI
query.value: select EMAIL_ADDRESS from PEOPLE where ID_AMM = @idAmm@

query.name: U_NOTIFICA_DISSERVIZIO
query.value: UPDATE DPA_DISSERVIZI SET NOTIFICATO = '@notificato@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @systemId@

query.name: GETCODICECORRISPONDENTE
query.value: SELECT d.var_cod_rubrica, d.* FROM dpa_corr_globali d WHERE UPPER (var_desc_corr) in (SELECT UPPER (valore_oggetto_db) FROM dpa_associazione_templates t WHERE t.id_template = @IDTEMPLATE@ AND doc_number = @DOCNUMBER@ AND id_oggetto = @IDOGGETTO@) AND cha_tipo_ie = 'I' and dta_fine is null ORDER BY dta_inizio

query.name: I_PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI
U_PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI
query.value: UPDATE PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI SET DATA_PUBBLICAZIONE_DOCUMENTO=@data_pubblicazione_documento@, ESITO_PUBBLICAZIONE=@esito_pubblicazione@, ERRORE_PUBBLICAZIONE=@errore_pubblicazione@ WHERE ID_PROFILE = @id_profile@ and ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO = @id_tipo_documento@

query.name: U_PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI_GENERALE
query.value: UPDATE PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI SET DATA_PUBBLICAZIONE_DOCUMENTO=@data_pubblicazione_documento@, DATA_DOC_PUBBLICATO =@data_doc_pubblicato@, ESITO_PUBBLICAZIONE=@esito_pubblicazione@, ERRORE_PUBBLICAZIONE=@errore_pubblicazione@ WHERE ID_PROFILE = @id_profile@ and ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO = @id_tipo_documento@

query.name: S_PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI_BY_ID_PROFILE
query.value: SELECT * FROM PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI WHERE ID_PROFILE=@id_profile@ and ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO =@id_tipo_documento@

query.name: S_PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT * FROM PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI WHERE ESITO_PUBBLICAZIONE=@esito_pubblicazione@ and ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO =@id_tipo_documento@

query.name: S_PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI_MAX
query.value: select max(cv.DATA_DOC_PUBBLICATO) as massimo from Pubblicazioni_documenti cv where ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO = @id_tipo_documento@

query.name: S_ESISTE_DOCUMENTO
query.value: select ID_TIPO_DOCUMENTO from PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI where id_tipo_documento = @id_tipo_documento@

query.name: S_PUBBLICAZIONE_DOCUMENTI_BY_ID_PROFILE
query.value: select * from PUBBLICAZIONI_DOCUMENTI where id_profile = @id_profile@

query.name: S_LISTA_TITOLI
query.value: SELECT VAR_TITOLO FROM DPA_QUALIFICA_CORRISPONDENTE WHERE DTA_FINE_VALIDITA IS NULL

query.name: S_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_PUBBLICAZIONE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id, a.docnumber, a.author, a.id_ruolo_creatore From Profile A WHERE ( ( ( cha_tipo_proto IN ('P') AND cha_da_proto = '0'AND id_documento_principale IS NULL ) Or ( Cha_Tipo_Proto In ('A') And Cha_Da_Proto = '0' And Id_Documento_Principale Is Null ) OR ( cha_tipo_proto IN ('I') AND cha_da_proto = '0'AND id_documento_principale IS NULL ) ) And A.Id_Tipo_Atto = @idTipoAtto@ AND (A.System_Id In (Select Dpa0.Doc_Number From Dpa_Associazione_Templates Dpa0, Dpa_Associazione_Templates Dpa1 Where Dpa0.Doc_Number = Dpa1.Doc_Number And Dpa0.Id_Oggetto = @idTipoOggettoDataPubblicazione@ And Dpa0.Valore_Oggetto_Db = '@dataPubblicazioneFinale@' And Dpa1.Id_Oggetto = @idTipoOggettoOraPubblicazione@ and Dpa1.Valore_Oggetto_Db = '@oraPubblicazione@' )) AND NVL (a.cha_in_cestino, '0') = '0' ) ORDER BY A.System_Id DESC

query.name: S_EXP_COUNT_FASC
query.value: select d.SYSTEM_ID, d.VAR_DESC_CORR, p.CHA_STATO, count(*) from @param1@

query.name: S_UO_SOTTOPOSTE
query.value: select p.SYSTEM_ID from dpa_corr_globali p start with p.SYSTEM_ID = '@param2@' connect by prior p.SYSTEM_ID = p.ID_PARENT AND p.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND p.ID_AMM='@param1@'

query.name: S_RUOLI_SOTTOPOSTI_UO
query.value: select p.system_ID from dpa_corr_globali p where id_amm = '@param3@' AND p.id_uo @param4@

query.name: S_EXP_COUNT_FASC_DESCR
query.value: SELECT d.system_id, d.var_desc_corr, p1.var_codice, p1.description, COUNT (*) FROM @param1@

query.name: GSF_Docs_Stato_Finale_list
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT P.SYSTEM_ID as ID_DOC, P.DOCNAME as SEGNATURA, P.ID_OGGETTO, corrcat(P.SYSTEM_ID, P.CHA_TIPO_PROTO) as MITTDEST, O.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO as DESC_OGGETTO, P.ID_TIPO_ATTO as ID_TIPOLOGIA, TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO AS TIPOLOGIA FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI D, DPA_STATI S, PROFILE P, PEOPLE PL, DPA_OGGETTARIO O, DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA WHERE D.ID_STATO = S.SYSTEM_ID AND P.AUTHOR=PL.SYSTEM_ID AND STATO_FINALE = 1 AND D.Doc_number = P.DOCNUMBER AND TA.SYSTEM_ID=P.ID_TIPO_ATTO AND O.SYSTEM_ID=P.ID_OGGETTO @IdDocumento@ @paramNumAnnoProto@ @paramIdRegistro@ @paramIdTipologia@ @paramProtocollati@ @paramWhereIdAmministrazione@ @paramWhereContatori@

query.name: GSF_Docs_Stato_Finale_Unlocked_list
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT P.SYSTEM_ID as ID_DOC, P.DOCNAME as SEGNATURA, P.ID_OGGETTO, corrcat(P.SYSTEM_ID, P.CHA_TIPO_PROTO) as MITTDEST, O.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO as DESC_OGGETTO, P.ID_TIPO_ATTO as ID_TIPOLOGIA, TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO AS TIPOLOGIA FROM DPA_DIAGRAMMI D, DPA_STATI S, PROFILE P, PEOPLE PL, DPA_OGGETTARIO O, DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA WHERE D.ID_STATO = S.SYSTEM_ID AND P.AUTHOR=PL.SYSTEM_ID AND STATO_FINALE = 1 AND D.Doc_number = P.DOCNUMBER AND TA.SYSTEM_ID=P.ID_TIPO_ATTO AND O.SYSTEM_ID=P.ID_OGGETTO AND P.CHA_UNLOCKED_FINAL_STATE='1' @IdDocumento@ @paramNumAnnoProto@ @paramIdRegistro@ @paramIdTipologia@ @paramProtocollati@ @paramWhereIdAmministrazione@ @paramWhereContatori@

query.name: GSF_Modifica_Doc_Stato_Finale
query.value: update SECURITY set ACCESSRIGHTS = @accessRights@ where THING = @IdDoc@ and PERSONORGROUP = @IdRuolo@

query.name: GSF_Update_Stato_Doc_Stato_Finale_Sbloccato
query.value: update PROFILE set CHA_UNLOCKED_FINAL_STATE = '1' where system_id = @IdDoc@

query.name: GSF_Update_Stato_Doc_Stato_Finale_Bloccato
query.value: update PROFILE set CHA_UNLOCKED_FINAL_STATE = '0' where system_id = @IdDoc@ and ( select COUNT(*) from SECURITY where THING = @IdDoc@ and ACCESSRIGHTS > 45 ) = 0

query.name: S_GET_DOCUMENT_CONSOLIDATION_STATE
query.value: SELECT P.CONSOLIDATION_STATE, P.CONSOLIDATION_AUTHOR, P.CONSOLIDATION_ROLE, P.CONSOLIDATION_DATE FROM PROFILE P WHERE (P.SYSTEM_ID = @idDocument@ AND P.DOCNUMBER = @idDocument@) OR (P.DOCNUMBER = @idDocument@ AND P.SYSTEM_ID!=@idDocument@) OR (P.SYSTEM_ID=@idDocument@ AND P.DOCNUMBER!=@idDocument@)

query.name: S_SET_DOCUMENT_CONSOLIDATION_STATE
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET CONSOLIDATION_STATE = '@state@', CONSOLIDATION_AUTHOR = @author@, CONSOLIDATION_ROLE = @role@, CONSOLIDATION_DATE = @date@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @idDocument@

query.name: I_INSERT_CONSOLIDATED_DOCUMENT
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CONSOLIDATED_DOCS SELECT p.SYSTEM_ID AS ID, p.DOCNAME, p.CREATION_DATE, p.DOCUMENTTYPE, p.AUTHOR, getpeoplename (p.author) AS AUTHOR_NAME, p.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, getDescCorr(p.id_ruolo_creatore) AS RUOLO_CREATORE, p.NUM_PROTO, p.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, p.DTA_PROTO, p.ID_PEOPLE_PROT, getpeoplename (p.id_people_prot) AS PEOPLE_PROT, p.ID_RUOLO_PROT, getDescCorr(p.id_ruolo_prot) AS RUOLO_PROT, p.ID_REGISTRO, GetCodReg(p.id_registro) AS REGISTRO, p.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, p.VAR_PROTO_IN, p.DTA_PROTO_IN, p.DTA_ANNULLA, p.ID_OGGETTO, p.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO, corrcat (p.system_id, p.cha_tipo_proto) AS MITT_DEST, p.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE FROM profile p WHERE p.system_id = @idDocument@ AND p.consolidation_state = 2

query.name: SAVE_GRID_SETTINGS
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_GRIDS ( @colID@ USER_ID_CREATORE, ROLE_ID_CREATORE, ADMINISTRATION_ID, SERIALIZED_GRID, TYPE_GRID, CHA_VISIBILE_A_UTENTE_O_RUOLO, IS_SEARCH_GRID, GRID_NAME ) values ( @id@ @userId@, @roleId@, @administrationId@, EMPTY_CLOB(), '@typeGrid@', '@visibility@', '@searchGrid@', '@gridName@' )

query.name: LOAD_GRID_SETTINGS
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_GRIDS WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @gridId@

query.name: GET_STANDARD_GRID_FOR_USER
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_GRIDS WHERE USER_ID_CREATORE = @userId@ AND ROLE_ID_CREATORE = @roleId@ AND ADMINISTRATION_ID = @administrationId@ AND TYPE_GRID = '@typeGrid@' AND SEARCH_ID = -1

query.name: GET_GRID_FROM_SEARCH_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_GRIDS WHERE ( USER_ID_CREATORE = @userId@ OR ROLE_ID_CREATORE = @roleId@ ) AND ADMINISTRATION_ID = @administrationId@ AND SYSTEM_ID = @gridId@

query.name: EXIST_GRID_FOR_RAPID_SEARCH
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_GRIDS WHERE USER_ID = @userId@ AND ROLE_ID = @roleId@ AND ADMINISTRATION_ID = @adminId@ AND SEARCH_ID = @searchId@

query.name: S_HAS_DOCUMENT_VERSIONS_FULL_VISIBILITY
query.value: select hasVersionsFullVisibility(@idProfile@, @idPeople@, @idGroup@) from dual

query.name: S_ESTRAZIONE_LOG
S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_IN_FASCICOLO_MASSIVE_OPERATION
query.value: SELECT A.SYSTEM_ID, (case when a.num_proto is not null then a.num_proto when a.num_proto is null then a.docnumber end) as CODICE FROM PROJECT_COMPONENTS B, PROFILE A @param6@ WHERE B.PROJECT_ID= @param2@ AND @security@ AND B.LINK=A.SYSTEM_ID AND NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' @param5@

query.name: PD_GET_VALUES_CONTATORI_DOC
query.value: select dpa_contatori_doc.system_id, dpa_contatori_doc.id_ogg, dpa_contatori_doc.id_tipologia, dpa_contatori_doc.id_aoo, dpa_contatori_doc.id_rf, dpa_contatori_doc.valore, dpa_contatori_doc.abilitato, dpa_contatori_doc.anno, dpa_contatori_doc.valore_sc, (select var_codice from dpa_el_registri where system_id = dpa_contatori_doc.id_aoo or system_id = dpa_contatori_doc.id_rf) as codice_rf_aoo, nvl((select var_desc_registro from dpa_el_registri where system_id = dpa_contatori_doc.id_aoo or system_id = dpa_contatori_doc.id_rf),'Contatore di Tipologia') as desc_rf_aoo from dpa_contatori_doc where dpa_contatori_doc.id_ogg = @idOggettoCustom@ and ( dpa_contatori_doc.id_aoo in (select system_id from dpa_el_registri) or dpa_contatori_doc.id_rf in (select system_id from dpa_el_registri) or dpa_contatori_doc.id_aoo = 0 or dpa_contatori_doc.id_rf = 0 ) order by dpa_contatori_doc.system_id

query.name: PD_DELETE_CONT_DOC
query.value: delete dpa_contatori_doc where system_id = @system_id@

query.name: GET_MAX_DTA_REGISTRAZIONE
query.value: select max(to_date(valore_oggetto_db, 'dd/mm/yyyy')) AS DTA_REGISTRAZIONE from dpa_associazione_templates where id_template = @idTemplate@ and id_oggetto = @idOggetto@ and valore_oggetto_db is not null and doc_number in ( select doc_number from dpa_associazione_templates where id_template = @idTemplate@ and doc_number is not null and id_aoo_rf = @idAooRf@ )

query.name: GET_DOC_MODEL_NAME
query.value: SELECT t.var_desc_atto FROM dpa_tipo_atto t WHERE t.system_id = @modelId@

query.name: GET_PRJ_MODEL_NAME
query.value: SELECT t.var_desc_fasc FROM dpa_tipo_fasc t WHERE t.system_id = @modelId@

query.name: S_PROFILE_ANNULLAMENTO_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM PROFILE WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemId@ AND DTA_ANNULLA IS NOT NULL

query.name: EXIST_GRID_PERSONALIZATION_FUNCTION
query.value: SELECT COUNT (f.disabled) FROM dpa_anagrafica_funzioni f WHERE f.cod_funzione = 'GRID_PERSONALIZATION' AND f.disabled = 'N'

query.name: S_J_PROFILE__SECURITY__OGGETTARIO_NO_SECURITY
S_CONFIG_CACHE
query.value: SELECT * from DPA_CONFIG_CACHE where idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: I_CONFIG_CACHE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_CONFIG_CACHE (idAmministrazione ,caching ,massima_dimensione_caching ,massima_dimensione_file ,doc_root_server ,ora_inizio_cache ,ora_fine_cache ,urlwscaching ,url_ws_caching_locale ,doc_root_server_locale) VALUES (@idAmministrazione@ ,@caching@ ,@massima_dimensione_caching@ ,@massima_dimensione_file@ ,@doc_root_server@ ,@ora_inizio_cache@ ,@ora_fine_cache@ ,@urlwscaching@ ,@urlwscachinglocale@ ,@doc_root_server_locale@ )

query.name: S_VERIFICA_FILE_IN_CACHE
query.value: SELECT PATHCACHE FROM DPA_CACHE WHERE DOCNUMBER =@docnumber@ AND VERSION_ID= @version_id@ AND idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: S_FILE_IN_CACHE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CACHE WHERE DOCNUMBER =@docnumber@

query.name: S_COMPONENTS_FILE
query.value: SELECT isnull(PATH,'')PATH ,isnull(LOCKED,'')LOCKED ,isnull(COMPTYPE,'')COMPTYPE ,VERSION_ID ,DOCNUMBER ,FILE_SIZE ,isnull(ALTERNATE_PATH,'')ALTERNATE_PATH ,isnull(VAR_IMPRONTA,'')VAR_IMPRONTA ,isnull(EXT,'')EXT ,isnull(CHA_FIRMATO,'')CHA_FIRMATO FROM COMPONENTS WHERE DOCNUMBER =@docnumber@ AND VERSION_ID= @version_id@

query.name: S_INFOUTENTE
query.value: SELECT A.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID,B.system_id,B.user_id, B.ID_AMM FROM PEOPLEGROUPS AS A INNER JOIN PEOPLE AS B ON A.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = B.SYSTEM_ID WHERE user_id = @user_id@

query.name: U_CONFIG_CACHE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CONFIG_CACHE SET idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@ ,caching = @caching@ ,massima_dimensione_caching = @massima_dimensione_caching@ ,massima_dimensione_file = @massima_dimensione_file@ ,doc_root_server = @doc_root_server@ ,ora_inizio_cache = @ora_inizio_cache@ ,ora_fine_cache = @ora_fine_cache@ ,urlwscaching = @urlwscaching@ ,url_ws_caching_locale = @urlwscachinglocale@ ,doc_root_server_locale = @doc_root_server_locale@ WHERE idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: D_CONFIG_CACHE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CONFIG_CACHE WHERE idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@

query.name: S_CACHE
query.value: SELECT A.DOCNUMBER ,A.PATHCACHE ,A.idAmministrazione ,A.AGGIORNATO ,A.FILE_SIZE ,A.VERSION_ID FROM DPA_CACHE a where a.idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@ and a.AGGIORNATO = @aggiornato@ order by LAST_ACCESS, file_size asc

query.name: S_CACHE_DA_TRASFERIRE
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CACHE a where a.idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@ and a.AGGIORNATO = @aggiornato@ order by file_size

query.name: S_CACHE_ALL
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CACHE a where a.DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@ and a.idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@ and a.VERSION_ID = @version_id@

query.name: S_CACHE_BY_DOCNUMBER
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CACHE a where a.DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@ order by version_id desc

query.name: S_CACHE_MAX_VESIONE
query.value: select pathcache, ext, max(version_id) as version_id from dpa_cache where docnumber = @docnumber@ group by pathcache, ext

query.name: S_CACHE_MAX_VESIONE_COMPONENTS
query.value: select path, ext, max(version_id) as version_id from components where docnumber = @docnumber@ group by path, ext

query.name: VERIFICA_FILE_IN_CACHE_CON_VERISON_ID
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CACHE as a where a.DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@ and a.version_id = @versionId@

query.name: DELETE_CACHE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_CACHE WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@ AND idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@ AND AGGIORNATO = @aggiornato@

query.name: U_CACHE_COMPONENTS
query.value: UPDATE COMPONENTS SET PATH = @PATH@ ,LOCKED = @LOCKED@ ,COMPTYPE = @COMPTYPE@ ,VERSION_ID = @VERSION_ID@ ,DOCNUMBER = @DOCNUMBER@ ,FILE_SIZE = @FILE_SIZE@ ,ALTERNATE_PATH = @ALTERNATE_PATH@ ,VAR_IMPRONTA = @VAR_IMPRONTA@ ,EXT = @EXT@ WHERE DOCNUMBER = @DOCNUMBER@ and VERSION_ID = @VERSION_ID@

query.name: U_CACHE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_CACHE SET DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@, PATHCACHE = @pathcache@, idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@, AGGIORNATO = @aggiornato@, VERSION_ID = @version_id@, LOCKED = @loked@, COMPTYPE = @comptype@, FILE_SIZE = @file_size@, ALTERNATE_PATH = @alternate_path@, VAR_IMPRONTA = @var_impronta@, LAST_ACCESS = @data@, EXT = @ext@ WHERE DOCNUMBER = @docnumber@ and idAmministrazione = @idAmministrazione@ and VERSION_ID = @version_id@

query.name: I_CACHE
GET_ID_AMM_BY_DOC_NUMER
query.value: select idamm from profile where docnumber = @docnumber@

query.name: GET_DOCNUMER_BY_SEGNATURA
query.value: select DOCNUMBER from PROFILE where VAR_SEGNATURA = @segnatura@

query.name: S_VERIFICA_CODICE_CORRETTO
query.value: SELECT * FROM dpa_corr_globali c, dpa_dett_globali dc WHERE UPPER (c.var_cod_rubrica) = UPPER ('@var_cod_rubrica@') AND dc.id_corr_globali = c.system_id AND c.dta_fine IS NULL AND UPPER (c.cha_tipo_urp) = 'U' AND UPPER (c.cha_tipo_ie) = 'I' AND UPPER (dc.var_note) = UPPER ('pubblicazione')

query.name: S_CODICE_CORRETTO_BY_ID
query.value: SELECT var_cod_rubrica,c.system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali c, dpa_dett_globali d WHERE c.system_id = d.id_corr_globali(+) AND cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND cha_tipo_urp = 'U' AND dta_fine IS NULL AND UPPER (d.var_note) = UPPER ('pubblicazione') CONNECT BY PRIOR c.id_parent= c.system_id START WITH c.system_id =@system_id@

query.name: S_CODICE_CORRETTO
query.value: SELECT * FROM dpa_corr_globali c, dpa_dett_globali dc WHERE UPPER (c.var_cod_rubrica) = UPPER ('@var_cod_rubrica@') AND c.dta_fine IS NULL AND UPPER (c.cha_tipo_urp) = 'U' AND UPPER (c.cha_tipo_ie) = 'I'

query.name: S_EREDITA_RAGIONE_TRASM_SINGOLA
query.value: SELECT p.CHA_EREDITA FROM DPA_RAGIONE_TRASM p, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA s WHERE s.system_id = @id_trasm@ AND p.SYSTEM_ID=s.ID_RAGIONE

query.name: S_MITTENTE_BY_TRASMISSIONE
query.value: SELECT r.ID_AMM, r.ID_GRUPPO,r.SYSTEM_ID as ID_CORR_GLOBALE_RUOLO, t.ID_PEOPLE FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI r, DPA_TRASMISSIONE t where t.SYSTEM_ID = @id_trasm@ and t.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO = r.SYSTEM_ID

query.name: GET_STANDARD_GRID_ID
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM DPA_GRIDS WHERE USER_ID = @userId@ AND ROLE_ID = @roleId@ AND ADMINISTRATION_ID = @administrationId@ AND TYPE_GRID = '@gridType@' AND SEARCH_ID = -1 ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_DPACorrGlobaliRuolo
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE A.CHA_TIPO_IE='I' AND A.CHA_TIPO_URP='U' AND A.DTA_FINE IS NULL @param2@

query.name: U_SECURITY_ACCESSRIGHTS_DOCUMENTO
query.value: UPDATE SECURITY SET ACCESSRIGHTS = 63 where ACCESSRIGHTS = 255 and CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO = 'F' and thing = @idProfile@

query.name: I_SECURITY_SELECT_MODIFICATA
query.value: INSERT INTO SECURITY (THING, PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO) (SELECT DISTINCT @param1@, personorgroup, accessrights, @param2@, 'F' FROM security, dpa_l_ruolo_reg b, dpa_corr_globali c WHERE personorgroup = c.id_gruppo AND c.system_id = b.id_ruolo_in_uo @param8@ AND thing = @param5@ AND NOT personorgroup IN (SELECT personorgroup FROM security WHERE thing = @param1@) UNION SELECT DISTINCT @param1@, personorgroup, accessrights, @param2@, 'F' FROM security, dpa_l_ruolo_reg b, dpa_corr_globali c, peoplegroups d WHERE personorgroup = d.people_system_id AND d.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.id_gruppo = d.groups_system_id AND c.system_id = b.id_ruolo_in_uo AND accessrights != 0 @param9@ AND thing = @param5@ AND NOT personorgroup IN (SELECT personorgroup FROM security WHERE thing = @param1@) )

query.name: I_SECURITY_SELECT_MODIFICATA_SEMPL
query.value: INSERT INTO SECURITY (THING, PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO) (SELECT DISTINCT @param1@, personorgroup, accessrights, @param2@, 'F' FROM security, dpa_l_ruolo_reg b, dpa_corr_globali c WHERE personorgroup = c.id_gruppo AND c.system_id = b.id_ruolo_in_uo AND thing = @param5@ AND NOT personorgroup IN (SELECT personorgroup FROM security WHERE thing = @param1@) )

query.name: S_GET_ULTIMA_NOTA_INSERITA_TUTTI
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT N.SYSTEM_ID, N.TESTO FROM DPA_NOTE N WHERE N.TIPOOGGETTOASSOCIATO = '@tipoOggetto@' AND N.IDOGGETTOASSOCIATO = @idOggetto@ AND (N.TIPOVISIBILITA = 'T') ORDER BY N.DATACREAZIONE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.id_registro, a.id_amm, c.var_desc_ruolo, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.personorgroup, b.hide_doc_versions, b.accessrights, a.id_uo, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, d.var_desc_corr AS desc_uo, d.cha_tipo_ie AS cha_tipo_uo, d.var_cod_rubrica AS var_cod_uo, b.ts_inserimento, b.var_note_sec, (select count(*) from dpa_role_history where original_corr_id = A.Original_Id and action != 'C') as ShowHistory, a.dta_fine FROM dpa_corr_globali a, security b, dpa_tipo_ruolo c, dpa_corr_globali d WHERE a.id_gruppo = b.personorgroup AND c.system_id = a.id_tipo_ruolo AND d.system_id = a.id_uo AND b.thing NOT IN ( SELECT system_id FROM PROFILE p WHERE p.system_id = b.thing AND NVL (p.cha_in_cestino, '0') = '1') AND b.thing = @param1@ AND (b.accessrights >= 0 OR b.cha_tipo_diritto = 'P') ORDER BY b.accessrights DESC, a.id_uo ASC

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL_PEOPLE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT c.system_id, c.id_registro, c.id_amm, a.var_nome, a.var_cognome, c.var_cod_rubrica, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.accessrights, a.system_id as personorgroup, b.hide_doc_versions, c.cha_tipo_corr, c.cha_tipo_ie, c.cha_tipo_urp, c.var_desc_corr FROM people a, security b, dpa_corr_globali c WHERE a.system_id = b.personorgroup AND c.id_people = a.system_id AND b.thing = @param1@ AND (b.accessrights > 0 OR b.cha_tipo_diritto = 'P') AND c.id_amm = @param2@

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL_RUOLI_DELETE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.id_registro, a.id_amm, c.var_desc_ruolo, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.note, b.personorgroup, b.hide_doc_versions, b.accessrights, a.id_uo, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, d.var_desc_corr AS desc_uo, d.cha_tipo_ie AS cha_tipo_uo, d.var_cod_rubrica AS var_cod_uo FROM dpa_corr_globali a, deleted_security b, dpa_tipo_ruolo c, dpa_corr_globali d WHERE a.id_gruppo = b.personorgroup AND c.system_id = a.id_tipo_ruolo AND d.system_id = a.id_uo AND b.thing = @param1@ AND (b.accessrights >= 0 OR b.cha_tipo_diritto = 'P') And Not Exists (Select 'x' From security sec Where sec.thing = b.thing and sec.personorgroup = b.personorgroup And sec.accessrights > 20) ORDER BY b.accessrights DESC, a.id_uo ASC

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL_FASC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.id_registro, a.id_amm, c.var_desc_ruolo, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.accessrights, a.id_uo, b.personorgroup, b.accessrights, a.id_uo, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, d.var_desc_corr AS desc_uo, d.cha_tipo_ie AS cha_tipo_uo, d.var_cod_rubrica AS var_cod_uo, b.ts_inserimento, b.var_note_sec, (select count(*) from dpa_role_history where original_corr_id = A.Original_Id and action != 'C') as ShowHistory, a.dta_fine FROM dpa_corr_globali a, security b, dpa_tipo_ruolo c, dpa_corr_globali d WHERE b.thing = @param1@ AND a.id_gruppo = b.personorgroup AND c.system_id = a.id_tipo_ruolo AND d.SYSTEM_ID = a.id_uo ORDER BY b.accessrights DESC, a.id_uo ASC

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL_FASC_UTENTI
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT c.system_id, c.id_registro, c.id_amm, a.var_nome, a.var_cognome, c.var_cod_rubrica, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.personorgroup, b.accessrights, a.disabled, c.cha_tipo_corr, c.cha_tipo_ie, c.cha_tipo_urp, c.var_desc_corr FROM people a, security b, dpa_corr_globali c WHERE b.thing = @param1@ AND a.system_id = b.personorgroup AND c.id_people = a.system_id AND c.cha_tipo_urp <> 'L'

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_FASC_SEMPL_RUOLI_DELETE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.id_registro, a.id_amm, c.var_desc_ruolo, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.accessrights, a.id_uo, b.note, b.personorgroup, a.cha_tipo_corr, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, d.var_desc_corr AS desc_uo, d.cha_tipo_ie AS cha_tipo_uo, d.var_cod_rubrica AS var_cod_uo FROM dpa_corr_globali a, deleted_security b, dpa_tipo_ruolo c, dpa_corr_globali d WHERE b.thing = @param1@ AND a.id_gruppo = b.personorgroup AND c.system_id = a.id_tipo_ruolo AND d.system_id = a.id_uo And Not Exists (Select 'x' From security sec Where sec.thing = b.thing and sec.personorgroup = b.personorgroup And sec.accessrights > 20) ORDER BY b.accessrights DESC, a.id_uo ASC

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL_FASC_UTENTI_DELETE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT c.system_id, c.id_registro, c.id_amm, a.var_nome, a.var_cognome, c.var_cod_rubrica, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.accessrights, a.disabled, a.system_id AS personorgroup, c.cha_tipo_corr, c.cha_tipo_ie, c.cha_tipo_urp, c.var_desc_corr FROM people a, deleted_security b, dpa_corr_globali c WHERE b.thing = @param1@ AND a.system_id = b.personorgroup AND c.id_people = a.system_id AND c.cha_tipo_urp <> 'L'

query.name: S_GET_DISPOSITIVI_STAMPA_ETICHETTA
query.value: SELECT Id, Code, Description FROM DPA_DISPOSITIVI_STAMPA

query.name: S_GET_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA_UTENTE
query.value: select p.ID_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA AS DISPOSITIVO_PEOPLE, a.ID_DISPOSITIVO_STAMPA AS DISPOSITIVO_AMMINISTRA from PEOPLE p left join DPA_AMMINISTRA a on P.ID_AMM = A.SYSTEM_ID where p.SYSTEM_ID = @idPeople@

query.name: S_GET_ID_FASC_OR_SOTTOFASC_DA_ID_DOC
query.value: select ID_FASCICOLO AS ID_FASC_OR_SOTTOFASC, 'F' AS FAR_OR_SOTTOFASC from PROJECT where SYSTEM_ID in( select PC.PROJECT_ID from PROJECT_COMPONENTS PC where PC.LINK = @idProfile@ ) and ID_FASCICOLO = id_parent UNION select SYSTEM_ID AS ID_FASC_OR_SOTTOFASC, 'SF' AS FAR_OR_SOTTOFASC from PROJECT where SYSTEM_ID in( select PC.PROJECT_ID from PROJECT_COMPONENTS PC where PC.LINK = @idProfile@ ) and ID_FASCICOLO != id_parent

query.name: S_TRASMISSIONE_SINGOLA_LITE
query.value: SELECT b.system_id, a.cha_tipo_oggetto, a.id_profile, a.id_project, b.cha_tipo_trasm, b.cha_tipo_dest, b.cha_set_eredita, d.cha_eredita, d.cha_tipo_diritti, d.cha_tipo_dest AS cha_tipo_dest_rag, a.id_people, a.id_ruolo_in_uo, g.id_gruppo, b.id_corr_globale, d.cha_tipo_ragione, d.system_id as id_ragione, (Select P.ID_AMM from people p where system_id = a.id_people) as id_amm_people FROM dpa_trasm_singola b, dpa_trasmissione a, dpa_trasm_utente c, dpa_ragione_trasm d, dpa_corr_globali g WHERE a.system_id = @param1@ AND c.system_id = @param2@ AND b.id_trasmissione = a.system_id AND c.id_trasm_singola = b.system_id AND g.system_id = a.id_ruolo_in_uo AND d.system_id = b.id_ragione

query.name: S_TRASM_TUTTE_DEST_UTENTE_DA_SINGOLA
query.value: SELECT a.system_id, a.id_people, d.full_name FROM dpa_trasm_utente a, people d WHERE a.id_trasm_singola = @idTrasmSingola@ AND id_people = d.system_id

query.name: S_TIPO_DEST_FROM_TRASM_SING
query.value: select cha_tipo_dest from dpa_trasm_singola where system_id = @id_trasm@

query.name: S_RIC_DOC_EXPORT
S_RIC_DOC_VELOCE_EXPORT
query.value:
SELECT a.*,getInADL(A.SYSTEM_ID,'D',@idGruppo@,@idPeople@) AS IN_ADL, getInConservazione(A.SYSTEM_ID, null,'D', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE,getchaimg(A.docnumber) as CHA_IMG , corrcat(A.system_id, A.cha_tipo_proto) as MITT_DEST, getPeopleUserId (a.AUTHOR) as AUTHOR FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, SYSTEM_ID, DOCNUMBER, DTA_ANNULLA, VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, ID_REGISTRO, CHA_TIPO_PROTO, CHA_EVIDENZA, NUM_ANNO_PROTO, nvl(DTA_PROTO,CREATION_DATE) AS DATA, CREATION_DATE, NUM_PROTO, VAR_SEGNATURA, DTA_PROTO, CHA_IMG, CHA_PRIVATO, CHA_PERSONALE, ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE, ID_TIPO_ATTO, DESC_TIPO_ATTO, AUTHOR FROM ( SELECT /*+index (a indx_profile1) */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.DOCNUMBER, A.DTA_ANNULLA, A.VAR_PROF_OGGETTO AS VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.ID_REGISTRO, A.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, A.CHA_EVIDENZA, A.NUM_ANNO_PROTO, to_char(A.CREATION_TIME,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS CREATION_DATE, A.NUM_PROTO, A.VAR_SEGNATURA, to_char(A.DTA_PROTO,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, A.CHA_PRIVATO, A.CHA_PERSONALE, A.ID_DOCUMENTO_PRINCIPALE,A.AUTHOR,A.CHA_IMG, a.id_tipo_atto as ID_TIPO_ATTO, ta.var_desc_atto as DESC_TIPO_ATTO FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id WHERE @security@ @filters@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate @doc@ ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC @unionStampe@
) WHERE ROWNUM < = @rowCount@ ) a

query.name: S_FASCICOLI_PAGING_EXPORT
query.value: SELECT a.*,getAccessRights(@idGrp@,@idPeo@,a.system_id) as accessrights,getCodtit(a.id_parent) as codTit, getInConservazione(null, a.system_id,'F', @idPeo@, @idGrp@) AS IN_CONSERVAZIONE @tipoContatore_cond@ FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY @customOrder@) as rn, a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note,@dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,a.AUTHOR, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.ID_UO_CREATORE, a.cha_controllato, a.cha_consenti_class, a.ID_RUOLO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_UO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_AUTHOR_CHIUSURA, a.DTA_APERTURA AS DTA_APERTURA_ORDER, a.DTA_CHIUSURA AS DTA_CHIUSURA_ORDER, a.id_titolario, @adl@ @customFieldForOrder@ FROM project a @tblCL1@ WHERE @security@ AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' @idReg@ @whereTlbCL1@ @guiFilters@ @idFasc@ ) a --order by contatoreOrdinamento desc

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TRASM_SINGOLA__TRASM_UTENTE3
query.value: SELECT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ @param1@, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'SEGNATURA_CODFASC'),vardescribe(id_project,'CODFASC')) ID_SEGN_CODFASC, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'DATADOC'),vardescribe(id_project,'DATA_CREAZ')) DATA_DOC_FASC, z.var_desc_corr, e.full_name, f.var_desc_corr AS desc_ruolo_mitt, g.cha_tipo_ragione, g.var_desc_ragione, g.cha_eredita, g.cha_tipo_diritti, h.FULL_NAME as desc_destinatario, f.var_codice as cod_ruolo_mitt, e.user_id, g.cha_risposta, g.cha_tipo_dest AS tipo_dest_rag, g.var_note, g.cha_tipo_risposta, g.var_notifica_trasm, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_doc, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_fasc, g.cha_cede_diritti, g.cha_mantieni_lett FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B,DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, dpa_corr_globali z, people e, dpa_corr_globali f, dpa_ragione_trasm g, people h @param2@ WHERE @param3@ AND z.system_id = b.id_corr_globale AND e.system_id = a.id_people AND f.system_id = a.id_ruolo_in_uo AND g.system_id = b.id_ragione AND h.system_id = c.id_people ORDER BY @orderCondition@, C.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TRASM_SINGOLA__TRASM_UTENTE_EXPORT
query.value: SELECT /*+ index (A INDX_TRASM3) */ A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, A.ID_PROFILE, A.ID_PROJECT,@param1@ AS DTA_INVIO_F, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI,B.ID_RAGIONE, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE, B.ID_TRASM_UTENTE, B.CHA_TIPO_DEST,B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE, B.HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS,B.VAR_NOTE_SING, B.CHA_TIPO_TRASM,@param2@ AS DTA_SCADENZA, C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE, C.ID_PEOPLE AS ID_DESTINATARIO, @param3@ AS DTA_VISTA,CHA_VISTA,@param4@ AS DTA_ACCETTATA,CHA_ACCETTATA, @param5@ AS DTA_RIFIUTATA,CHA_RIFIUTATA,C.VAR_NOTE_RIF, C.VAR_NOTE_ACC, C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, C.CHA_VALIDA, C.DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST AS DTA_RIMOSSA_TDL, A.CHA_SALVATA_CON_CESSIONE, A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO AS ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, C.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO AS DELEGATO_UTENTE, C.CHA_ACCETTATA_DELEGATO AS ACCETTATA_DELEGATO, C.CHA_VISTA_DELEGATO AS VISTA_DELEGATO, C.CHA_RIFIUTATA_DELEGATO AS RIFIUTATA_DELEGATO, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'SEGNATURA_CODFASC'),vardescribe(id_project,'CODFASC')) ID_SEGN_CODFASC, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'DATADOC'),vardescribe(id_project,'DATA_CREAZ')) DATA_DOC_FASC, z.var_desc_corr, e.full_name, f.var_desc_corr AS desc_ruolo_mitt, g.cha_tipo_ragione, g.var_desc_ragione, g.cha_eredita, g.cha_tipo_diritti, h.FULL_NAME as desc_destinatario, f.var_codice as cod_ruolo_mitt, e.user_id, g.cha_risposta, g.cha_tipo_dest AS tipo_dest_rag, g.var_note, g.cha_tipo_risposta, g.var_notifica_trasm, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_doc, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_fasc, g.cha_cede_diritti, g.cha_mantieni_lett FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, dpa_corr_globali z, people e, dpa_corr_globali f, dpa_ragione_trasm g, people h @param7@ WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA @param6@ AND z.system_id = b.id_corr_globale AND e.system_id = a.id_people AND f.system_id = a.id_ruolo_in_uo AND g.system_id = b.id_ragione AND h.system_id = c.id_people ORDER BY @orderCondition@, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE DESC

query.name: UPDATE_GRID_SETTINGS
query.value: UPDATE DPA_GRIDS SET IS_ACTIVE = '@isActive@', GRID_NAME = '@gridName@', CHA_VISIBILE_A_UTENTE_O_RUOLO = '@visibility@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = '@gridId@'

query.name: REMOVE_GRID
query.value: DELETE DPA_GRIDS WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @gridId@

query.name: GET_DEFINED_GRIDS
query.value: SELECT a.system_id, a.grid_name, a.role_id_creatore, a.user_id_creatore, a.type_grid, b.grid_id AS is_preferred, a.CHA_VISIBILE_A_UTENTE_O_RUOLO, a.is_search_grid FROM dpa_grids a LEFT JOIN dpa_ass_grids b ON b.grid_id = a.system_id AND b.USER_ID = @userId@ AND b.ROLE_ID = @roleId@ WHERE a.type_grid = '@typeGrid@' AND a.is_search_grid = 'N' AND a.administration_id = @administrationId@ AND ( ( a.cha_visibile_a_utente_o_ruolo = 'U' AND a.user_id_creatore = @userId@ ) OR ( a.cha_visibile_a_utente_o_ruolo = 'R' AND a.role_id_creatore = @roleId@ ) ) order by a.grid_name

query.name: S_DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE_COUNT_NAME_MODIFY
query.value: select count(*) from DPA_SALVA_RICERCHE where upper(VAR_DESCRIZIONE) = '@param1@' and (id_people = @idPeople@ or id_gruppo = @idGruppo@) and var_pagina_ric = '@pagina@' and system_id != @idRicerca@

query.name: U_DPA_MODIFICA_RICERCHE
query.value: update dpa_salva_ricerche set var_descrizione = '@descrizione@' , id_people = @idPeople@ , id_gruppo= @idGruppo@ , grid_id= @grid_id@ where system_id = @idRicerca@

query.name: GET_GRID_FOR_USER_CUSTUM
query.value: SELECT a.system_id, b.user_id, a.type_grid, a.serialized_grid, a.cha_visibile_a_utente_o_ruolo, a.grid_name, b.role_id FROM dpa_grids a, dpa_ass_grids b WHERE a.type_grid = '@typeGrid@' AND b.grid_id = a.system_id AND a.administration_id = @idAmm@ AND b.USER_ID = @idUser@ AND b.ROLE_ID = @idRole@

query.name: REMOVE_PREFERRED_GRID
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_GRIDS WHERE USER_ID = @userId@ AND ROLE_ID= @roleId@ AND ADMINISTRATION_ID = @administrationId@ AND TYPE_GRID = '@typeGrid@'

query.name: INSERT_DPA_ASS_GRIDS
REMOVE_PREFERRED_GRID_BY_ID
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_GRIDS WHERE GRID_ID = @gridId@

query.name: REMOVE_PREFERRED_GRID_BY_TYPE
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_GRIDS WHERE USER_ID = @idPeople@ AND ROLE_ID = @idGruppo@ AND ADMINISTRATION_ID = @idAmm@ AND TYPE_GRID = '@type@'

query.name: UPDATE_GRID_BY_ID
query.value: UPDATE DPA_GRIDS SET CHA_VISIBILE_A_UTENTE_O_RUOLO = '@visibility@', GRID_NAME = '@gridName@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @gridId@ AND ADMINISTRATION_ID = @administrationId@

query.name: SAVE_GRID_SEARCH_SETTINGS
GET_DEFINED_GRIDS_ONLY_ROLE
query.value: SELECT a.system_id, a.grid_name, a.role_id_creatore, a.user_id_creatore, a.type_grid, b.grid_id AS is_preferred, a.CHA_VISIBILE_A_UTENTE_O_RUOLO, a.is_search_grid FROM dpa_grids a LEFT JOIN dpa_ass_grids b ON b.grid_id = a.system_id AND b.USER_ID = @userId@ AND b.ROLE_ID = @roleId@ WHERE a.type_grid = '@typeGrid@' AND a.is_search_grid = 'N' AND a.administration_id = @administrationId@ AND a.cha_visibile_a_utente_o_ruolo = 'R' AND a.role_id_creatore = @roleId@ order by a.grid_name

query.name: S_RIC_DOC_CUSTOM
query.value: SELECT a.*, getpeopleuserid (a.author) AS code_author, getchaimg (a.docnumber) AS cha_img, getinadl (a.system_id, 'D', @idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AS in_adl, getinconservazione (a.system_id,NULL,'D',@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS in_conservazione, getchafirmato (a.docnumber) AS cha_firmato, corrcat (a.system_id, a.cha_tipo_proto) AS mitt_dest, gettestoultimanota ('D',a.system_id,@idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS ultima_nota, getpeoplename (a.author) AS desc_autore, getdesccorr (a.id_ruolo_creatore) AS desc_ruolo_autore, getcodruolobyidcorr (a.id_ruolo_creatore) AS cod_ruolo_autore, getcodreg (a.id_registro) AS cod_registro, classcat(a.system_id) as COD_FASCICOLI, getdataarrivodoc (a.docnumber) AS data_arrivo, getdiagrammistato (a.docnumber, 'D') AS stato, corrcatbytipo(a.docnumber, a.cha_tipo_proto, 'M') as mittenti, corrcatbytipo(a.docnumber, a.cha_tipo_proto, 'D') as destinatari, getEsitoPubblicazione(a.system_id) as pubblicazione, esisteNotaVisibile('D',a.system_id,@idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS esiste_nota, a.cha_cod_t_a, getImpronta(a.docnumber) as impronta @contatore@ @valoriCustom@ @conservazione@ FROM (SELECT @index@ interna.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT @index2@ a.system_id, a.docnumber, a.dta_annulla, a.var_prof_oggetto AS var_desc_oggetto, a.id_registro, a.cha_tipo_proto, a.cha_evidenza, a.num_anno_proto, TO_CHAR ( NVL (a.dta_proto, a.creation_time), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, TO_CHAR (a.creation_time, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS creation_date, a.num_proto, a.var_segnatura, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS dta_proto, a.cha_privato, a.cha_personale, a.id_documento_principale, a.cha_in_archivio, a.id_tipo_atto AS id_tipo_atto, ta.var_desc_atto AS desc_tipo_atto, a.prot_tit AS prot_tit, a.archive_date as dta_archiviazione, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.author, a.cha_cod_t_a, a.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id @listDocuments@ @fromOther@ @from@ WHERE @security@ @filters@ @ricVeloce@ @stampe@ ORDER BY @order@ )interna @paging@ @unionStampe@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_VELOCE_CUSTOM
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, CODICE FROM ( SELECT @index@ A.SYSTEM_ID, (case when a.num_proto is not null then a.num_proto when a.num_proto is null then a.docnumber end) as codice FROM PROFILE a WHERE @security@ @filters@ AND NVL (dta_proto, creation_date) between add_months(sysdate,-1) and sysdate @unionStampe@ ORDER BY @order@ ) WHERE ROWNUM < = @rowCount@

query.name: S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_MASSIVE_OPERATIONS_CUSTOM
S_GET_COUNT_ROWS_RICERCA_DOCUMENTI_CUSTOM
S_FASCICOLI_PAGING_CUSTOM
query.value: SELECT a.*, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AS in_adl, getaccessrights (@idGruppo@, @idPeople@, a.system_id) AS accessrights, getcodtit (a.id_parent) AS codtit, getinconservazione (NULL, a.system_id, 'F', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@ ) AS in_conservazione, getcodreg(a.id_registro) as AOO, gettestoultimanota ('F',a.system_id, @idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) as ultima_nota, getdiagrammistato (a.system_id, 'F') AS stato, getDescTitolario(a.id_titolario) as cod_titolario, getpeoplename (a.author) as desc_autore, getdesccorr(a.id_ruolo_creatore) as desc_ruolo, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_creatore) as desc_uo, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_lf) as desc_coll, esisteNotaVisibile('F',a.system_id,@idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS esiste_nota, a.cha_cod_t_a @conservazione@ @contatore@ @valoriCustom@ FROM (SELECT @index@ interna.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(a)*/ a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note, @dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,a.AUTHOR, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.ID_UO_CREATORE, a.cha_controllato, a.cha_consenti_class, a.ID_RUOLO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_UO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_AUTHOR_CHIUSURA, a.DTA_APERTURA AS DTA_APERTURA_ORDER, a.DTA_CHIUSURA AS DTA_CHIUSURA_ORDER, a.id_titolario, a.num_fascicolo as num_fasc, a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, ta.var_desc_fasc AS desc_tipo_atto, a.ID_TIPO_FASC, a.cha_cod_t_a FROM project a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_fasc ta on a.ID_TIPO_FASC = ta.system_id @tblCL1@ WHERE @security@ AND (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' @listDocuments@ @idReg@ @whereTlbCL1@ @guiFilters@ ORDER BY @order@ )interna @paging@ --order by contatoreOrdinamento desc

query.name: S_FASCICOLI_GET_OBJECT_BY_SYSTEM_ID
query.value: SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.system_id DESC) as rn, a.system_id, a.description, a.cha_tipo_proj, a.var_codice, a.id_amm, a.num_livello,a.cha_tipo_fascicolo, a.id_fascicolo, a.id_parent,a.var_cod_ultimo,a.var_note,@dtaAp@ AS dta_apertura, @dtaCh@ AS dta_chiusura,a.cha_stato, a.id_tipo_proc, a.id_registro , getcodreg(a.id_registro) as codReg,a.id_uo_lf,A.DTA_UO_LF, a.dta_creazione, a.cartaceo,a.cha_privato,a.ID_UO_REF, to_char(a.dta_scadenza,'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_SCADENZA, a.CHA_IN_ARCHIVIO,a.AUTHOR, a.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, a.ID_UO_CREATORE, a.cha_controllato, a.cha_consenti_class, a.ID_RUOLO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_UO_CHIUSURA, a.ID_AUTHOR_CHIUSURA, a.DTA_APERTURA AS DTA_APERTURA_ORDER, a.DTA_CHIUSURA AS DTA_CHIUSURA_ORDER, a.id_titolario, getinadl (a.system_id, 'F', @idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AS in_adl, getaccessrights (@idGruppo@, @idPeople@, a.system_id) AS accessrights, getcodtit (a.id_parent) AS codtit, getinconservazione (NULL, a.system_id, 'F', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@ ) AS in_conservazione, getcodreg(a.id_registro) as AOO, gettestoultimanota ('F',a.system_id, @idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) as ultima_nota, a.num_fascicolo as num_fasc, a.NUM_MESI_CONSERVAZIONE, getdiagrammistato (a.system_id, 'F') AS stato, ta.var_desc_fasc AS desc_tipo_atto, getDescTitolario(a.id_titolario) as cod_titolario, getpeoplename (a.author) as desc_autore, getdesccorr(a.id_ruolo_creatore) as desc_ruolo, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_creatore) as desc_uo, a.ID_TIPO_FASC, getdesccorr(a.id_uo_lf) as desc_coll , GETCONTATOREFASC(a.system_id,'R') as contatore, esisteNotaVisibile('D',a.system_id,@idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS esiste_nota, cha_cod_t_a FROM project a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_fasc ta on a.ID_TIPO_FASC = ta.system_id WHERE (a.id_amm IS NULL OR a.id_amm = @idAmm@) AND a.cha_tipo_proj = 'F' AND a.system_id = @systemId@ ) a --order by contatoreOrdinamento desc

query.name: S_J_PROFILE_SECURITY_PROJECT_COMPONENTS_DOCUMENTTYPES_NEW_CUSTOM
query.value: SELECT a.*, getpeopleuserid (a.author) AS code_author, a.prot_tit AS prot_tit, getchaimg (a.docnumber) AS cha_img, getinadl (a.system_id, 'D', @idGruppo@, @idPeople@) AS in_adl, getinconservazione (a.system_id,NULL, 'D', @idPeople@, @idGruppo@ ) AS in_conservazione, getchafirmato (a.docnumber) AS cha_firmato, corrcat (a.system_id, a.cha_tipo_proto) AS mitt_dest, gettestoultimanota ('D', a.system_id, @idGruppo@, @idPeople@, @idGruppo@ ) AS ultima_nota, getpeoplename (a.author) AS desc_autore, getdesccorr (a.id_ruolo_creatore) AS desc_ruolo_autore, getcodruolobyidcorr (a.id_ruolo_creatore) AS cod_ruolo_autore, getcodreg (a.id_registro) AS cod_registro, classcat(a.system_id) as COD_FASCICOLI, getdataarrivodoc (a.docnumber) AS data_arrivo, getdiagrammistato (a.docnumber, 'D') AS stato, corrcatbytipo(a.docnumber, a.cha_tipo_proto, 'M') as mittenti, corrcatbytipo(a.docnumber, a.cha_tipo_proto, 'D') as destinatari, getEsitoPubblicazione(a.system_id) as pubblicazione, esisteNotaVisibile('D',a.system_id,@idGruppo@,@idPeople@,@idGruppo@) AS esiste_nota, a.cha_cod_t_a, getImpronta(a.docnumber) as impronta @contatore@ @valoriCustom@ FROM (SELECT @index@ interna.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(a)*/ a.system_id, a.docnumber, a.dta_annulla, a.var_prof_oggetto AS var_desc_oggetto, a.id_registro, a.cha_tipo_proto, a.cha_evidenza, a.num_anno_proto, TO_CHAR ( NVL (a.dta_proto, a.creation_time), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DATA, TO_CHAR (a.creation_time, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS creation_date, a.num_proto, a.var_segnatura, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS dta_proto, a.cha_privato, a.cha_personale, a.id_documento_principale, a.cha_in_archivio, a.id_tipo_atto AS id_tipo_atto, ta.var_desc_atto AS desc_tipo_atto, a.archive_date as dta_archiviazione, a.COD_EXT_APP, a.id_ruolo_creatore, a.author, a.prot_tit, a.cha_cod_t_a FROM PROFILE a LEFT JOIN dpa_tipo_atto ta on a.id_tipo_atto = ta.system_id, PROJECT_COMPONENTS B, DOCUMENTTYPES D @param6@ WHERE B.PROJECT_ID= @param2@ AND B.LINK=A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.TYPE = 'D' AND A.DOCUMENTTYPE=D.SYSTEM_ID AND @security@ AND NVL(CHA_IN_CESTINO,'0')='0' @param5@ @listDocuments@ ORDER BY @order@ )interna @paging@

query.name: S_EXPORT_TRASM_MODEL
query.value: SELECT 'MT_' || mt.system_id as system_id, mt.nome, md.cha_tipo_mitt_dest, cg.var_desc_corr, cg.cha_tipo_urp, mt.cha_tipo_oggetto, r.var_desc_registro, rt.var_desc_ragione, cg.dta_fine, cg.cha_disabled_trasm FROM dpa_modelli_trasm mt INNER JOIN dpa_modelli_mitt_dest md ON mt.system_id = md.id_modello LEFT OUTER JOIN dpa_corr_globali cg ON md.id_corr_globali = cg.system_id INNER JOIN dpa_el_registri r ON mt.id_registro = r.system_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dpa_ragione_trasm rt ON md.id_ragione = rt.system_id WHERE mt.id_amm = @ammId@ @filterCond@ ORDER BY mt.system_id

query.name: S_EXPORT_TRASM_MODEL_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT 'MT_' || mt.system_id as system_id, mt.nome, md.cha_tipo_mitt_dest, cg.var_desc_corr, cg.cha_tipo_urp, mt.cha_tipo_oggetto, r.var_desc_registro, rt.var_desc_ragione, cg.dta_fine, cg.cha_disabled_trasm FROM dpa_modelli_trasm mt INNER JOIN dpa_modelli_mitt_dest md ON mt.system_id = md.id_modello LEFT OUTER JOIN dpa_corr_globali cg ON md.id_corr_globali = cg.system_id INNER JOIN dpa_el_registri r ON mt.id_registro = r.system_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dpa_ragione_trasm rt ON md.id_ragione = rt.system_id WHERE mt.system_id IN ( SELECT mt.system_id FROM dpa_modelli_trasm mt INNER JOIN dpa_modelli_mitt_dest md ON mt.system_id = md.id_modello WHERE mt.id_amm = @ammId@ AND (mt.id_people = @idPeople@ OR mt.id_people IS NULL) AND md.cha_tipo_mitt_dest = 'M' AND mt.SINGLE = '0' AND (md.id_corr_globali = @idCorr@ OR md.id_corr_globali = 0) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT dpa_ass_diagrammi.id_mod_trasm FROM dpa_ass_diagrammi WHERE md.id_modello = dpa_ass_diagrammi.id_mod_trasm)) @filterCond@ ORDER BY mt.system_id

query.name: S_REPORT_ROLES_DISABLED
query.value: SELECT cg.var_codice AS codice, cg.var_desc_corr descrizione, getcoduo (cg.id_uo) AS uo_appartenenza FROM dpa_corr_globali cg WHERE cg.id_amm = @ammId@ AND cg.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND cg.dta_fine IS NOT NULL AND cg.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' ORDER BY 1, 2

query.name: S_REPORT_ROLES_INHIBITED
query.value: SELECT cg.var_codice AS codice, cg.var_desc_corr descrizione, getcoduo (cg.id_uo) AS uo_appartenenza FROM dpa_corr_globali cg WHERE cg.id_amm = @ammId@ AND cg.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND cg.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND cg.cha_disabled_trasm != '0' ORDER BY 1, 2

query.name: S_REPORT_ROLES_WOUT_USERS
query.value: SELECT cg.var_codice AS codice, cg.var_desc_corr descrizione, getcoduo (cg.id_uo) AS uo_appartenenza FROM dpa_corr_globali cg WHERE cg.id_amm = @ammId@ AND cg.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND cg.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND cg.dta_fine IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'x' FROM GROUPS g, people p, peoplegroups pg WHERE pg.groups_system_id = g.system_id AND pg.people_system_id = p.system_id AND cg.id_gruppo = g.system_id) ORDER BY 1, 2

query.name: S_REPORT_ROLES_WOUT_REGS_OR_RF
query.value: SELECT cg.var_codice AS codice, cg.var_desc_corr descrizione, getcoduo (cg.id_uo) AS uo_appartenenza FROM dpa_corr_globali cg WHERE cg.id_amm = @ammId@ AND cg.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND cg.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND cg.dta_fine IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'x' FROM dpa_l_ruolo_reg lrr WHERE lrr.id_ruolo_in_uo = cg.system_id)

query.name: S_REPORT_WOUT_FUNCTIONS
query.value: SELECT cg.var_codice AS codice, cg.var_desc_corr descrizione, getcoduo (cg.id_uo) AS uo_appartenenza FROM dpa_corr_globali cg WHERE cg.id_amm = @ammId@ AND cg.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND cg.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND cg.dta_fine IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM dpa_tipo_f_ruolo tfr --, dpa_corr_globali cg WHERE tfr.id_ruolo_in_uo = cg.system_id) ORDER BY 1, 2

query.name: S_REPORT_UO_WOUT_ROLES
query.value: SELECT cg_uo.var_codice AS codice, cg_uo.var_desc_corr descrizione, getcoduo (cg_uo.id_uo) AS uo_appartenenza FROM dpa_corr_globali cg_uo WHERE cg_uo.id_amm = @ammId@ AND cg_uo.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND cg_uo.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' AND cg_uo.DTA_FINE is null AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM dpa_corr_globali cg_ruoli WHERE cg_uo.system_id = cg_ruoli.id_uo ) ORDER BY 1, 2

query.name: S_REPORT_WOUT_RF
query.value: SELECT cg_uo.var_codice AS codice, cg_uo.var_desc_corr descrizione, getcoduo (cg_uo.id_uo) AS uo_appartenenza FROM dpa_corr_globali cg_uo WHERE cg_uo.id_amm = @ammId@ and cg_uo.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'U' AND cg_uo.cha_tipo_ie = 'I' and cg_uo.DTA_FINE is null and not exists (SELECT 'x' FROM dpa_corr_globali cg_ruoli WHERE cg_uo.system_id = cg_ruoli.id_uo and cg_ruoli.CHA_RIFERIMENTO = '1' ) ORDER BY 1, 2

query.name: S_IS_CORR_IN_LISTA_DISTR
query.value: select var_codice, var_desc_corr, getDescCorr(id_people_liste) as prop, getCodRuolo(id_gruppo_liste) as ruolo from dpa_corr_globali where cha_tipo_urp = 'L' and system_id in (select id_lista_dpa_corr from dpa_liste_distr where id_dpa_corr = @param1@)

query.name: S_FIND_MODELLI
query.value: SELECT dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id IdModello, dpa_modelli_trasm.nome, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.system_id idmittdest, dpa_ragione_trasm.cha_tipo_dest tipotrasmissione, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_corr_globali idcorrispondente, dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello numerolivello, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.cha_tipo_mitt_dest mittdest FROM dpa_modelli_trasm, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest, dpa_ragione_trasm, dpa_corr_globali, dpa_tipo_ruolo WHERE dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND dpa_modelli_trasm.id_amm = @ammId@ AND dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id = dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_modello AND dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_ragione = dpa_ragione_trasm.system_id AND dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_corr_globali = dpa_corr_globali.system_id AND dpa_corr_globali.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id @filterCond@ ORDER BY dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id

query.name: S_FIND_MODELLI_USER
query.value: SELECT dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id IdModello, dpa_modelli_trasm.nome, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.system_id idmittdest, dpa_ragione_trasm.cha_tipo_dest tipotrasmissione, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_corr_globali idcorrispondente, dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello numerolivello, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.cha_tipo_mitt_dest mittdest FROM dpa_modelli_trasm, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest, dpa_ragione_trasm, dpa_corr_globali, dpa_tipo_ruolo WHERE dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.cha_tipo_urp = 'R' AND dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id = dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_modello AND dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_ragione = dpa_ragione_trasm.system_id AND dpa_modelli_mitt_dest.id_corr_globali = dpa_corr_globali.system_id AND dpa_corr_globali.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id @filterCond@ AND dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id IN ( SELECT mt.system_id FROM dpa_modelli_trasm mt, dpa_modelli_mitt_dest md WHERE mt.system_id = md.id_modello AND mt.id_amm = @ammId@ AND (mt.id_people = @idPeople@ OR mt.id_people IS NULL) AND md.cha_tipo_mitt_dest = 'M' AND mt.SINGLE = '0' AND (md.id_corr_globali = @corrId@ OR md.id_corr_globali = 0) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT dpa_ass_diagrammi.id_mod_trasm FROM dpa_ass_diagrammi WHERE md.id_modello = dpa_ass_diagrammi.id_mod_trasm)) ORDER BY dpa_modelli_trasm.system_id

query.name: IS_USER_ADMINISTRATOR
query.value: SELECT p.cha_amministratore FROM people p WHERE p.system_id = @userId@

query.name: DELETE_DESTINATARI_MODELLO_FIND_AND_REPLACE
query.value: DELETE FROM dpa_modelli_dest_con_notifica WHERE id_modello_mitt_dest = @modelloMittDest@ AND id_modello = @idModello@

query.name: INSERT_DESTINATARI_MODELLO_FIND_AND_REPLACE
query.value: INSERT into dpa_modelli_dest_con_notifica(system_id, id_modello_mitt_dest, id_people, id_modello) VALUES (@id@, @idModelloMittDest@, @idPeople@, @idModello@)

query.name: UPDATE_MODELLO_FIND_AND_REPLACE
query.value: UPDATE dpa_modelli_mitt_dest SET id_corr_globali = @idCorrGlobale@ @copyNote@ WHERE system_id = @idMittDest@ AND id_corr_globali = @oldIdCorrGlobali@

query.name: GET_MITT_MODELLO_FIND_AND_REPLACE
query.value: SELECT tr.num_livello numerolivello, cg.system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali cg, dpa_tipo_ruolo tr WHERE cg.id_tipo_ruolo = tr.system_id AND cg.system_id IN ( SELECT md.id_corr_globali FROM dpa_modelli_mitt_dest md WHERE md.id_modello = @modelId@ AND md.cha_tipo_mitt_dest = 'M')

query.name: CDC_REPORT_DECRETI_PERVENUTI_IN_INT_TEMPORALE
query.value: SELECT vm.system_id, vardescribe (vm.system_id, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') AS segnatura, getvaloreoggettodb (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Preventivo SCCLA', 'Num. Decreto' ) AS numdec, to_char(getvaloreoggettodb_tipodata (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Preventivo SCCLA', 'Data decreto' ),'dd/mm/yy') AS DataDec, vm.var_prof_oggetto AS oggetto, to_char(NVL (vm.dta_arrivo, dta_protocollo),'dd/mm/yy') AS dataarrivo, vm.tipologia AS tip, descuo (primo_revisore) AS primorevisore, descuo (vm.secondo_revisore) AS secondorevisore, descuo (magistrato_istruttore) AS magistratoistruttore, vm.stato as stato, to_char(vm.data_primo_rilievo,'dd/mm/yy') AS dataprimorilievo, to_char(getvaloreoggettodb_tipodata (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Preventivo SCCLA', 'Data ritorno primo rilievo' ),'dd/mm/yy') AS dataritornoprimorilievo, vm.data_secondo_rilievo, floor(SYSDATE - NVL (vm.dta_arrivo, dta_protocollo)) AS giac, to_char(vm.data_restituz_amministrazione,'dd/mm/yy') AS datarestamm, to_char(vm.data_registrazione,'dd/mm/yy') AS datareg, to_char(vm.data_scadenza_controllo,'dd/mm/yy') AS datascadcontrollo, to_char(getvaloreoggettodb_tipodata (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Preventivo SCCLA', 'Data scadenza Amministrazione' ),'dd/mm/yy') AS datascadamm FROM v_cdc_controllo_preventivo vm WHERE vm.personorgroup IN (@ufficio@) @filterCond@

query.name: CDC_REPORT_DECRETI_PERVENUTI_IN_INT_TEMPORALE_SUCC_SCCLA
query.value: SELECT vm.system_id, vardescribe (vm.system_id, 'SEGNATURA_DOCNUMBER') AS segnatura, getvaloreoggettodb (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Successivo SCCLA', 'Num. Decreto' ) AS numdec, to_char(getvaloreoggettodb_tipodata (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Successivo SCCLA', 'Data decreto' ),'dd/mm/yy') AS DataDec, vm.var_prof_oggetto AS oggetto, to_char(NVL (vm.dta_arrivo, dta_protocollo),'dd/mm/yy') AS dataarrivo, vm.tipologia AS tip, descuo (primo_revisore) AS primorevisore, descuo (vm.secondo_revisore) AS secondorevisore, descuo (magistrato_istruttore) AS magistratoistruttore, vm.stato as stato, to_char(vm.data_primo_rilievo,'dd/mm/yy') AS dataprimorilievo, to_char(getvaloreoggettodb_tipodata (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Successivo SCCLA', 'Data ritorno primo rilievo' ),'dd/mm/yy') AS dataritornoprimorilievo, vm.data_secondo_rilievo, floor(SYSDATE - NVL (vm.dta_arrivo, dta_protocollo)) AS giac, to_char(vm.data_restituz_amministrazione,'dd/mm/yy') AS datarestamm, to_char(vm.data_registrazione,'dd/mm/yy') AS datareg, to_char(vm.data_scadenza_controllo,'dd/mm/yy') AS datascadcontrollo, to_char(getvaloreoggettodb_tipodata (953, vm.system_id, 'Controllo Successivo SCCLA', 'Data scadenza Amministrazione' ),'dd/mm/yy') AS datascadamm FROM V_CDC_CONTROLLO_SUCCESSIVO vm WHERE vm.personorgroup IN (@ufficio@) @filterCond@

query.name: GET_STATI_DG_PER_RICERCA
query.value: select distinct(dpa_diagrammi.id_stato), dpa_stati.var_descrizione from dpa_diagrammi, dpa_stati where dpa_diagrammi.id_diagramma = @idDiagramma@ and dpa_diagrammi.id_stato = dpa_stati.system_id and (dpa_stati.non_ricercabile <> 1 or dpa_stati.non_ricercabile is null) @docOrFasc@ order by dpa_stati.var_descrizione asc

query.name: S_DPA_TRASM_SyIDTrRic_LITE
query.value: SELECT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ a.system_id as id_trasm FROM @param2@ WHERE @param3@ ORDER BY @orderCondition@, c.system_id desc

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TRASM_SINGOLA__TRASM_UTENTE4
query.value: SELECT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ @param1@, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'SEGNATURA_CODFASC'),vardescribe(id_project,'CODFASC')) ID_SEGN_CODFASC, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'DATADOC'),vardescribe(id_project,'DATA_CREAZ')) DATA_DOC_FASC, getdesccorr(id_corr_globale) as var_desc_corr, getpeoplename(a.id_people) as full_name, getdesccorr(a.id_ruolo_in_uo) AS desc_ruolo_mitt, g.cha_tipo_ragione, g.var_desc_ragione, g.cha_eredita, g.cha_tipo_diritti, getpeoplename(c.id_people) as desc_destinatario, getcodruolobyidcorr(a.id_ruolo_in_uo) as cod_ruolo_mitt, g.cha_risposta, g.cha_tipo_dest AS tipo_dest_rag, g.var_note, g.cha_tipo_risposta, g.var_notifica_trasm, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_doc, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_fasc, g.cha_cede_diritti, g.cha_mantieni_lett, GETPEOPLEUSERID(a.id_people) as USER_ID @otherField@ FROM DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C,DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B,DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, dpa_ragione_trasm g @otherTable@ @param2@ WHERE @param3@ AND g.system_id = b.id_ragione @otherFilter@ ORDER BY @orderCondition@, C.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_ALL_DESTINATARI_TRASMISSIONI
query.value: SELECT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ a.id_trasm_singola as system_id, a.id_people, getpeoplename(a.ID_PEOPLE) as full_name FROM dpa_trasm_utente a WHERE @listaTrasm@ order by a.id_trasm_singola

query.name: S_J_DPA_TRASMISSIONE__TRASM_SINGOLA__TRASM_UTENTE_EXPORT2
query.value: SELECT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ A.ID_RUOLO_IN_UO, A.ID_PEOPLE, A.CHA_TIPO_OGGETTO, A.ID_PROFILE, A.ID_PROJECT,@param1@ AS DTA_INVIO_F, A.VAR_NOTE_GENERALI,B.ID_RAGIONE, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE, B.ID_TRASM_UTENTE, B.CHA_TIPO_DEST,B.ID_CORR_GLOBALE, B.HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS,B.VAR_NOTE_SING, B.CHA_TIPO_TRASM,@param2@ AS DTA_SCADENZA, C.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASMISSIONE_UTENTE, C.ID_PEOPLE AS ID_DESTINATARIO, @param3@ AS DTA_VISTA,CHA_VISTA,@param4@ AS DTA_ACCETTATA,CHA_ACCETTATA, @param5@ AS DTA_RIFIUTATA,CHA_RIFIUTATA,C.VAR_NOTE_RIF, C.VAR_NOTE_ACC, C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, C.CHA_VALIDA, C.DTA_RIMOZIONE_TODOLIST AS DTA_RIMOSSA_TDL, A.CHA_SALVATA_CON_CESSIONE, A.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO AS ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO, C.ID_PEOPLE_DELEGATO AS DELEGATO_UTENTE, C.CHA_ACCETTATA_DELEGATO AS ACCETTATA_DELEGATO, C.CHA_VISTA_DELEGATO AS VISTA_DELEGATO, C.CHA_RIFIUTATA_DELEGATO AS RIFIUTATA_DELEGATO, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'SEGNATURA_CODFASC'),vardescribe(id_project,'CODFASC')) ID_SEGN_CODFASC, nvl(vardescribe(id_profile,'DATADOC'),vardescribe(id_project,'DATA_CREAZ')) DATA_DOC_FASC, getdesccorr(id_corr_globale) as var_desc_corr, getpeoplename(a.id_people) as full_name, getdesccorr(a.id_ruolo_in_uo) AS desc_ruolo_mitt, g.cha_tipo_ragione, g.var_desc_ragione, g.cha_eredita, g.cha_tipo_diritti, getpeoplename(c.id_people) as desc_destinatario, getcodruolobyidcorr(a.id_ruolo_in_uo) as cod_ruolo_mitt, GETPEOPLEUSERID(a.id_people) as USER_ID, g.cha_risposta, g.cha_tipo_dest AS tipo_dest_rag, g.var_note, g.cha_tipo_risposta, g.var_notifica_trasm, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_doc, g.var_testo_msg_notifica_fasc, g.cha_cede_diritti, g.cha_mantieni_lett @otherField@ FROM DPA_TRASMISSIONE A, DPA_TRASM_SINGOLA B, DPA_TRASM_UTENTE C, dpa_ragione_trasm g @otherTable@ @param7@ WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID=B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AND B.SYSTEM_ID=C.ID_TRASM_SINGOLA @param6@ AND g.system_id = b.id_ragione @otherFilter@ ORDER BY @orderCondition@, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE DESC

query.name: S_DPA_TRASM_SyIDTrEff_LITE
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT /*+index(c) index(b) index(a) */ A.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_TRASM, A.DTA_INVIO, B.ID_TRASMISSIONE AS ID_TRASM_SINGOLA, B.ID_RAGIONE FROM @param2@ WHERE @param3@ ORDER BY @orderCondition@

query.name: COPY_VISIBILITY
GET_ID_GRUPPO_RUOLI_SUP
query.value: SELECT dpa_corr_globali.id_gruppo, dpa_corr_globali.var_codice FROM dpa_corr_globali INNER JOIN dpa_tipo_ruolo ON dpa_corr_globali.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id WHERE dpa_corr_globali.id_uo IN (SELECT dpa_corr_globali.system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE dpa_corr_globali.dta_fine IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR dpa_corr_globali.id_parent = dpa_corr_globali.system_id START WITH dpa_corr_globali.system_id = (SELECT dpa_corr_globali.id_uo FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE dpa_corr_globali.id_gruppo = @idGruppoRuoloDestinatario@ ) ) AND dpa_corr_globali.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R' AND dpa_corr_globali.ID_AMM = @idAmm@ AND dpa_corr_globali.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello < (SELECT dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello FROM dpa_corr_globali INNER JOIN dpa_tipo_ruolo ON dpa_corr_globali.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id WHERE dpa_corr_globali.id_gruppo = @idGruppoRuoloDestinatario@ )

query.name: GET_ID_DOC_OR_FASC_COPY_VIS
GET_ALL_GRIDS
query.value: select system_id, type_grid, serialized_grid from dpa_grids

query.name: COUNT_DELEGHE_ATTIVE_E_IN_ESERCIZIO_UTENTE
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dpa_deleghe d WHERE (d.id_people_delegato = @idPeople@ AND d.cha_in_esercizio = 1 ) -- L'utente sta esercitando delle deleghe OR ( d.id_people_delegante = @idPeople@ AND d.id_ruolo_delegante = @idRole@ AND d.cha_in_esercizio = 1 ) -- L'utente ha delegato qualcuno AND d.data_decorrenza < SYSDATE AND (d.data_scadenza > SYSDATE OR d.data_scadenza IS NULL)

query.name: CHECK_IF_ROLE_HAS_TRANSMISSIONS
query.value: select count(system_id_tx) from v_trasmissione where id_corr_globale_dest = @roleIdCorrGlobali@ And dta_vista is null

query.name: S_GET_ROLE_HISTORY
query.value: SELECT original_corr_id, action, role_description, action_date, GETCORRDESCRIPTION(uo_id) as uo_description_, getroletypedescription(role_type_id) as role_type_description_, role_id FROM dpa_role_history WHERE original_corr_id in( SELECT original_id FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE system_id = @idCorrGlobali@) ORDER BY action_date DESC

query.name: UPDATE_ID_CORR_GLOB_IN_TRANSMISSION_MODELS
query.value: update dpa_modelli_mitt_dest set id_corr_globali = @newCorrGlobId@ where cha_tipo_mitt_dest = 'D' and id_corr_globali = @oldCorrGlobId@

query.name: S_GET_UO_ID_FROM_ROLE_CORR_GLOB
query.value: SELECT id_uo FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE system_id = @idCorrGlobRole@

query.name: S_GET_ROLE_CHAIN_ID_CORR_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT system_id FROM dpa_corr_globali START WITH system_id = @idCorrGlob@ CONNECT BY PRIOR id_old = system_id

query.name: U_RIFF_MITT
query.value: UPDATE PROFILE SET CHA_RIFF_MITT=@riferimento@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@systemId@

query.name: S_GET_ROLE_INFO
query.value: SELECT var_codice, var_desc_corr, id_tipo_ruolo, id_uo , Cha_Disabled_Trasm, Cha_Riferimento, Cha_Responsabile, Cha_Segretario FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE system_id = @idCorrGlobRole@

query.name: CHECK_IF_ROLE_DISABLED
query.value: SELECT dta_fine FROM dpa_corr_globali WHERE system_id = @authorCorrGlob@

query.name: I_DPA_OBJECTS_SYNC_PENDING
D_DPA_OBJECTS_SYNC_PENDING
query.value: delete from DPA_OBJECTS_SYNC_PENDING where ID_DOC_OR_FASC = @idDocOrFasc@

query.name: U_LISTS_OWNER
query.value: UPDATE dpa_corr_globali SET id_gruppo_liste = @newIdGroup@ WHERE id_gruppo_liste = @oldIdGroup@

query.name: GET_ROLE_TYPE_ID
query.value: Select Id_Tipo_Ruolo From Dpa_Corr_Globali where cha_tipo_urp = 'R' and Id_Gruppo = @idGroup@

query.name: U_DISABLE_ENABLE_ALL_PROF_HISTORY
query.value: Update DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP@fasc@ Set Enabledhistory = @value@ where id_ogg_custom in ( Select Oc.System_Id from Dpa_Oggetti_Custom@fasc@ Oc Inner Join Dpa_Ogg_Custom_Comp@fasc@ Toc On Oc.System_Id = Toc.Id_Ogg_Custom and Toc.Id_Template = @idTemplate@ )

query.name: U_ENABLE_DISABLE_PROF_HISTORY_SELECTIVE
S_HISTORY_PROF_STATE
query.value: Select oc.system_id, occ.enabledhistory, oc.descrizione, getSeOggAttivo(oc.system_id, @idTemplate@) as attivo From dpa_ogg_custom_comp@fasc@ occ Inner Join dpa_oggetti_custom@fasc@ oc On occ.id_ogg_custom = oc.system_id Inner Join dpa_tipo_oggetto@fasc@ tyo On oc.id_tipo_oggetto = tyo.system_id Where tyo.descrizione != 'Contatore' And id_template = @idTemplate@ Order By occ.posizione

query.name: SPOTLIGHT_GET_COUNT_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM spl1 h1 WHERE catsearch (h1.h1, '@filter@', 'utenteoruolo in (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@)') > 0

query.name: SPOTLIGHT_GET_DOCUMENTI
query.value: SELECT b.system_id as IdProfile, b.oggetto as Oggetto, b.docname as DocName FROM (SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS(40) */ a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT DISTINCT system_id, h1.docname, h1.num_proto_0fornull, h1.utenteoruolo, h1.oggetto FROM spl1 h1 WHERE catsearch (h1.h1, '@filter@', 'utenteoruolo in (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@)' ) > 0 ORDER BY h1.num_proto_0fornull) a WHERE ROWNUM <= @limit@) b WHERE rnum >= @start@

query.name: S_REGISTERED_REGISTRIES_MIN_INFO_DOC
query.value: Select unique(oc.system_id) As CounterId, oc.descrizione As CounterDescription, ta.var_desc_atto As TipologyDescription, 'D' As Typology, Case ta.in_esercizio When 'SI' Then 'true' Else 'false' End As TipologyEnabled, (Select SettingsType From dpa_registri_repertorio Where CounterId = oc.system_id And RowNum = 1) As Settings From dpa_tipo_atto ta Inner Join dpa_ogg_custom_comp occ On ta.system_id = occ.id_template Inner Join dpa_oggetti_custom oc On occ.id_ogg_custom = oc.system_id Where ta.id_amm = @administrationId@ And oc.system_id in (Select r.counterid From dpa_registri_repertorio r) Order By CounterId Asc

query.name: S_REGISTERED_REGISTRIES_MIN_INFO_PRJ
query.value: Select unique(oc.system_id) As CounterId, oc.descrizione As CounterDescription, ta.var_desc_fasc As TipologyDescription, 'F' As Typology, Case ta.in_esercizio When 'SI' Then 'true' Else 'false' End As TipologyEnabled, (Select SettingsType From dpa_registri_repertorio Where CounterId = oc.system_id And RowNum = 1) As Settings From dpa_tipo_fasc ta Inner Join dpa_ogg_custom_comp_fasc occ On ta.system_id = occ.id_template Inner Join dpa_oggetti_custom_fasc oc On occ.id_ogg_custom = oc.system_id Where ta.id_amm = @administrationId@ And oc.system_id in (Select r.counterid From dpa_registri_repertorio r) Order By CounterId Asc

query.name: SPOTLIGHT_GET_COUNT_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT count(pr.system_id) FROM project pr, security s WHERE s.thing = pr.system_id AND s.personorgroup IN (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AND pr.cha_tipo_proj IN ('C', 'F') AND ( catsearch (pr.var_codice, '@filter@', '') > 0 OR catsearch (pr.description, '@filter@', '') > 0 )

query.name: SPOTLIGHT_GET_FASCICOLI
query.value: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS(40) */ a.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM ( SELECT pr.system_id as Id, pr.var_codice as Codice, pr.description as Descrizione, pr.cha_tipo_proj as Tipo FROM project pr, security s WHERE s.thing = pr.system_id AND s.personorgroup IN (@idPeople@, @idGruppo@) AND pr.cha_tipo_proj IN ('C', 'F') AND ( catsearch (pr.var_codice, '@filter@', '') > 0 OR catsearch (pr.description, '@filter@', '') > 0 ) ORDER BY pr.var_codice) a WHERE ROWNUM <= @limit@ ) b WHERE rnum >= @start@

query.name: S_COD_UTILIZZATO
query.value: Select var_desc_corr || ' (' || var_cod_rubrica || ')' As Descr, dta_fine From dpa_corr_globali Where UPPER(var_cod_rubrica) = UPPER('@codice@') And system_id != @corrId@ And cha_tipo_ie = 'I' And id_amm = @idAmm@

query.name: S_REGISTRY_SETTINGS
query.value: Select RegistryId As RegistryId, RfId As RFId, (Select var_desc_registro From dpa_el_registri Where system_id = nvl(registryid, rfid)) As RegistryOrRfDescription, rolerespid As RoleRespId, PrinterRoleRespId As PrinterRoleRespId, PrinterUserRespId As PrinterUserRespId, (Select var_desc_corr From dpa_corr_globali Where id_gruppo = PrinterRoleRespId And dta_fine Is Null) || ' - ' || (Select var_desc_corr From dpa_corr_globali Where id_people = PrinterUserRespId And dta_fine Is Null) As RoleAndUserDescription, CounterState As CounterState, Printfreq As PrintFrequency, to_char(dtastart, 'dd/MM/yyyy') As DateAutomaticPrintStart, to_char(dtafinish, 'dd/MM/yyyy') As DateAutomaticPrintFinish, to_char(dtanextAutomaticprint, 'dd/MM/yyyy') As DateNextAutomaticPrint, to_char(dtalastprint, 'dd/MM/yyyy') As DateLastPrint, LastPrintedNumber As LastPrintedNumber, RespRights From dpa_registri_repertorio Where CounterId = @counterId@ @filter@

query.name: S_USER_MIN_INFO
query.value: Select full_name, system_id From people Where system_id In ( Select people_system_id From peoplegroups Where groups_system_id = @idGroup@)

query.name: S_GET_SUPPORTED_FILE_TYPES_PRESERVATION
