query.VALUE: Select count(*) From DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC Where upper(DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.Tipo) = '@oggetto@' And DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID And DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM And DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID And DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = @tipologia@

query.name: S_ACTUAL_CORR_CODE_BY_CODE
query.value: Select var_cod_rubrica From dpa_corr_globali Where dta_fine Is Null Connect By Prior system_id = id_old Start With var_cod_rubrica = '@corrCode@'

query.name: S_CORR_IDS_BY_ID
query.value: Select system_id From dpa_corr_globali cg Connect By Prior cg.id_old = cg.system_id Start With var_cod_rubrica = @corrCode@

query.name: AMM_S_GET_PEOPLE_CON_QUALIFICA
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_UTENTE, P.USER_ID AS USER_NAME, p.VAR_COGNOME AS COGNOME, p.VAR_NOME AS NOME, P.FULL_NAME AS NOME_COMPLETO, P.MATRICOLA AS MATRICOLA, PQ.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_PEOPLEGROUPS FROM PEOPLE P INNER JOIN DPA_PEOPLEGROUPS_QUALIFICHE PQ ON P.SYSTEM_ID = PQ.ID_PEOPLE INNER JOIN DPA_QUALIFICHE Q ON PQ.ID_QUALIFICA = Q.SYSTEM_ID WHERE P.DISABLED = 'N' AND Q.CHA_COD = '@codiceQualifica@' @customParams@ ORDER BY P.FULL_NAME ASC

query.name: S_GET_FASCICOLI_DA_CODICE_CONSEC
query.value: select p.system_id, p.var_codice, getdesctitolario (p.id_titolario) AS cod_titolario, p.description, p.ID_TITOLARIO from project p where var_codice = '@codFasc@' and p.ID_AMM=@idAmm@ and EXISTS (select 'x' from security e where p.system_id=e.thing and e.PERSONORGROUP in ( @idPeople@, @idGruppo@) and e.ACCESSRIGHTS>0) @altro@ order by p.VAR_COD_LIV1 asc

query.name: S_VERIFICA_GESTIONE_CHIAVI
query.value: select abilitato_chiavi_config from people where system_id = @idPeople@

query.name: S_GET_REGISTRO_BY_CODICE
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM DPA_EL_REGISTRI WHERE @param2@

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATE_FASC_BY_DESC
query.value: SELECT DISTINCT(DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO) AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM, DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_FASC, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE AS SYSTEM_ID_TEMPLATE, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AS SYSTEM_ID_TIPO_OGGETTO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.VAR_DESC_FASC, DPA_TIPO_FASC.ABILITATO_SI_NO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.IN_ESERCIZIO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.PATH_MOD_1, DPA_TIPO_FASC.PATH_MOD_2, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.GG_PRE_SCADENZA, DPA_TIPO_FASC.CHA_PRIVATO, DPA_TIPO_FASC.ID_AMM, DPA_TIPO_FASC.IPERFASCICOLO, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_PROJECT, ( SELECT VALORE_OGGETTO_DB FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC DPA_TF, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TF.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TF.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS VALORE_OGGETTO_DB, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.CODICE_DB, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.MANUAL_INSERT, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ANNO, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_AOO_RF, ( SELECT DTA_INS FROM DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC DPA_TF, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC DPA_OC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC DPA_TO WHERE DPA_TF.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TF.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TO.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_TO.DESCRIZIONE < > 'CasellaDiSelezione' ) AS DTA_INS, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_DI_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_OBBLIGATORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.DESCRIZIONE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.MULTILINEA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.NUMERO_DI_CARATTERI, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.NUMERO_DI_LINEE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ORIZZONTALE_VERTICALE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.RESET_ANNO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.FORMATO_CONTATORE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.RICERCA_CORR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_R_DEFAULT, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CAMPO_COMUNE, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CHA_TIPO_TAR, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.CONTA_DOPO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.REPERTORIO, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.DA_VISUALIZZARE_RICERCA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.FORMATO_ORA, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.TIPO_LINK, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.TIPO_OBJ_LINK, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.DESCRIZIONE AS DESCRIZIONE_TIPO FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC, DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC, DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC, DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC, DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC WHERE DPA_TIPO_FASC.VAR_DESC_FASC = '@descrizione@' AND DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE @idProject@ AND DPA_ASS_TEMPLATES_FASC.ID_OGGETTO = DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_OGG_CUSTOM AND DPA_OGGETTI_CUSTOM_FASC.ID_TIPO_OGGETTO = DPA_TIPO_OGGETTO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID AND DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.ID_TEMPLATE = DPA_TIPO_FASC.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY DPA_OGG_CUSTOM_COMP_FASC.POSIZIONE

query.name: PD_GET_DPA_TEMPLATE_2_FASC_BY_DESC
query.value: SELECT * FROM DPA_TIPO_FASC WHERE VAR_DESC_FASC = '@descrizione@'

query.name: S_People_PIS
query.value: SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID, P.USER_ID, P.ID_AMM, P.VAR_COGNOME, P.VAR_NOME, P.VAR_TELEFONO, P.EMAIL_ADDRESS, P.FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS, P.CHA_NOTIFICA, P.CHA_AMMINISTRATORE,P.CHA_NOTIFICA_CON_ALLEGATO,P.VAR_SEDE,P.MATRICOLA FROM PEOPLE P, DPA_AMMINISTRA A WHERE UPPER(USER_ID)='@userName@' and UPPER(A.VAR_CODICE_AMM)='@codiceAmm@' and P.ID_AMM=A.SYSTEM_ID AND NOT(P.DISABLED='Y')

query.name: S_DPADETTGLOBALIBYID
query.value: select d.VAR_INDIRIZZO,d.VAR_CAP,d.VAR_PROVINCIA,d.VAR_NAZIONE,d.VAR_COD_FISC,d.VAR_TELEFONO,d.VAR_FAX,d.VAR_NOTE,d.VAR_CITTA from dpa_dett_globali d where d.ID_CORR_GLOBALI=@idCorr@

query.name: MODELLI_TRASM_UTENTI_CON_NOTIFICA_SOLO_NOTIFICA
query.value: select p.system_id as ID, p.user_id as CODICE, p.FULL_NAME as UTENTE, cg.VAR_DESC_CORR as RUOLO, getflagnotifica(@id_mod_mitt_dest@,p.system_id) as FLAG_NOTIFICA, p.var_cognome from people p, peoplegroups pg, dpa_corr_globali cg where cg.system_id = @id_corr_glob_ruolo@ and cg.id_gruppo = pg.groups_system_id and pg.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = p.system_id and pg.DTA_FINE is null and getflagnotifica(@id_mod_mitt_dest@,p.system_id)=1 order by p.var_cognome asc

query.name: S_GET_CONTATORI_DOCUMENTI_PER_TIPOLOGIA
query.value: SELECT TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO AS DESCRIZIONE, CASE WHEN T1.TOTALE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE T1.TOTALE END AS TOTALE FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO AS DESCRIZIONE, COUNT(*) AS TOTALE FROM DPA_TIPO_ATTO TA INNER JOIN PROFILE P ON TA.SYSTEM_ID = P.ID_TIPO_ATTO INNER JOIN PEOPLE PL ON P.AUTHOR = PL.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN PEOPLEGROUPS PG ON PL.SYSTEM_ID = PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CGR ON PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = CGR.ID_GRUPPO INNER JOIN DPA_CORR_GLOBALI CGUO ON CGR.ID_UO = CGUO.SYSTEM_ID WHERE CGR.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CGUO.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND CGUO.SYSTEM_ID = @idUO@ AND P.CREATION_DATE BETWEEN @dataInizio@ AND @dataFine@ GROUP BY TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO ) T1 ON TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO = T1.DESCRIZIONE WHERE TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO IN (@descrizioneTipiDocumento@) ORDER BY TA.VAR_DESC_ATTO ASC

query.name: S_GET_DATI_SEGNATURA_TIMBRO
query.value: select a.VAR_SEGNATURA, GetCodReg(a.ID_REGISTRO) as COD_REG, GETcodUO(a.ID_UO_CREATORE) as UO_CREATORE, d.VAR_CODICE_AMM, a.NUM_ANNO_PROTO as ANNO, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS DTA_PROTO, TO_CHAR (a.dta_proto, 'hh:mm:ss') AS ORA_PROTO, a.CHA_TIPO_PROTO, a.NUM_PROTO, CountAllegati_BY_DocNumber(a.DOCNUMBER) as allegati, classcat(a.SYSTEM_ID) cod_fasc, a.DOCNUMBER, Getcodicerfbyprofileid(a.system_id) as COD_RF from profile a, dpa_amministra d where a.system_id=@system_id@ and d.SYSTEM_ID = Getidamm(a.ID_PEOPLE_PROT)

query.name: S_GET_GERARCHIA_RUBRICA
query.value: SELECT getgerarchia(A.Id_Amm,A.Var_Cod_Rubrica,a.CHA_TIPO_IE,D.System_Id) As Gerarchia FROM DPA_CORR_GLOBALI a, PEOPLE b, PEOPLEGROUPS c, GROUPS d WHERE a.id_people = b.system_id AND b.system_id = c.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID AND c.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = d.system_id AND a.cha_tipo_ie = '@tipo@' AND a.id_amm = @idAmm@ AND a.dta_fine IS NULL AND c.dta_fine IS NULL AND UPPER(b.user_id) = UPPER('@codice@')

query.name: S_DPA_UTENTE_APPLICAZIONI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,VAR_CODE,DESCRIPTION FROM DPA_EXT_APPS, DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS WHERE DPA_EXT_APPS.SYSTEM_ID = DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS.ID_EXT_APP AND DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS.ID_PEOPLE = @idUtente@

query.name: S_DPA_APPLICAZIONI
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID,VAR_CODE,DESCRIPTION FROM DPA_EXT_APPS

query.name: I_DPA_APPLICAZIONE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_EXT_APPS (@paramA@ VAR_CODE,DESCRIPTION) VALUES (@paramB@ '@param1@','@param2@')

query.name: U_DPA_APPLICAZIONE
query.value: UPDATE DPA_EXT_APPS SET VAR_CODE = '@param1@', DESCRIPTION = '@param2@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param3@

query.name: D_DPA_APPLICAZIONE
query.value: DELETE DPA_EXT_APPS WHERE SYSTEM_ID = @param1@

query.name: I_DPA_REL_APP_UTENTE
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS (ID_PEOPLE,ID_EXT_APP) VALUES (@param1@,@param2@)

query.name: I_DPA_REL_APP_UTENTI
query.value: INSERT INTO DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS (ID_EXT_APP,ID_PEOPLE) SELECT (@param1@, SYSTEM_ID FROM PEOPLE WHERE SYSTEM_ID IN (@param2@))

query.name: D_DPA_REL_APP_UTENTE
query.value: DELETE DPA_REL_PEOPLE_EXTAPPS WHERE ID_EXT_APP = @param1@

query.name: I_EXTEND_VISIBILITY
query.value: INSERT INTO SECURITY ( THING, PERSONORGROUP, ACCESSRIGHTS, ID_GRUPPO_TRASM, CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS, TS_INSERIMENTO, VAR_NOTE_SEC ) (SELECT @documentId@, cg4.id_gruppo, 63, NULL, 'A', NULL, to_timestamp(sysdate), NULL FROM dpa_corr_globali cg4 INNER JOIN dpa_tipo_ruolo ON cg4.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id WHERE Exists (SELECT 'x' FROM dpa_corr_globali cg3 WHERE cg3.dta_fine IS NULL and cg4.id_uo = cg3.system_id CONNECT BY PRIOR cg3.id_parent = cg3.system_id START WITH cg3.system_id = (SELECT cg2.id_uo FROM dpa_corr_globali cg2 WHERE cg2.id_gruppo = @roleId@ ) ) AND cg4.CHA_TIPO_URP = 'R' AND cg4.ID_AMM = @idAmministrazione@ AND cg4.DTA_FINE IS NULL AND dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello < (SELECT dpa_tipo_ruolo.num_livello FROM dpa_corr_globali cg1 INNER JOIN dpa_tipo_ruolo ON cg1.id_tipo_ruolo = dpa_tipo_ruolo.system_id WHERE cg1.id_gruppo = @roleId@ ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM security WHERE thing = @documentId@ AND personorgroup = cg4.id_gruppo ) )

query.name: V_PROTO_PREGRESSI
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(NUM_PROTO) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND TO_CHAR(DTA_PROTO,'YYYY') = '@param3@' AND NUM_PROTO @param2@ UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI WHERE ID_REGISTRO = @param1@ AND ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL @param2@ AND ESITO IS NULL

query.name: S_UTE_RUOL_BY_COD
query.value: SELECT P.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_PEOPLE, G.SYSTEM_ID AS ID_RUOLO FROM PEOPLE P, GROUPS G, PEOPLEGROUPS PG WHERE UPPER(P.USER_ID) = UPPER('@param1@') AND UPPER(G.GROUP_ID) = UPPER('@param2@') AND PG.GROUPS_SYSTEM_ID = G.SYSTEM_ID AND PG.PEOPLE_SYSTEM_ID = P.SYSTEM_ID AND P.ID_AMM = @param3@

query.name: S_GET_REPORT_PREGRESSO_BY_SYSTEMID
query.value: select p.SYSTEM_ID, p.ID_AMM, p.ID_UTENTE_CREATORE, p.ID_RUOLO_CREATORE, to_char(p.DATA_ESECUZIONE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DATA_ESECUZIONE, to_char(p.DATA_FINE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DATA_FINE, p.NUM_DOC from DPA_PREGRESSI p where p.SYSTEM_ID = @system_id@

query.name: S_GET_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSO_BY_SYSTEMID
query.value: select a.SYSTEM_ID, a.ID_PREGRESSO, a.ID_REGISTRO, a.ID_DOCUMENTO, a.ID_UTENTE, a.ID_RUOLO, a.TIPO_OPERAZIONE, to_char(a.DATA,'dd/mm/yyyy') as DATA, a.ERRORE, a.ESITO, a.ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL from DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI a where a.ID_PREGRESSO = @id_report@ and a.ESITO IS NOT NULL order by a.DATA asc

query.name: S_GET_ALL_REPORT_PREGRESSO
query.value: /* Formatted on 2012/07/23 15:59 (Formatter Plus v4.8.8) */ SELECT p.system_id, p.id_amm, p.id_utente_creatore, p.id_ruolo_creatore, TO_CHAR (p.data_esecuzione, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss' ) AS data_esecuzione, TO_CHAR (p.data_fine, 'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:mi:ss') AS data_fine, p.num_doc, p.descrizione, SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'E' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS elaborati, SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM (CASE a.esito WHEN 'E' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS errori FROM dpa_pregressi p, dpa_ass_pregressi a WHERE p.id_amm = @id_amm@ AND p.system_id = a.id_pregresso(+) AND p.id_amm = @id_amm@ @daAmm@ GROUP BY (p.system_id, p.id_amm, p.id_utente_creatore, p.id_ruolo_creatore, p.data_esecuzione, p.data_fine, p.num_doc, p.descrizione ) ORDER BY (p.system_id) DESC

query.name: S_GET_ALLEGATI_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI_BY_SYSTEMID
query.value: select a.SYSTEM_ID, a.ID_ITEM, a.ERRORE, a.ESITO from DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO a where a.ID_ITEM = @id_item@ order by a.SYSTEM_ID asc

query.name: S_GET_ID_ITEM_DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI
query.value: select a.SYSTEM_ID from DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI a where a.ID_PREGRESSO = @id_report@ order by a.SYSTEM_ID asc

query.name: I_DPA_PREGRESSI
I_DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI
I_DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO
D_DELETE_ALLEGATO_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO WHERE ID_ITEM=@id_item@

query.name: D_DELETE_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI WHERE ID_PREGRESSO=@id_pregresso@

query.name: D_DELETE_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_PREGRESSI WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: U_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: update DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI set ID_DOCUMENTO=@id_documento@, ERRORE='@errore@', ESITO='@esito@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: U_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: update DPA_PREGRESSI set DATA_FINE=@data_fine@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: U_ALLEGATO_ITEM_REPORT_PREGRESSI
query.value: update DPA_ASS_ALLEGATO set ID_ITEM=@id_item@, ERRORE='@errore@', ESITO='@esito@' WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: S_GET_DETTAGLIO_DOCUMENTO_NO_SECURITY_BY_NUM_PROTO_E_REG
query.value: SELECT /*+ NO_INDEX(A INDX_PROFILE41) */ a.system_id, a.docnumber, a.docname, a.status, a.docserver_loc, a.PATH, @creationDate@ AS creation_date, @creationTime@ as creation_time, a.id_registro, a.cha_tipo_proto, a.id_oggetto, a.num_proto, a.num_anno_proto, a.var_proto_eme, @dta_proto_eme@ as dta_proto_eme, a.cha_assegnato, a.var_cognome_eme, a.var_nome_eme, a.id_parent, @dta_proto@ as dta_proto, a.cha_mod_oggetto, a.cha_mod_mitt_dest, a.cha_mod_mitt_int, a.var_proto_in, a.id_annullatore, a.var_aut_annulla, a.cha_invio_conferma, @dta_proto_in@ as dta_proto_in, @dta_annulla@ as dta_annulla, a.var_segnatura, a.cha_da_proto, a.var_note, a.cha_fascicolato, a.id_tipo_atto, a.cha_privato, a.cha_evidenza, a.var_prof_oggetto AS var_desc_oggetto, a.id_people_prot, a.id_ruolo_prot, a.id_uo_prot, '255' as accessrights, d.type_id, d.description, d.system_id AS sys_doctypes, a.author, a.id_ruolo_creatore, a.id_uo_creatore, a.cha_interop, a.dta_scadenza, a.cha_personale, a.cha_in_cestino, a.id_documento_principale, a.prot_tit, a.num_in_fasc, a.id_fasc_prot_tit, a.num_prot_tit, a.id_titolario, a.cha_riff_mitt, a.id_people_delegato, a.CHA_DOCUMENTO_DA_PEC, a.LAST_FORWARD, a.PRINTS_NUM, a.CHA_COD_T_A, a.COD_EXT_APP FROM PROFILE a, DOCUMENTTYPES d WHERE @docNumber@ and a.documenttype=d.system_id

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_DOCNUMER
query.value: delete from profile where docnumber = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_COMPONENTS
query.value: delete from components where docnumber = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_VERSIONS
query.value: delete from versions where docnumber = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_DOCARRIVOPAR
query.value: delete from dpa_doc_arrivo_par where id_profile = @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_DPA_NOTE
query.value: delete from dpa_note where tipooggettoassociato = 'D' and idoggettoassociato= @docNumer@

query.name: D_DELETE_PROFILE_FROM_PROJECT_COMPONENTS
query.value: delete from project_components where link = @iDdoc@

query.name: U_DATA_CREATION_DOC_GRIGIO
query.value: update PROFILE set CREATION_DATE=@creation_date@, CREATION_TIME=@creation_time@, LAST_EDIT_DATE=@last_edit_date@, ID_VECCHIO_DOCUMENTO=@id_vecchio_documento@ WHERE SYSTEM_ID=@system_id@

query.name: S_VERIFICA_INTERVALLO_LOG_PROTOCOLLO
query.value: SELECT userid_operatore, dta_azione, var_oggetto, var_desc_oggetto, var_desc_azione, cha_esito, id_people_operatore, id_gruppo_operatore, id_amm, id_oggetto, var_cod_azione FROM dpa_log, DUAL WHERE id_amm = 361 AND dta_azione >= SYSDATE - NUMTODSINTERVAL(@intervallo@, 'SECOND') AND var_oggetto = 'DOCUMENTO' AND (var_cod_azione = 'AGG_PROT' or var_cod_azione ='PUT_FILE') AND var_cod_azione NOT LIKE 'AMM_%' ORDER BY dta_azione DESC

query.name: V_IDVECCHIO_PREGRESSI
query.value: SELECT TO_CHAR(ID_VECCHIO_DOCUMENTO) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM PROFILE WHERE ID_VECCHIO_DOCUMENTO @param1@ UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL) AS PROTOCOLLATO FROM DPA_ASS_PREGRESSI WHERE ID_NUM_PROTO_EXCEL @param1@ AND ESITO IS NULL

query.name: U_SET_FLAG_ALLEGATI_ESTERNI
query.value: UPDATE versions SET cha_allegati_esterno='1' WHERE version_id=@version_id@ AND docnumber=@docnumber@

query.name: S_ALLEGATO_ESTERNO
query.value: SELECT CHA_ALLEGATI_ESTERNO FROM VERSIONS WHERE version_id=@version_id@

query.name: S_ASS_RUOLI_STATI_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: SELECT ID_GRUPPO, ID_DIAGRAMMA, ID_STATO, CHA_NOT_VIS FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@

query.name: S_ASS_RUOLO_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_GRUPPO = @idRuolo@ AND ID_STATO = 0

query.name: S_ASS_RUOLO_STATO_DIAGRAMMA
query.value: SELECT count(*) FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE ID_DIAGRAMMA = @idDiagramma@ AND ID_GRUPPO = @idRuolo@ AND ID_STATO = @idStato@

query.name: S_GET_APPLICATION_NAME
query.value: SELECT * from ( SELECT ID_VERSIONS_U FROM DPA_DOCSPA ORDER BY SYSTEM_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

query.name: S_GET_SECURITY_PROFILE_SEMPL_WITH_FILTERS
query.value: Select * From ( SELECT NVL(cor_UO.system_id,NVL(cor_GR.system_id,cor_PE.system_id)) as system_id, NVL(cor_UO.id_uo,NVL(cor_GR.id_gruppo,cor_PE.id_people)) as id_appartenenza, NVL(cor_UO.var_cod_rubrica,NVL(cor_GR.var_cod_rubrica,cor_PE.var_cod_rubrica)) as var_cod_rubrica, NVL(cor_UO.id_registro,NVL(cor_GR.id_registro,cor_PE.id_registro)) as id_registro, NVL(cor_UO.id_amm,NVL(cor_GR.id_amm,cor_PE.id_amm)) as id_amm, NVL(ruolo_UO.var_desc_ruolo,NVL(ruolo_GR.var_desc_ruolo,ruolo_PE.var_desc_ruolo)) as var_desc_ruolo, s.cha_tipo_diritto, s.personorgroup, s.hide_doc_versions, s.accessrights, NVL(cor_UO.id_uo,NVL(cor_GR.id_uo,NVL(cor_PE.id_uo,Cor_Pe.id_people))) as id_uo, NVL(cor_UO.cha_tipo_corr,NVL(cor_GR.cha_tipo_corr,cor_PE.cha_tipo_corr)) as cha_tipo_corr, NVL(cor_UO.cha_tipo_ie,NVL(cor_GR.cha_tipo_ie,cor_PE.cha_tipo_ie)) as cha_tipo_ie, NVL(cor_UO.cha_tipo_urp,NVL(cor_GR.cha_tipo_urp,cor_PE.cha_tipo_urp)) as cha_tipo_urp, NVL(cor_UO.var_desc_corr,NVL(cor_GR.var_desc_corr,cor_PE.var_desc_corr)) as var_desc_corr, s.ts_inserimento, s.var_note_sec, NVL(cor_UO.dta_fine,NVL(cor_GR.dta_fine,cor_PE.dta_fine)) as dta_fine, pe.var_nome, Pe.Var_Cognome, NULL as var_cod_uo, 'NO' as Rimosso, 'NO' as DaReinserire From Security S Left Outer Join Dpa_Corr_Globali Cor_Gr On s.Personorgroup = Cor_Gr.Id_Gruppo And Cor_Gr.Cha_Tipo_Urp = 'R' Left Outer Join Dpa_Corr_Globali Cor_Pe On s.Personorgroup = Cor_Pe.Id_People And Cor_Pe.Cha_Tipo_Urp = 'P' Left Outer Join People Pe On Pe.System_Id = Cor_Pe.Id_People Left Outer Join Dpa_Corr_Globali Cor_Uo On s.Personorgroup = Cor_Uo.Id_Uo And Cor_Uo.Cha_Tipo_Urp = 'U' Left Outer Join Dpa_Tipo_Ruolo Ruolo_Gr On Ruolo_Gr.System_Id = Cor_Gr.Id_Tipo_Ruolo Left Outer Join Dpa_Tipo_Ruolo Ruolo_Pe On Ruolo_Pe.System_Id = Cor_Pe.Id_Tipo_Ruolo Left Outer Join Dpa_Tipo_Ruolo Ruolo_Uo On Ruolo_Uo.System_Id = Cor_Uo.Id_Tipo_Ruolo WHERE s.Thing = @param1@ @param2@ @param3@ UNION SELECT DISTINCT a.system_id, NVL(a.id_gruppo,d.id_people) as id_appartenenza, a.var_cod_rubrica, a.id_registro, a.id_amm, c.var_desc_ruolo, b.cha_tipo_diritto, b.personorgroup, b.hide_doc_versions, b.accessrights, NVL(a.id_people, d.id_people), a.cha_tipo_corr, a.cha_tipo_ie, a.cha_tipo_urp, a.var_desc_corr, sysdate, b.note, sysdate, d.var_desc_corr AS desc_uo, d.cha_tipo_ie AS cha_tipo_uo, d.var_cod_rubrica AS var_cod_uo, 'SI' as Rimosso, 'NO' as DaReinserire FROM dpa_corr_globali a, deleted_security b, dpa_tipo_ruolo c, dpa_corr_globali d WHERE a.id_gruppo = b.personorgroup AND c.system_id = a.id_tipo_ruolo AND d.system_id = a.id_uo AND b.Thing = @param1@ AND (b.accessrights >= 0 OR b.cha_tipo_diritto = 'P') And Not Exists (Select 'x' From security sec Where sec.thing = b.thing and sec.personorgroup = b.personorgroup And sec.accessrights > 20) @param4@ @param5@ @param8@ @param9@ UNION SELECT DISTINCT A.SYSTEM_ID, NVL(c.id_gruppo, c.id_people) as id_appartenenza, c.var_cod_rubrica, c.id_registro, c.id_amm, '' as var_desc_ruolo, B.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO, B.PERSONORGROUP, B.HIDE_DOC_VERSIONS, B.ACCESSRIGHTS, c.id_people, c.cha_tipo_corr, c.cha_tipo_ie, c.cha_tipo_urp, c.var_desc_corr, sysdate, b.note, sysdate, a.var_nome, a.Var_Cognome, C.VAR_COD_RUBRICA, 'NO' as Rimosso, 'SI' as DaReinserire FROM PEOPLE A, DELETED_SECURITY B, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI C WHERE A.SYSTEM_ID = B.PERSONORGROUP AND C.ID_PEOPLE = A.SYSTEM_ID AND B.THING = @param1@ AND (B.ACCESSRIGHTS > 0 OR B.CHA_TIPO_DIRITTO='P') AND C.ID_AMM = 361 @param4@ @param6@ @param8@ @param10@ ) @param7@ ORDER BY rimosso Asc, dareinserire Asc, Decode(accessrights,0,255,accessrights) Desc, Decode(Cha_Tipo_Diritto,'T','B',Cha_Tipo_Diritto) Asc

query.name: GET_TIPO_COMPONENTI
query.value: SELECT CHA_TIPO_COMPONENTI, DESCRIZIONE FROM TIPO_COMPONENTI

query.name: S_PEOPLE_CENTRO_SERVIZI_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE P, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE @param2@ AND P.ABILITATO_CENTRO_SERVIZI ='1' AND A.ID_PEOPLE = P.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_AMM = P.ID_AMM

query.name: S_People_GLOBALI
query.value: SELECT @param1@ FROM PEOPLE P, DPA_CORR_GLOBALI A WHERE @param2@ AND NOT(P.DISABLED='Y') AND A.ID_PEOPLE = P.SYSTEM_ID AND A.ID_AMM = P.ID_AMM

query.name: S_CORRESPONDENT_DETAILS
query.value: SELECT SYSTEM_ID, ID_CORR_GLOBALI, VAR_INDIRIZZO, VAR_CAP, VAR_PROVINCIA , VAR_NAZIONE, VAR_TELEFONO, VAR_TELEFONO2, VAR_FAX, VAR_NOTE, VAR_COD_FISC , VAR_CITTA, VAR_LOCALITA, VAR_LUOGO_NASCITA, DTA_NASCITA , VAR_TITOLO, VAR_COD_PI FROM DPA_DETT_GLOBALI WHERE ID_CORR_GLOBALI=@param1@

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATES_DOC_LITE_BY_ROLE
query.value: SELECT distinct d.system_id, d.var_desc_atto, di.ID_DIAGRAMMA FROM dpa_vis_tipo_doc vis , dpa_tipo_atto d LEFT JOIN dpa_ass_diagrammi di ON di.ID_TIPO_DOC= d.SYSTEM_ID WHERE id_amm = @idAmm@ AND abilitato_si_no = '1' AND d.SYSTEM_ID= vis.ID_TIPO_DOC AND vis.ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ AND vis.DIRITTI != '0' ORDER BY d.var_desc_atto

query.name: PD_GET_TEMPLATES_FASC_LITE_BY_ROLE
query.value: SELECT distinct d.system_id, d.var_desc_fasc, di.ID_DIAGRAMMA FROM dpa_vis_tipo_fasc vis , dpa_tipo_fasc d LEFT JOIN dpa_ass_diagrammi di ON di.ID_TIPO_FASC= d.SYSTEM_ID WHERE id_amm = @idAmm@ AND abilitato_si_no = '1' AND d.SYSTEM_ID= vis.ID_TIPO_FASC AND vis.ID_RUOLO = @idRuolo@ AND vis.DIRITTI != '0' ORDER BY d.var_desc_fasc

query.name: COUNT_DIAGRAMMI
query.value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE id_diagramma = @idDiagramma@ AND id_stato = @idStato@ AND id_gruppo = @idGruppo@

query.name: DELETE_DIAGRAMMI
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA WHERE id_diagramma = @idDiagramma@ AND id_stato = @idStato@ AND id_gruppo = @idGruppo@

query.name: UPDATE_DIAGRAMMI
query.value: UPDATE DPA_ASS_RUOLO_STATI_DIAGRAMMA SET cha_not_vis = '1' WHERE id_diagramma = @idDiagramma@ AND id_stato = @idStato@ AND id_gruppo = @idGruppo@

query.name: INSERT_DIAGRAMMI
S_LOG_FASC_FILTER
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO FROM DPA_LOG A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO IN ('FOLDER', 'FASCICOLO') AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ UNION ALL SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO FROM DPA_LOG_STORICO A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO IN ('FOLDER', 'FASCICOLO') AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ ) A ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: S_LOG_DOC_FILTER
query.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO, A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE FROM DPA_LOG A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO = '@param2@' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE != 'OPEN_DET_DOC' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ UNION ALL SELECT distinct(A.SYSTEM_ID), A.USERID_OPERATORE, A.ID_PEOPLE_OPERATORE,getpeoplename(id_people_operatore) people_Desc, A.DTA_AZIONE AS DTA_AZIONE, A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE,getdescruolo(A.ID_GRUPPO_OPERATORE) RUOLO_DESC,A.ID_AMM, A.VAR_DESC_OGGETTO, A.VAR_COD_AZIONE,A.CHA_ESITO, A.VAR_DESC_AZIONE FROM DPA_LOG_STORICO A, DPA_ANAGRAFICA_LOG B, DPA_LOG_ATTIVATI C WHERE A.ID_OGGETTO = '@param1@' AND A.VAR_OGGETTO = '@param2@' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE != 'OPEN_DET_DOC' AND A.VAR_COD_AZIONE = B.VAR_CODICE AND B.SYSTEM_ID = C.SYSTEM_ID_ANAGRAFICA @param3@ ) A ORDER BY A.SYSTEM_ID DESC

query.name: DELETE_UO_SYSEXTERNAL
query.value: DELETE FROM DPA_DATI_FATTURAZIONE WHERE UPPER(codice_amm_ipa) = UPPER(@param2@) AND UPPER(codice_aoo_ipa) = UPPER(@param3@) AND UPPER(codice_uo) = UPPER(@param1@)
